SERIF_AKASHI2NDANNIVERSARY_EVENTA: Can kinda feel my face burning up when I say this... but thanks for always cheering me on. Let's keep at it!
SERIF_AKASHISUMMERDIVE2108_APPRECIATION: Hey, you all right? You look pretty worn out. Huh? You wanna head down to the resort and refresh yourself? A-All right, I'll take you next time!
SERIF_AKASHISUMMERDIVE2108_DAILY: Hey, I heard there's a water slide over there! Let's go check it out! N-No, I'm not acting like a kid!
SERIF_AKASHISUMMERDIVE2108_EVENTA: Working on a resort ship, huh...? There'd be like, attractions and stuff there, right? N-Not that I'd be interested!
SERIF_AKASHISUMMERDIVE2108_EVENTB: Pubraseer said he doesn't have any of his memories... but isn't there anything we can do? Feels like I can't just leave him like that.
SERIF_AKASHISUMMERDIVE2108_HERO: Idols really are something, huh? The way they can just glitz it up in swimsuits... I think I can see why they're so popular.
SERIF_AKASHISUMMERDIVE2108_PLAYER: H-Hey, you got a swimsuit? I mean, fits the season, right? Besides, I think one'd look real good on you.
SERIF_AKASHISUMMERDIVE2108_RELATION: Pubraseer's older than me, but it feels like I've got to look out for him, you know? I couldn't live that carefree if I tried.
SERIF_AKASHISUMMERDIVE2108_TOUCH: W-Whoa, where'd that come from?! Huh, Hisaki asked you to recover my suit's data? F-Fine, just don't be touching me all over like that!
SERIF_AKASHISUMMERDIVE2108_TRAIN: I kinda wanna take a swim now. Do some warm-up stretches with me, won't you?
SERIF_AKASHI_APPRECIATION: Hm? You seem pretty worn out. Know what you need? A big meal! Eatin' and sleepin', that's what heals you!
SERIF_AKASHI_DAILY: Hey, good to see you. Just got off ball practice, but I'm good to go. What's on the agenda today?
SERIF_AKASHI_HERO: Bolt of Justice really is somethin'. Now him, he's a real hero. One day, I wanna... Huh? L-Look, it's not like I look up to the guy or anything!
SERIF_AKASHI_PLAYER: It's reaaal embarrassing to praise a pal I grew up with, but... You're doing real well. Feels like you've gotten real dependable.
SERIF_AKASHI_RELATION: Tch, Sui's always putting on an act, you know? Still a kid, but always acting all grown up. What? I'm not that much older than them? Shut up!
SERIF_AKASHI_TOUCH: Bwah?! Q-Quit stickin' to me like that! We're not kids anymore, you know?! Aha, haha, hey that tickles!
SERIF_AKASHI_TRAIN: A light spar, a simple warm-up. Let's see what you've got!
SERIF_AKASHI_TRAINED: Yeesh! Y-You could at least go a little easy!
SERIF_ALCHIBACHASERS2105_APPRECIATION: It's during the serious missions that you really need time to enjoy a nice tea break, honey. Don't worry, I'll leave the charmer talk for after the mission is accomplished.
SERIF_ALCHIBACHASERS2105_DAILY: It's mission time, partner. See every job I get all the way through, is what I always say. Time for me to get serious.
SERIF_ALCHIBACHASERS2105_EVENTA: Looks like they've started moving. Well, partner, let's get going. It'll be a bit of a trip, though. You ready?
SERIF_ALCHIBACHASERS2105_EVENTB: Mysteries leading to mysteries... Don't worry, though, partner. I'm tracking him down.
SERIF_ALCHIBACHASERS2105_HERO: Talk about your risky drivers. I can't say I don't understand the struggle of grappling with a new job, though.
SERIF_ALCHIBACHASERS2105_PLAYER: You sure you didn't push yourself a bit too much, partner? I love to see how hard you work, but lean on me a little more. I'm pretty accommodating, you know?
SERIF_ALCHIBACHASERS2105_RELATION: Vulpecula and I, we go back a bit. Gentleman thief and private detective—a clash right out of a novel, isn't it? I want to be the one to catch him. And I will.
SERIF_ALCHIBACHASERS2105_TOUCH: Oh? You're happy with just touching my feathers? Personally, I wouldn't mind us doing something more... exciting. How's tonight sound?
SERIF_ALCHIBACHASERS2105_TRAIN: Think you can take me at my best?
SERIF_ALCHIBA_APPRECIATION: Come, now, you'll ruin that pretty face of yours wearing yourself out. How about getting some shut-eye in these wings of mine? W-What? I won't do anything! Probably.
SERIF_ALCHIBA_DAILY: Hey there, client. How about we slip out on a date? Oh, got work? Well, I guess there's no arguing with the almighty livo. Here, I'll help—what's the job?
SERIF_ALCHIBA_EVENTA:
Happy New Year, my dear.
Glad I got to spend such a special time of the year with you.
How about we do our New Year's prayers? I'll escort you to the shrine.
SERIF_ALCHIBA_HERO: Me, I don't trust cops... but the way that detective's got not a shred of duplicity to him? Worth believing in. Just wish everyone on the force was like him.
SERIF_ALCHIBA_PLAYER: You're taking to the field? Talk about a cruel trick of fate! Don't worry, though. I'll keep you safe. As for what's in it for me, well... nothing but your love.
SERIF_ALCHIBA_RELATION: That reporter really knows how to find things out. The way he can just be behind you without you even knowing... Damn. He could be a detective, easy.
SERIF_ALCHIBA_TOUCH: Oh-hoh, mighty forward today, aren't we, my dear? Go ahead, enjoy my feathers. I take good care of them. Won't ask for anything in return, either, heh heh.
SERIF_ALCHIBA_TRAIN: All right, how about a little warm-up?
SERIF_ALCHIBA_TRAINED: Guh...! Are you trying to get me to go, for real?!
SERIF_ALEND_APPRECIATION:
What's the matter? Why the scowl?
Talk to me. I can't say anything particularly clever,
but I can help you think of a solution.
SERIF_ALEND_DAILY:
A house does not function on its own.
Infrastructure, public facilities, utilities... it exists as a part of the whole town, the whole city.
Taking a broad look at the town you live in can be surprisingly fun.
SERIF_ALEND_EVENTA:
What, thinking this city's developing awfully quickly?
It's using the latest construction tech, with copious amounts of 3D printing.
Go ahead, take a good look at it all.
SERIF_ALEND_EVENTB:
First the residential area, then the infrastructure and utilities... I have all these
tasks, then a Christmas event on top of them? This is the problem
with people who aren't on the field... Ah, never mind.
SERIF_ALEND_EVENTC:
Perfect timing! I've got another job for you.
Sorry, but can you help me decorate the town?
We're lacking hands on deck. I'll pay, of course.
SERIF_ALEND_EVENTD:
Great job! Better than expected!
That lightens up the event schedule a little.
Thanks, Operator. Here, take your reward.
SERIF_ALEND_HERO:
Efficient and rational. I do like how
Giansar thinks. If we were in different positions,
we may have been good business partners.
SERIF_ALEND_PLAYER:
So, you go to all sorts of planets on work?
If there's any towns that have really stayed with you, could you let me know?
I can find good insights in impressions different from my own.
SERIF_ALEND_RELATION:
My colleague Maculata really beat into me how to carry out my jobs
with clients. Honestly, even now, I can't talk back to him.
SERIF_ALEND_TOUCH:
Hm? Curious about this body of mine?
I work on developing planets fairly often,
so I'm fairly built. Go ahead—you can touch to see for yourself.
SERIF_ALEND_TRAIN: Let's start. I'm not holding back.
SERIF_ALPHECCATHERMAE2307_APPRECIATION: Do remember that this is a trip of rejuvenation. To stay on edge so would be a terrible waste. Come, let me teach you some proper relaxation techniques!
SERIF_ALPHECCATHERMAE2307_DAILY: Pure, flowing water... Beautiful trees, lovely flowers... Oh, how different it is from Aradicia! Wonderful! Experiencing differences for one's self is the joy of traveling!
SERIF_ALPHECCATHERMAE2307_EVENTA: A king of legend, establishing a city on his own... Goodness, what an exciting tale! Haha! Just thinking about it fills me with excitement and lust for adventure!
SERIF_ALPHECCATHERMAE2307_EVENTB: Hm? What is in this stall? It smells so wonderful! And this glowing wooden-sword souvenir, how fascinating! What? I am standing out too much? Perhaps you are right...
SERIF_ALPHECCATHERMAE2307_EVENTC:
Oh? A mission?
Is this how wizards of other worlds do their jobs?
Well, sounds interesting! Allow me to aid you!
SERIF_ALPHECCATHERMAE2307_EVENTD:
Ahh, truly impressive results!
Wonderful work on your quest—a very pleasing endeavor!
I am now one journey memory richer!
SERIF_ALPHECCATHERMAE2307_HERO: How wonderful it is to face seriously the sad and distraught! I wish to invite this hero to my kingdom and... Oh, right, of course, I'm on vacation right now.
SERIF_ALPHECCATHERMAE2307_PLAYER: As two traveling together, I wish to know you not as a mage, but as a person. Ah, I know! Let us speak as we bathe, then!
SERIF_ALPHECCATHERMAE2307_RELATION: Alchemy, a science that seeks true perfection... I hear it had its researchers in my kingdom in the past. I am a touch curious about what it is capable of.
SERIF_ALPHECCATHERMAE2307_TOUCH: Haha, why the hesitation? The formality? Right now, I am just as much a tourist as you are! Let us rub shoulders and enjoy our journey!
SERIF_ALPHECCATHERMAE2307_TRAIN: I cannot hold back. I trust you are ready?
SERIF_ALPHECCATHERMAE2307_TRAINED: Guh! To think you would have me so!
SERIF_ALPHECCA_APPRECIATION: The mages of Earth certainly have much work to do, and I respect your efforts from the bottom of my heart. Do try not to push yourself too hard, however.
SERIF_ALPHECCA_DAILY: Ah, Operator, there you are! Oh, come, no need to bow every time. You're on your way to work, are you not? Would you allow me to help you?
SERIF_ALPHECCA_EVENTA: Hm. What a terribly fascinating, mysterious labyrinth. Too often am I chained to my throne—could I be allowed a moment to desire and indulge in adventure?
SERIF_ALPHECCA_EVENTB: Hm, a mysterious white knight, you say? Who could he be? What? I always seem to disappear when he is present? My, that sounds like a coincidence if I've ever heard one.
SERIF_ALPHECCA_HERO: He fights by striking balls of flame with his stick? What fascinating, mysterious techniques that youth uses! As a fellow commander of flame, I wish to learn from him.
SERIF_ALPHECCA_PLAYER: Operator, you seem to never skip out on effort. Haha, well, I am quite fond of those who put the work in. Your way of life is one I quite respect.
SERIF_ALPHECCA_RELATION: Why do I favor Rutilix so, you ask? If I had to say, seeing the single-minded zest he approaches life with reminds me of my younger days.
SERIF_ALPHECCA_TOUCH: Oh! Haha, have you taken a fancy to this frame of mine? Very well, indulge to your heart's content. I have not been touched like this since my ascension.
SERIF_ANDREWLOSTANCIENTS2208_APPRECIATIO: Detecting an increase in fatigue levels. Is this that summer exhaustion I hear about? Human activity improves with appropriate rest, so how about we walk by the lakeside?
SERIF_ANDREWLOSTANCIENTS2208_DAILY: Master! Do you have a free minute? I've been practicing guitar lately, and I've finally done a song that sounds good! Want to listen to it?
SERIF_ANDREWLOSTANCIENTS2208_EVENTA: Hisaki is an inventor, right? I can't believe he can make fighting robots and devices that let you breathe underwater! I wonder if he can do maintenance on me?
SERIF_ANDREWLOSTANCIENTS2208_EVENTB: What a strange cobalt-blue lake! With the water this clear, we should be able to find the guardian in no time. Let's start searching!
SERIF_ANDREWLOSTANCIENTS2208_HERO: Did you see Hisaki's new Parallel Weapon? Just the sight of him doing teamwork with his underwater drone... That's the kind of bond I want, Master!
SERIF_ANDREWLOSTANCIENTS2208_PLAYER: I heard some individuals are poor at swimming, but how about you, Master? How about an underwater walk? I'm fully waterproof, so I can provide swimming support!
SERIF_ANDREWLOSTANCIENTS2208_RELATION: So, Gaius is searching for his roots. Me, I can't even remember anything from when I was manufactured. Is the past really that important to humans?
SERIF_ANDREWLOSTANCIENTS2208_TOUCH: Oh, curious about this new form of mine? Well, I'm really glad to have such a nice new body on me now! Think you could touch it some more? To see how nice it is?
SERIF_ANDREWLOSTANCIENTS2208_TRAIN: Let's build a better bond with training!
SERIF_ANDREWLOSTANCIENTS2208_TRAINED: Guh... This is how strong our bond is!
SERIF_ANDREW_APPRECIATION: What's the matter, Master? Tired? What was that action you performed when tired... "Sleep," was it? I've always wondered about it. How about we sleep together?
SERIF_ANDREW_DAILY: Hey there, Master. How are you doing? Me? I'm always full of energy—I am a machine, after all. Come on, let's get to saving lives today.
SERIF_ANDREW_HERO: A machine hero, just like me. He's thrown out his emotions and embraced his mechanical nature. Is that how robots should truly be?
SERIF_ANDREW_PLAYER: Sorry, I don't know much about this job. I can't even transform on my own. I've got so much to learn, Master... and I want to learn it with you.
SERIF_ANDREW_RELATION: That human who's always hitchhiking—he's so full of life and vitality. I really like him. He asked me to do some pro wrestling, but... could I pull it off?
SERIF_ANDREW_TOUCH: Curious about this body of mine, Master? It's really well made, so gaze and poke all you want. Here, I'll take off my clothes, too... Hm? Stop? Why?
SERIF_ANDREW_TRAIN: Would you join me on a few little tests?
SERIF_ANDROIDSOLDIEREARTH_APPRECIATION: You look rather pale. Detecting signs of overwork. Please consider this unit's massage program. My routines to work pressure points will reduce fatigue by 37%.
SERIF_ANDROIDSOLDIEREARTH_DAILY: Today's order is the search and recovery of subject's puppy. Understood. Please input data. This unit will find requested biological target as quickly as possible.
SERIF_ANDROIDSOLDIEREARTH_EVENTA: This unit strongly suggests you leave weapon handling to it. Your orders will be carried out with statistically optimal actions.
SERIF_ANDROIDSOLDIEREARTH_HERO: Most heroes fight as themselves, without use of mechanical bodies. As such, they cannot be repaired. Neither this unit's systems nor subsystems can comprehend.
SERIF_ANDROIDSOLDIEREARTH_PLAYER: Commander, you are always swift to grasp the situation and dole out orders. How did you attain such powers of calculation? It... is not? Experience and... guts...?
SERIF_ANDROIDSOLDIEREARTH_RELATION: We android soldiers are able to coordinate so rapidly because we need no language to share information. Camaraderie? This unit does not understand.
SERIF_ANDROIDSOLDIEREARTH_TOUCH: O-Oh. Is something the matter, Commander? Is there an issue with how this unit's parts have been welded? This unit feels a... heat where you touched, and wonders why.

SERIF_ANNA_APPRECIATION: Ohmygosh! Oppy, you're looking real tired! Here, I bought, like, so much chocolate. Wanna eat together? You like chocolate, right? Say ahhh...
SERIF_ANNA_DAILY: Isn't there, like, no reason not to do what you want? If it's something you've thought about, you gotta, like, go for it! Oppy, c'mon, let's go on that trip!
SERIF_ANNA_EVENTA: Whoa, like, serious? A chocolate festival? They got those?! I hope the festival club sticks around! Haha, we're really living it up and living young now, huh?
SERIF_ANNA_EVENTB: Like, isn't the practice of expressing your feelings to someone through chocolate super cute? Think I'll make some myself! It's been years, but I'll work something out!
SERIF_ANNA_EVENTC: We, like, prepared a super fancy prize for the big event at Chocofest! I worked super hard and brought the teachers in, too, so you've gotta get 'em all!
SERIF_ANNA_HERO: Like, I wonder if Suhail'll stop doing bad stuff? He's a pretty passionate dude and stuff, so like, he should just take his people and be a hero or something.
SERIF_ANNA_PLAYER: I really love seeing people who are super into and enjoy hobbies and crafts and stuff. Really makes me happy to see! What are you into, Oppy? Tell me everything!
SERIF_ANNA_RELATION: Like, why do people not like Phein? He's got such a nice aura to him! I got a candy from him too, by the way—strawberry! It was real good!
SERIF_ANNA_TOUCH: Hm? What's up? Feeling lonely? Like, the best thing to do then is have fun—with dancing, of course! Take my hand. Let's bust a move!
SERIF_ANNA_TRAIN: I'll show you what I've got!
SERIF_ANTARES_APPRECIATION:
Thank you for today, Heaveneye. It is thanks to your efforts
that we are able to shine as we do. Please, allow me to reward you for your hard work.
Anything that I can do, I shall do it for you.
SERIF_ANTARES_DAILY:
Ah, Heaveneye, do take a look at this. The crops I brought back from Earth
have finally grown to maturity. I would love for you to eat one
and feel for yourself the vibrant radiance of life.
SERIF_ANTARES_EVENTA:
I am glad to see you, Observer with Heaven's Eye.
We welcome you with open arms. Please, be my guest
and gaze over the utopia we strive for.
SERIF_ANTARES_EVENTB:
You Observers are the very light that shines throughout this world.
That sacred light of yours, which gives shape even to that which has been lost to the world,
we wish to protect it. To see it shine forevermore.
SERIF_ANTARES_EVENTC:
Ah, quite impressive. I see there are rewards for our efforts.
A good system. Let us make full use of it.
All is for the sake of our universe and its future.
SERIF_ANTARES_EVENTD:
Quite the harvest you've reaped, Heaveneye. Think of how many
lives we can guide into the future with all of this.
I cannot fall behind, then—allow me to till the soil for them.
SERIF_ANTARES_HERO:
A people blessed by great trees, are they? Indeed, I do feel a
verdant breath about those strange abilities of his. Are those ears and hair
on his head? They look like leaves. I wonder if he will fruit or flower?
SERIF_ANTARES_PLAYER:
You are able to observe that which the average Observer has no hope of seeing,
and I believe that has caused you much strife. That is why
with utmost respect have I christened you Heaveneye.
SERIF_ANTARES_RELATION:
To take deep pride in one's duty and give up all to serve another...
I believe his way of life is rather admirable.
If his words are to be believed, I imagine his master must be blessed indeed.
SERIF_ANTARES_TOUCH:
Oh my. Feeling out the shape of my dream, are you?
This contact with you is one that pleases me. It allows me to feel that I am truly here.
Do continue. Be my guest.
SERIF_ANTARES_TRAIN: Allow me to preach my gospel.
SERIF_APPRENTICEEARTH_TRAINED: I got ahead of myself! Sorry!
SERIF_APPRENTICEFIRE_TRAINED: I got ahead of myself! Sorry!
SERIF_APPRENTICELIGHT_TRAINED: I got ahead of myself! Sorry!
SERIF_APPRENTICESHADOW_TRAINED: I got ahead of myself! Sorry!
SERIF_APPRENTICEWATER_TRAINED: I got ahead of myself! Sorry!
SERIF_APPRENTICE_APPRECIATION:
Great job today! Here, I brought you some tea.
Oh, and here's some of the food a coworker gifted me with.
I know you're always giving a hundred and ten percent, but how about a nice snack break sometimes? Heh heh!
SERIF_APPRENTICE_DAILY:
Schedule, checked! Camera, all in order! Outfit, perfect!
Good morning, Operator! Looking forward to another day of thoughtful instruction!
SERIF_APPRENTICE_EVENTA:
A big hello to everyone who came out to see us!
Let's get cheering and hype up this Hero show together!
Time to go live action!
SERIF_APPRENTICE_EVENTC:
Oh! Hey! I know what this is! This is one of those "mission"
things I see the veteran Heroes doing on the field sometimes!
Whoa, we can try it too?! Thanks! Thanks so much!
SERIF_APPRENTICE_EVENTD:
Congrats on finishing the mission! Uh, hey, I gotta say.
You looked super familiar with this kind of stuff!
I guess that's the difference experience makes, huh? Seriously, seriously cool.
SERIF_APPRENTICE_HERO:
The veteran Heroes I know always look so cool, both on and off the battlefield!
I wanna hurry up and build experience so I can be like that!
SERIF_APPRENTICE_PLAYER:
What kind of stuff are you made of, Operator?!
No one does Hero observation up close—that takes crazy courage!
You treat the field like you own it too—couldn't respect you more!
SERIF_APPRENTICE_RELATION:
Sure, my coworkers are rivals, y'know?
But it's not like we're at each others' throats, or anything!
It's more like we're... war buddies surviving the brutal front lines, yeah?
SERIF_APPRENTICE_TOUCH:
W-What's gotten into you? Is this practice for handshake meets? Maybe hug meets?
I mean, th-that's super far off for me, right? But if it's something you want, then...
h-here goes!
SERIF_ASTARLASTRESORT2506_APPRECIATION:
You look like you're pushing yourself a little too hard.
Allow me to take over for you at work today.
Don’t debate this, just hand it over. Hand it over and rest.
SERIF_ASTARLASTRESORT2506_DAILY:
I came out to the sea with them long, long ago.
Yeah. Seeing the sea with you like this
is something I'm sure I'm not going to forget either.
SERIF_ASTARLASTRESORT2506_EVENTA:
I-If it's all right with you, want to try riding the waves? It's a little different from working the sled, but I'll teach you how to do it.
Or perhaps we could share a board...? R-Really, you will?!
SERIF_ASTARLASTRESORT2506_EVENTB:
The children of this island have a sadness to them—all the more reason I wish to bring them warmth.
I'm sure that they would have done the same.
SERIF_ASTARLASTRESORT2506_EVENTC:
A stamp rally? I know the basics, of course.
If you're in, then... I guess I would not mind joining in, myself.
It is okay to enjoy events like these on occasion. Good, even.
SERIF_ASTARLASTRESORT2506_EVENTD:
I had not expected you would gather up this many stamps.
I suppose I should expect nothing less from an Observer.
I'm sure your Santa training pulls its weight too.

Enoshiman dances to his own special beat.
I respect him for working so hard to carry out his role too.
He does, however, look like he's pushing himself too hard as well.
SERIF_ASTARLASTRESORT2506_PLAYER:
I realize that you've built up an impressive resume of experience
as an Observer on the field. I just don't want you to put yourself out there too much.
If anything happened to you, I'd just...
SERIF_ASTARLASTRESORT2506_RELATION:
Yohack. Hm. I see. He has Santa potential.
All it'll take is a little training and he'll be first class.
All right. Locked on.
SERIF_ASTARLASTRESORT2506_TOUCH:
Gah?! What is the meaning of this?!
No, it's not that I dislike it, I...
There's absolutely no reason I wouldn't be happy after being touched by you.
SERIF_ASTAR_APPRECIATION: Listen up, knucklehead. It's good to go hard, but go hard right. If you're too worn out when it counts, this won't mean anything. Take enough breaks and drink enough water.
SERIF_ASTAR_DAILY: What do I spend my time doing? Training and prep, obviously. Vocals, lifting, picture book reading... Not a moment to stop. Santa wasn't built in a day.
SERIF_ASTAR_EVENTA: Heh. Let's see those smiles, rookie, because Christmas is coming. The day we finally get to do our duty. Now, watch my example first.
SERIF_ASTAR_EVENTB: Monomasa. Passes, I see potential. Polaris. Not bad, I can see it. You... don't worry. I'll train you up.
SERIF_ASTAR_EVENTC: Missions, you say? I do see milk among the rewards. Pick them all up. They belong to Santa. Then, shift them into value.
SERIF_ASTAR_HERO: Monomasa is the hardest of the rookies for me to read. Can definitely physically play the part of Santa, but... something else is in there. Who... What is he?

SERIF_ASTAR_TOUCH: Gyah! W-Why, you... You've got real guts, poking your instructor like that. Glad you've got that kind of energy, though. Drop and give me ten.
SERIF_ASTAR_TRAINED: Gh... Enough! You don't get to go on offense!
SERIF_ASTOSIS_APPRECIATION: I just heard a sigh. You're not tired, are you? Well, I took the liberty of finishing up all your work in your stead, so go ahead and rest. Haha—don't think you can object.

SERIF_ASTOSIS_EVENTB: Oh, I certainly have heard of you—an excellent operator, they say. The watch was pleased they could leave security to you, and I'm expecting great things.
SERIF_ASTOSIS_EVENTC:
Sorry, but allow me to request another job.
I'd like you to recover the corsages to be handed out to the guests.
You'd be paid, of course. What do you say?
SERIF_ASTOSIS_EVENTD:
An excellent job, just as your reputation has said.
Here is your compensation, as promised.
I'm glad to see how well you've done, personally.
SERIF_ASTOSIS_HERO: Gaisei is a villain who seeks strength, is he? He speaks with outward politeness, but his words hide such barbs. As a fellow orator, I say be cautious around him.
SERIF_ASTOSIS_PLAYER: We're both in businesses where trust is premium, yes? So I'd like to know more about you, if possible. I will be fair, of course, and share of myself in kind.
SERIF_ASTOSIS_RELATION: I can hardly believe Yohack has become a hero... Ah, no, I was simply pleased to see that an old neighbor was doing well. And that I could meet again one who was so fond of me.
SERIF_ASTOSIS_TOUCH: Oh-hoh, that was a surprise. A hug from you? A little embarrassing, yes, but I'm glad. Me next, though. Any objections?
SERIF_ASTOSIS_TRAIN: I'll go first. You're first next round.
SERIF_ASTOSIS_TRAINED: S-Such force...! Just wait for next time!
SERIF_BARRELHEROFESTA2109_APPRECIATION: Howdy there, partner! How 'bout a nice change of pace with a swim? It's summer, after all, so let's go!
SERIF_BARRELHEROFESTA2109_DAILY: I may not look it, but I'm a real summer kind of guy. Beach volleyball, swimming... I really love that stuff! Huh? No, you got it all wrong, I don't doggy paddle!
SERIF_BARRELHEROFESTA2109_EVENTA: Heh heh, well, whatcha think? Looks pretty good on me, don't it? With these new duds and this handsome face, I'm gonna be fighting 'em off with a stick! H-Hey, no laughing!
SERIF_BARRELHEROFESTA2109_EVENTB: Nothing like a nice festival, you know? Always gets me excited. Hey, partner, how 'bout we have us a look-around at the stalls after the battle? I could eat a horse!
SERIF_BARRELHEROFESTA2109_HERO: Chief's such a reliable commander! I hear he really looks up to this "Zhuge Liang" tactician! No idea who that is, but he's gotta be something!
SERIF_BARRELHEROFESTA2109_PLAYER: You like summer, partner? I love summer! Can't get enough of it! I've been vibratin' for the past few minutes from how much I want to swim... Gah, just wanna dive in!
SERIF_BARRELHEROFESTA2109_RELATION: Furlong's pretty introverted, but he's a good guy, really! We've been hitting the pool together lately, but the fire on his head, it just... never goes out, even underwater! Wild!
SERIF_BARRELHEROFESTA2109_TOUCH: Gwah?! W-What is it, partner? Do you wanna get all wet, too? Well, in that case... Get ready for my torrents of justice!
SERIF_BARRELHEROFESTA2109_TRAIN: No crying if you get all wetted up!
SERIF_BARRELSTELLA2510_APPRECIATION:
You're looking pretty tired, Partner. Oh, I know! Here,
hop on my back. No need to be shy! Anytime and all the time, I'll be there
to support you!

The stall lights, the music, the delicious smells!
Gahh, I can't wait to check this place out!
Come on, Partner, let's visit everything!

Takoyaki, yakisoba, shooting galleries and water balloons—
we got all the festival classics here! I love it!

The holiday lights and people enjoying themselves... Seeing a Japanese
festival like this just brings me back to being a kid, y'know?
Wonder if Grandma's doing all right.

Time to market like crazy with the Exciting Holiday Set!

just like me! I could go for some grub.

I'd say we did a great job advertising! You sure went all out, Partner!
Huh? I got some, uh, sauce around my mouth?

The things I think up, you make real, partner.
That's great! I mean, it's like we're, you know,
special buddies or something.

I'm practically jumpin' for joy over here with Turbak pointing me toward an

Hah! I knew you'd get curious about this super cool suit I got

SERIF_BARREL_APPRECIATION: Howdy! Good job today, partner! And if you see anyone in trouble on the way home, send 'em on down to the police box! I'll solve their problem in a jiffy!
SERIF_BARREL_DAILY: Howdy there, partner! Come on, let's hurry on to the scene! The scent of crime and villainy awaits!
SERIF_BARREL_HERO: That bombslinger really is something! The scent of explosions, of gunpowder... feels like a real kindred spirit! Huh? Birds of a feather? I'm a Canis, not a bird!
SERIF_BARREL_PLAYER: Hey, partner! You're new, I'm new. We're new! We're in it together, so let's really get to it and aim for the top!
SERIF_BARREL_RELATION: The detective's always sighing, you know? Guess that middle management stuff's a real pain. Huh? I'm part of what makes it tough? You gotta be kiddin' me!
SERIF_BARREL_TOUCH: Uwah, th-that really tickles! C'mon, partner, cut it... Eheh... Haha... Maybe not...
SERIF_BARREL_TRAIN: Don't worry. I'll try not to hit you!
SERIF_BARTE_APPRECIATION:
Hey, you all right? You look like the burnout's come for you.
Look, people are just like swords, yeah? You keep heating them up and they get brittle.
How about you go and cool off a bit?

Operator, check this out!
This here's the most beautiful blade I've ever made, a masterpiece of...

This weapon here has some crazy edge to it! The beauty of the tip

Hm? Wait, this wasn't made in this world, was it?

Can't believe we'd run into someone from my world here.
Talk about your crazy coincidences, huh?
But me, there's someone I seriously want to get back and see.
SERIF_BARTE_EVENTC:
Now this is a serious selection!
So, all we've gotta do is hit up these quotas, and all this is ours?
I like the sound of that! Let's get to it!

Great job! That was totally worth the effort, huh?
Heh, with all this stuff, I can forge all the weapons we want!
Now then, where to start, where to start!

Those swords of Hydoor's, let me tell you...
They're crazy beautiful, but the way he uses 'em is super artistic too.

You're learning your craft and trade from someone too?

Whoa, what's gotten into you? Oh! Oh, I get it!

SERIF_CANES_APPRECIATION:

I massage my parents' all the time back home,

and I've always been interested in what Earth schools are like.

Heroes everywhere I turn...
and they're all people I've seen on streams!

Now, where to start...

Phew, it's over. Good job today. You were awesome, Operator!

Goro built the house we live in now.

I wonder if he'll work with me when I grow as a hero myself.

To an operator, what's an easy kind of hero to work with?

but our builds and strength are so different.
Sure, he's my dear brother, but that just makes it feel more complicated.
SERIF_CANES_TOUCH:
You do get kind of odd with personal space sometimes, Operator.
You might want to not pat people's heads all that much...
Oh! I don't dislike it, but give other people a break, okay?
SERIF_CANES_TRAIN: I'm quite strong when I put my mind to it!
SERIF_CANES_TRAINED: Whew, hahh, phew... I-I can keep going! Let's!

SERIF_CROWNE_TRAINED: Got guts using me as your test subject!

Huh. Say, m'liege, is it just me, or have you gotten better lately?

gotten back on the ninja road. Hell, I probably woulda been dead.

Whoa whoa! There you go again, m'liege!

SERIF_DANZO_HERO: Hitty's crazy cute, you know? She worked so hard to learn and perform the crazy moves I came up with, too... Gosh, I just love 'er!

SERIF_DANZO_TOUCH: Oh-hoh! That's m'liege! Grabbin' a pro ninja like that is no easy task, nothing an amateur can pull off! Want me to pay you back the same as a reward? Hm?
SERIF_DENEBORA_APPRECIATION:
オマエは何故いつも、無茶ばかりしているんだ…。
ほら、オレに手伝える事があるなら素直に差し出せ。
これでもバイト経験は豊富な方だ、信じろ。
SERIF_DENEBORA_DAILY:
来たか、オペレーター。さあ、仕事に行くぞ。
…ああ、これか？払い下げ品の軍用レーションだ。
少々色は悪いが、まだ食える。オマエも食うか？

宇宙船は壊れる、獲物は狩り逃す、おまけに外惑星
との交信が困難とは…何でいつもこうなるんだ。
オマエと再会できたのが、せめてもの救いだな…。
SERIF_DENEBORA_EVENTB:
父親の威光というものは、往々にして子の心に
影を落とし続けるものだ。だからオレは、あいつの
気持ちが良く分かる。まるで、我が身のようにな。
SERIF_DENEBORA_EVENTC:
これは、報酬のリストか？…なるほど、悪くない
レートじゃないか。支援物資はあるに越したことは
ない、片っ端から潰していくとしよう。
SERIF_DENEBORA_EVENTD:
よし、なかなかの成果だな。これなら目標の打倒も
そう遠くないだろう。オペレーションはオマエに
任せる、どうか上手く使ってくれよ？
SERIF_DENEBORA_HERO:
思考力は発展途上だが、観察力や身のこなし、
武器の扱いは一級品。それに何より…守るべき者が
明確だ。ステリオはきっといい猟犬になるだろう。
SERIF_DENEBORA_PLAYER:
話を聞いていると、オマエもなかなかに不運だな…。
安心しろ、ニンゲンちょっとやそっとじゃ死なん。
お互い、強く生きていこうじゃないか…ハァ。
SERIF_DENEBORA_RELATION:
フラミーお嬢様には、今でも頭が上がらん。何せ、
ライセンス試験の再開まで、住処も仕事も全て面倒
見てくれたからな。恩返しが出来ればいいんだが…
SERIF_DENEBORA_TOUCH:
うおっ！？やめろ、角に触ろうとするんじゃない！
顎や尻尾ならまだしも、そこを刺激されるのは
本当に苦手で…ぐっ、あっ、うおぉっ…！？
SERIF_DENEBORA_TRAIN: オマエの本気を、オレに見せてみろ。
SERIF_DENEBORA_TRAINED: オレもまだまだ、って事かァッ…！？
SERIF_DIGRAM_APPRECIATION: I have heard that the organic body suffers performance losses with fatigue, Master. I would ask that you rest soon.
SERIF_DIGRAM_DAILY: You're 34 seconds late, master. You need to arrive precisely on time. Let us immediately head to work, then, to make up for this time loss.
SERIF_DIGRAM_HERO: Why would a mechanical life form seek an organic body? I cannot understand. And yet... seeing that technique in battle, that drive, it rustles my emotions for reasons I cannot grasp.
SERIF_DIGRAM_PLAYER: Master, I believe you require more time for skill acquisition. To enter battle while inexperienced is to ask for grievous injury. I ask that you think of your own safety first.
SERIF_DIGRAM_RELATION: A ship needs precise maintenance if it is to run on time, and I admire her skill in mechanical care. Though, admittedly, I would never let her work on me.
SERIF_DIGRAM_TOUCH: Does your physical contact with my body hold some sort of meaning? I cannot understand it, though I do feel the warmth of your hand.
SERIF_DIGRAM_TRAIN: I request you cooperate with my test flight.
SERIF_DIVER_APPRECIATION:
You're looking pretty pale. Feeling seasick?
Times like these, you want to go up on deck and get a big lungful of fresh air.
C'mon, I'll lend you my shoulder. Let's up topside.
SERIF_DIVER_DAILY:
Today's mission is finding a ring in the sea, is it?
It may be like searching for a needle in a haystack,
but we can't let a dear memento get claimed by the waves!
SERIF_DIVER_EVENTA:
Decide on if you want to hire me after seeing me work.
I'll say this now, though—when it comes to underwater work, no one's beating me.
Here goes!
SERIF_DIVER_EVENTC:
Ah, I see. The rewards change based on how done the work is, huh?
Efficiency underwater is my specialty, so leave it to me!
If we team up, there's no way we won't get results!
SERIF_DIVER_EVENTD:
Heh, I knew your operating was the real deal!
We got that done in record time.
Hope we can work together again sometime!
SERIF_DIVER_HERO:
There are some folks out there who can do perfect work no matter the place,
but Heroes are all about the right skills in the right niche.
That's why I drive my diving skills to perfection.
SERIF_DIVER_PLAYER:
Your powers of observation are incredible. You don't even need
a marine drone to see my operation through.
I'm truly honored to be able to work with someone like you.
SERIF_DIVER_RELATION:
The iron rule of the sea is to dive in pairs!
The water's a lot more dangerous than the surface,
so a good diver needs a buddy to rely on. A buddy like you.
SERIF_DIVER_TOUCH:
Hm? Why the sudden hug? I'm not saying I don't like it, but...
Ah, nothing. Just keep what I just said between us, all right?
SERIF_ESPERDICA_APPRECIATION: Your coffee. I picked out a bit of a sweeter blend, since you seem rather tired. Hm? The puppy? That is latte art of a wolf. Cute, isn't it?
SERIF_ESPERDICA_DAILY: Haha. Never seen an espresso machine before? To a barista such as myself, it's an old, trusted comrade. Here, let me make you a cup. Please, enjoy.
SERIF_ESPERDICA_EVENTA: Welcome to the Galactic Railway Cafe Lounge. Would you like a spot of coffee to relax with? The aroma is second to none. Why, simply being near it has relaxed me, and I'm not even drinking it.
SERIF_ESPERDICA_EVENTB: Could you tell Yoshiori that there is delicious cherry pie to be had at the restaurant? I'm sure he'll like it. Just my intuition, let's say.
SERIF_ESPERDICA_EVENTC:
おやおや、新しいお仕事の依頼ですね。
では、取り掛かる前に熱いコーヒーをどうぞ。
頭が冴えて、集中力を高めてくれますよ。
SERIF_ESPERDICA_EVENTD:
追加業務の達成、お疲れさまでした。頑張って
下さった貴方に、どうかサービスさせて下さい。
カフェエリアで食事などはいかがですか？
SERIF_ESPERDICA_HERO: Hm. Tabit is made up of nanomachines, yes? Does he drink luxury beverages like coffee? My profession, you see, has me always thinking of the proper beans for people.
SERIF_ESPERDICA_PLAYER: Your job is to know people well to give them precise orders, and my job is to know beans well to brew splendid coffee. Similar, are they not? We match!
SERIF_ESPERDICA_RELATION: Coffee's fragrant aroma always piques the interest, and its refined taste will drop anyone's guard. Even Raizi, in the throes of deep focus...
SERIF_ESPERDICA_TOUCH: Hm? Is something the matter? Ah, you want to learn how to make drip coffee by hand? Of course, I'll teach you everything you need to know.
SERIF_ESPERDICA_TRAIN: Haha, I quite like that look on your face!
SERIF_ESPERDICA_TRAINED: Goodness, that was more than I'd bargained for!
SERIF_EXIO_APPRECIATION: Let your guard down around me like that and you might find yourself missing a head. Just kidding! I won't do a thing. Really. Looks like the exhaustion has gotten to your shoulders—let me at them.
SERIF_EXIO_DAILY: Hey there, good to see you. How about a massage? Oh, don't give me that look. Nothing ulterior going on here. A nice massage will help you focus on work, won't it?
SERIF_EXIO_HERO: That man's outward heroism... really makes a man jealous, you know? That's where I always wanted to be. I'm sure he'd make a fine ally.
SERIF_EXIO_HERO2: My feelings towards him are complex. My respect for his passion, for his ability to transform even after loss is great, yet... I lament his return.
SERIF_EXIO_PLAYER: You're an awful strange one for an Observer. Work's as green as they come, yet that power that sleeps in you... Mark my words, it'll change the world.
SERIF_EXIO_PLAYER2: That lucky star of yours shines for others, too. Really, I think it's a form of misfortune. Enjoy your pocket of peace while it lasts—never know when it'll fade.
SERIF_EXIO_RELATION: His heart's the only one I can't peer into. It's like there's nothing there, or what is there sends shivers down my spine. Was he... really born in this world? In this universe?
SERIF_EXIO_TOUCH: Oh-hoh, didn't expect you to touch me. Are you trying to intervene into my heart, as I do? Or have my masculine charms finally won you over?
SERIF_EXIO_TOUCH2: Oh? Decided to throw it all away, have we? Let me meet those expectations, then. Come on, loosen right up. Squeal or scream or moan however you'd like. While you still can, anyway.
SERIF_EXIO_TRAIN: Oh, I don't mind. I'll take you down quick.
SERIF_EXIO_TRAINED: I see... This really is incredible power!
SERIF_FARDEN_APPRECIATION:
Are you going through something, Operator?
I don't think I'll be too useful, but mind if I stick around anyway?
Uh... Oh, I know! I'll bring you a super tasty snack!
SERIF_FARDEN_DAILY:
Sorry I look like, uh, this. But don't we all just forget about
everything else when work gets busy? Besides,
laundry, cleaning... who's got time for any of that? Ahaha!
SERIF_FARDEN_EVENTA:
Thanks! I really owe it to you for showing up to help.
As you can see, the town's all choked up with steam and smoke.
And the Ether is, well... I don't quite get it, but something very bad is happening with it! I think!
SERIF_FARDEN_EVENTB:
That big clock tower over there is the town's symbol.
The square at its base is where they hold a lot of festivals and markets and the like.
It's really old, but it still works... er, is what the locals say.
Apparently it's been breaking down a lot lately.
SERIF_FARDEN_EVENTC:
Is this a work log? Wow, you're a diligent one, huh.
W-Wait, what? You want me to help too? Oh, I couldn't, you know—
I'd just get in the way! Oh? There's rewards? Well, count me in!
SERIF_FARDEN_EVENTD:
Great! That's a wrap, everyone! It's just so nice to have small, concrete goals.
If I got paid for every page I drew on the job,
I'd be so much more motivated.
SERIF_FARDEN_HERO:
Hey, Genji's, you know, one of those guys, right? What do you
call them, from Japan? Samurai? Ronin? Yeah, he's one of those guys!
He's just so cool! Like, real wabi-sabi! Huh? I got it wrong?
SERIF_FARDEN_PLAYER:
You sure are something, Operator! Observing Heroes up close
takes a lot of courage. You got to be careful, though!
One wrong move in the field and you're done, you know?
SERIF_FARDEN_RELATION:
No way! That DJ's a ninja?! And he's a cyborg too?!
That's like a package deal of stuff that kids love!
I'm so jealous!
SERIF_FARDEN_TOUCH:
Operator, think you can hold onto my arm?
There we go, like a swing! Ahaha, surprised?
You know, I've always been surprisingly strong.
SERIF_FARDEN_TRAIN: A-Are you sure? Because I'll go all out!
SERIF_FLAMIERGHOSTWOODS2204_APPRECIATION: Goodness me, you appear a little tired. Well, how about enjoying the sight of this beautiful flower I've put in a vase and taking a moment to relax?
SERIF_FLAMIERGHOSTWOODS2204_DAILY: Festival grounds are always so full of life. Would you like to go around the stalls with me? Come, tell me what festival food is your favorite.
SERIF_FLAMIERGHOSTWOODS2204_EVENTA: Simply watching these festivities is enough to make the heart flutter. Ahaha, how long has it been since I last danced, I wonder?
SERIF_FLAMIERGHOSTWOODS2204_EVENTB: I've taken the liberty of adjusting the fireworks to be launched on the last day. Oh, I simply cannot wait to witness those flowers of light taking flight!
SERIF_FLAMIERGHOSTWOODS2204_HERO: Goro is such a talented musician. The music he plays is just so gentle... like a lovely lullaby.
SERIF_FLAMIERGHOSTWOODS2204_PLAYER: Do you think ghosts are real? Ectoplasm, ignis fatuus, that sort of thing. Does it not pique your interest and make your heart flutter just a touch? Ahaha...
SERIF_FLAMIERGHOSTWOODS2204_RELATION: Lilac certainly knows his flowers, doesn't he? Some of that knowledge applies well to fireworks, so I do have much to learn from him.
SERIF_FLAMIERGHOSTWOODS2204_TOUCH: Shall I take that as an invitation to dance? Certainly, I'd love to. Do be gentle, though.
SERIF_FLAMIERGHOSTWOODS2204_TRAIN: Shall we dance for a song?
SERIF_FLAMIER_APPRECIATION: Since you're always working so hard, I borrowed the kitchen and made you some tea. What would you say to a brief respite with me?
SERIF_FLAMIER_DAILY: Hello. Perfect day out for a conflagration, wouldn't you say? O-Oh, er, nothing, nothing at all. Now then, let's get to work.
SERIF_FLAMIER_HERO: That patissier certainly is something, is she not? What sort of firepower is she working with to bake pastries with such speed?
SERIF_FLAMIER_PLAYER: Everyone and everything has their beginning. You only need to take your time and get used to things, bit by bit. That's how I got entranced by flames, myself... Ahh...
SERIF_FLAMIER_RELATION: I think I would get along with that police hero. And yes, firearms like his count for me. That flash is just to die for...
SERIF_FLAMIER_TOUCH: Oh? Is something the matter? Did I have an ember on me somewhere? Goodness, how embarrassing!
SERIF_FLAMIER_TRAIN: Let us begin the experiment, then.
SERIF_FURLONGCIRCUS2202_APPRECIATION: You seem pretty tired. Th-That was a lot of practice, after all. Would you like me to... take you home? I'm pretty used to carrying people piggyback.
SERIF_FURLONGCIRCUS2202_DAILY: H-Hey there! Acrobatics practice today, huh? Let's do our best. I know I will. I mean, I'm still scared, but...
SERIF_FURLONGCIRCUS2202_EVENTA: I can do this, I can do this, I can do this! All right, now I'm on fire! I can do this! I'll show 'em acrobatics like they've never seen!
SERIF_FURLONGCIRCUS2202_EVENTB: I ended up on stage from happenstance, and, well... I'm worried if I can actually do this well, honestly. Anything I do, I'm always afraid of blowing it.
SERIF_FURLONGCIRCUS2202_HERO: As a hero myself, I cannot let villains get away with their devious crimes! But, well, when I see Vulpecula performing so boldly for such a crowd, I get a little jealous.
SERIF_FURLONGCIRCUS2202_PLAYER: Are you doing work in the public eye? I have to pump myself up first, but I'm still bad at it. Please do share with me any surefire tricks you might know!
SERIF_FURLONGCIRCUS2202_RELATION: Yasuhiko really is something. We're almost the same age, but he's fronting the circus as ringleader! I'm sure it's not all sunshine and roses, though...
SERIF_FURLONGCIRCUS2202_TOUCH: Heheh, how's it feel? Tough and trained enough to pull off all sorts of acrobatics, this body of mine! U-Uh, pretty ticklish there, though!
SERIF_FURLONGCIRCUS2202_TRAIN: Time to pull off a huge trick!
SERIF_FURLONG_APPRECIATION: Um. Are you, er... all right? I-It just looks like you're a little tired, you know, and... Well. T-Try not to push yourself too hard.
SERIF_FURLONG_DAILY: Oh. G-Great work as usual. Uh, if you need any hot places taken care of, leave it to me. I could walk through fire if need be.
SERIF_FURLONG_HERO: Bolt of Justice, a real superhero. He's so dashing, so righteous, so daring. I've always looked up to him, even before I became a hero.
SERIF_FURLONG_HERO_APPRECIATION: You look tired, Captain! Come, on your back! I'll show you the massage techniques I picked up on the job!
SERIF_FURLONG_HERO_DAILY: Good job out there, Captain! Leave any hot missions to me! I can walk through fire if need be!
SERIF_FURLONG_HERO_HERO: Bolt of Justice, a real superhero. He's so dashing, so righteous, so daring. I've always looked up to him, even before I became a hero.
SERIF_FURLONG_HERO_PLAYER: I hear that our senior heroes gained their current glory after overcoming countless challenges! Let's do our best to match up!
SERIF_FURLONG_HERO_RELATION: Barrel's a great coworker and a war comrade. I'm always fidgeting and mumbling, but he'll drag me where I need to go. He's like a... a best friend.
SERIF_FURLONG_HERO_TOUCH: Oh! Is something wrong, Captain? Now, I do feel obligated to tell you that my body temperature is really high, so accidentally touching me might result in burns.
SERIF_FURLONG_PLAYER: I hear that our senior heroes gained their current glory after overcoming countless challenges! Let's do our best to match up!
SERIF_FURLONG_RELATION: Barrel? Y-Yeah, he's a really good guy. Personally, I like someone who'll, you know, drag me places.
SERIF_FURLONG_TOUCH: Uwah?! H-Hey, you really surprised me there! U-Um. My skin isn't too hot, is it? My temperature's really high, so you might burn yourself.
SERIF_FURLONG_TRAINED: Ghh... Didn't think I'd get this heated!
SERIF_GAISEI_APPRECIATION:
To voice my humble, unremarkable opinion, you have a worn-out look about you.
To keep your ability to command in battle at peak condition, I recommend rest
and rejuvenation. Come now, quickly.
SERIF_GAISEI_DAILY:
How I spend my time off? I have no such time.
Rest is unneeded in honing one's technique. Though, in terms of hobbies,
I do enjoy a touch of battles with those who seek to capture me.
SERIF_GAISEI_EVENTA:
An art gallery? A masquerade? What are those?
How would visiting either further my training?
Or do you mean to say helping will allow me to fight you?
SERIF_GAISEI_EVENTB:
A militia, is it? I am fascinated to see how powerful they are.
Let me get right to testing their mettle, then... Hm? Why the look?
If you wish to stop me, do so with force. Come, have at you!
SERIF_GAISEI_EVENTC:
Corsages? No interest, I'm afraid.
If one wants one, should one not simply fight and steal one?
Wait, special training? Well, this changes things.
SERIF_GAISEI_EVENTD:
Operator, I have taken care of all the corsages.
A reward? I need no such thing, so feel free to keep it.
Now to test my refined technique!
SERIF_GAISEI_HERO:
Yohack says that one does not need to be strong to be useful to others,
but to one of my talents both humble and mediocre, it is difficult to grasp.
Much can be solved with power. If one has no key, break the lock.
SERIF_GAISEI_PLAYER:
I wield a self-taught blade, but you
lead me well, despite my technique's lack of predictability or formal structure.
Utterly fascinating. What kind of life have you led?
SERIF_GAISEI_RELATION:
When I asked Nessen the secret to his strength, he told me
it was the town he had to protect. Having lost my home,
I do not think I can think as he does.
SERIF_GAISEI_TOUCH:
I have no interest in frolicking and will take my...
Hm? Mutual physical contact leads to greater shared knowledge, and potential
to reach greater heights? Very well. Touch as you will.
SERIF_GAISEI_TRAIN: You do not need to compromise in the slightest.
SERIF_GAIUSSEEKERS2502_APPRECIATION:
You look like you're pretty beat by the heat.
Tch, fine. Let's rest in the shade. No pushing yourself, all right?
I'll stick by you, so about how lying down and getting some shuteye?
SERIF_GAIUSSEEKERS2502_DAILY:
A desert planet, huh? I'm guessing it won't have any lakes to dive into.
Guess I'll try blade dancing to keep in shape.
Want to join?
SERIF_GAIUSSEEKERS2502_EVENTA:
A chocolate festival for an undying king, huh?
I was hoping to get right to exploring the ruins,
but there might be some good info to be had. Let's check it out.
SERIF_GAIUSSEEKERS2502_EVENTB:
The pharaoh of this land sure was beloved.
I hear he's even got a statue of himself around. Looks like he's got a deep connection to the ruins too.
I'd like to pay him a visit.
SERIF_GAIUSSEEKERS2502_EVENTC:
I want to explore the ruins, but I should finish up helping Valoray out.
He's gathering ingredients for the elixir, right?
Well, shouldn't be hard for you and me!
SERIF_GAIUSSEEKERS2502_EVENTD:
Not bad, not bad at all! Looks like we'll be able to wrap this up pretty quick.
Hey, let's check out the stalls before we leave.
I want to get a souvenir for Cetus. You want anything?
SERIF_GAIUSSEEKERS2502_HERO:
Valoray's always worried about other people.
Feels like he's living with someone's hopes and dreams on his back.
But it's not, well... bad to be able to push yourself that much for others.
SERIF_GAIUSSEEKERS2502_PLAYER:
What would you want if you knew all of your past?
Me... I don't have an answer yet. I want to hear what you've got, though.
I don't want you to regret things.
SERIF_GAIUSSEEKERS2502_RELATION:
I hear Vlaham is pretty sickly, so I'm surprised he came out to this desert planet.
Ah, geez, look at him—guy looks like he's about to collapse.
Let's throw in a little break, then.
SERIF_GAIUSSEEKERS2502_TOUCH:
Hm? If you want a better look at my suit, just say something.
I look just like a pharaoh! Pretty cool, huh?
You are in the presence of a king! Prostrate yourself! ... H-Hey, don't laugh!
SERIF_GAIUSSEEKERS2502_TRAIN: No whining when I beat you, all right?
SERIF_GAIUSSEEKERS2502_TRAINED: Taking your blows is my job!
SERIF_GAIUS_APPRECIATION: You're looking pretty tired. I know you. I figure you're forcing yourself through the water. Look, just rest. Danger lurks under the surface, and I'm on cleanup if you hurt yourself.
SERIF_GAIUS_DAILY: You want to know my hobby? Nothing in particular. I do like lake diving, though. Nice and calming underwater, and I get to see Cetus sometimes, too.
SERIF_GAIUS_EVENTA: Hey there. I'm Gaius, and I'll be your guide for today. Let me know if you see anyone tossing trash into the lake, all right? I'll toss them in with it.
SERIF_GAIUS_EVENTB: This lake's got a guardian that pops up on the surface to watch over things sometimes. If you're lucky, you may get to swim with them.
SERIF_GAIUS_HERO: So, Andrew can swim free if he transforms? Well, aquatic mode or not, I'm still your guide. Been worrying about what to do if he sinks and can't move.
SERIF_GAIUS_PLAYER: You don't have any memories of the past, right? Aren't you curious about yourself? Because I am about myself. I want to know why I was born, why I've got these patterns... everything.
SERIF_GAIUS_RELATION: That inventor's got a tattoo on his arm, huh? I'm not interested in why it's there or what it means, but... I've never seen one of those before. Just a little curious.
SERIF_GAIUS_TOUCH: What? You need something, or...? Oh, these patterns? You think they look cool? You're just messing with me. No one's said that to me before.
SERIF_GAIUS_TRAIN: I can't hold back. Do your best.
SERIF_GAIUS_TRAINED: Y-You weren't supposed to go that hard!
SERIF_GAMMEIRAKUSAI2304_APPRECIATION: So, how're you liking working in Kyoto? A simple change of place makes for a good change of pace, right? Say, as long as we're here, how about taking a walk along Kamogawa?
SERIF_GAMMEIRAKUSAI2304_DAILY: Gahh, head's killing me. Shouldn't have drunk that much just because the festival was on. So, I didn't do anything to you when I was drunk, right? We're good, right?
SERIF_GAMMEIRAKUSAI2304_EVENTA: A town made by spacefolk who moved down to Earth, huh? Hell, it really makes me smile to see them come to like Earth culture so much. Particularly Japanese culture.
SERIF_GAMMEIRAKUSAI2304_EVENTB: Sightseeing? Don't be ridiculous, we're here on an investigation. I can get away with a lot, but I can't... All right, fine. When this is all done, I'll go wherever with you.
SERIF_GAMMEIRAKUSAI2304_EVENTC: Extra orders when I'm already busy working? Hm? Completion Rewards? Well, I won't say no to more pay. Let's clear 'em out fast.
SERIF_GAMMEIRAKUSAI2304_EVENTD: Wahaha! Cheers to getting it all done! Huh, what? I smell like I've been through a bottle? Oh, come off it—I'm off the clock! You're joining me in drinking!
SERIF_GAMMEIRAKUSAI2304_HERO: Tch, that Tsuneaki. Always coming up on me all smiles, but squirms out of talking about what I really want to hear. Wish he'd show his true colors a bit.
SERIF_GAMMEIRAKUSAI2304_PLAYER: Hey there! Looking forward to working together again, heh heh. I can say it now after all we've been through, but I really enjoy working together.
SERIF_GAMMEIRAKUSAI2304_RELATION: That actor kid's a real hard worker for someone so small. That brattiness, too! Reminds me of when I was a runt. Not that I looked anything like that, though.
SERIF_GAMMEIRAKUSAI2304_TOUCH: What's the big idea? You wanna get a bit closer, is that it? Wahaha, I wouldn't mind! C'mere, you! Big hug! Huh? Whaddaya mean I reek of booze?!
SERIF_GAMMEIRAKUSAI2304_TRAIN: I don't care if I'm drunk. I can still take you!
SERIF_GAMMEIRAKUSAI2304_TRAINED: I-I'm beggin' ya, go easy on me today!
SERIF_GAMMEI_APPRECIATION: Hey, you look pretty run-down. Guess you've been working just as hard as me. Well, don't forget—what's key is lying' back and resting when things get this dicey.
SERIF_GAMMEI_DAILY: Hey, wait, wait! I'm not here to do a search or shakedown or anything! I'm just here to take a job!
SERIF_GAMMEI_HERO: I've been a hero and a detective for a real long time, but I can't be as self-sacrificing as he is. That's probably how a hero should be, though...
SERIF_GAMMEI_PLAYER: Being the one giving the orders takes real guts, whether you're giving them to heroes or cops. Keep at it. I'm expectin' the best from you.
SERIF_GAMMEI_RELATION: He just doesn't get any better at shooting. He shoots and shoots and shoots, and even the shots goin' wide don't hit anything. Better than collateral damage, but still.
SERIF_GAMMEI_TOUCH: Whoa?! W-What's gotten into you? Look, I haven't gotten the chance to shower proper since I've been on stakeout, so... Agh! Q-Quit it!
SERIF_GAMMEI_TRAIN: Detectives are real tough. You'll see.
SERIF_GANRAN_APPRECIATION: What's the matter? Worn out? Let me lay Iron Rule One on you: no matter how perfect the sword, it'll break down without care. You go rest. I'll take care of things here.
SERIF_GANRAN_DAILY: Iron grows stronger and tougher with repeated strikes, which is why I train myself in the same way. If I can take more than before, that means I'm stronger! Great idea, wouldn't you say? Gahaha!
SERIF_GANRAN_EVENTA: Unbelievably hot near the burner, isn't it? This is the heat that makes rock cocoa into chocolate. Now, come, let's see who can take more heat! No pushing yourself, though!
SERIF_GANRAN_EVENTB: Never filmed a show with celebrity guests before! Well, leave the guiding to me. If you get tired, there's a sauna in the village, so help yourself!
SERIF_GANRAN_EVENTC: Iron Rule Two: if it's offered, take it! Take this reward for digging up all that rock cocoa! When you're nice and rested, we're getting back to chocolate-making!
SERIF_GANRAN_EVENTD: Oh, you've cleaned me out! Gahaha, thanks! See, it was actually the villagers and the show staff who prepped the prizes. Pretty good, weren't they?
SERIF_GANRAN_HERO: Ryu went and got himself reborn when he put on the muscle. Impressive stuff, really. Doing a sport devoted to training yourself no less... I should ask him for tips!
SERIF_GANRAN_PLAYER: Pretty tough being an operator, right? You've got to carry the cameras, get caught up in fights, et cetera... If anything breaks, just tell me. I'll fix it right up for you.
SERIF_GANRAN_RELATION: You'll find reXer in the back room, gaming. Says he's doing mental training on "extra hard mode." Real admirable, pushing himself like that to get stronger!
SERIF_GANRAN_TOUCH: Oh? Trying to test my endurance, are you? Gahaha! Come on, then, go harder! Anywhere you'd like to... Hmm? You're not? Really...?
SERIF_GANRAN_TRAIN: Show me how much you can take!
SERIF_GARBO_APPRECIATION: Ah, welcome, good observer. Haha, it would appear that you have given it your utmost today, as usual. That effort, I believe, is most important.
SERIF_GARBO_DAILY: Ah, good observer, splendid to see you! How about visiting this nice restaurant that's been trending lately? Booms come and go rather rapidly—now is the time to experience it!
SERIF_GARBO_EVENTA: I wish you a happy new year, good observer. Now, this is rather sudden, but would you give me some of your time? I am utterly fascinated by these Japanese "fortune bags"!
SERIF_GARBO_HERO: Santetsu's fondness for literature gives us much to talk about, but he'll never join me in investigating cultural trends on the field. Does he not desire books on lost languages?
SERIF_GARBO_PLAYER: Your eye for culture is rather unique, I must say. It is as though you see it from a modern perspective, as well as another. As one similarly between worlds, I feel a closeness to you!
SERIF_GARBO_RELATION: How deep Shoen's love of letters is! The way he delves into the depths of calligraphy on his own never fails to impress. Somewhat different from my own literary pursuits, but that has its own appeal.
SERIF_GARBO_TOUCH: Mmm?! My, I couldn't help but let out a grunt. The current age is one of little physical contact, you see. C-Come now, don't you laugh at me! You may just face my claws of carnage!
SERIF_GARBO_TRAIN: I shall incinerate you, heart and body!
SERIF_GARBO_TRAINED: I-It would appear experience trumps knowledge...!
SERIF_GENJI_APPRECIATION:
I don't know too much about you. Hardly anything.
But I think I know a bit about how heavy your burden is.
Don't push yourself too hard, Operator. I'm here with ya.
SERIF_GENJI_DAILY:
When you're talking scaffolding and bridging, you got all sorts of weights, materials, and builds to consider.
If you ask me, the most fascinating stuff's the galactic... Ah. Hey, Operator.
I'm not boring with you with my work talk, am I?
SERIF_GENJI_EVENTA:
Is this smog or somethin'? Kinda too hazy to see anything in these darn streets.
There's a lotta realities I got no interest in seein',
but I don't want there to be too much smoke to see anything in the first place.
All right, time to get to work. Where we startin', Operator?
SERIF_GENJI_EVENTB:
Now that's a nice clock tower. Old buildings like that, see, they got
some serious cultural value. When you're repairin' the walls,
you gotta be extra careful with the scaffolding around 'em.
Ah... sorry, went on yapping about the job again.
SERIF_GENJI_EVENTC:
Don't tell me ya got work other than the investigation going on?
Tch, what you got here barely even counts as a plan—hm?
You want me to help?! Tch, fine, fine.
SERIF_GENJI_EVENTD:
All right, that's over. Hm? Hey, c'mon, you're not some kid.
Don't beg me for praise!
Fine, have a little allowance and it's onto the next thing.
SERIF_GENJI_HERO:
Don't care if they're a villain or a dashin' thief or whatever. If someone's
lost their way and is struggling, it's my job to make 'em some scaffolding to stand on.
Not the kinda thing I can say 'front of the other Heroes, though.
SERIF_GENJI_PLAYER:
That CEO's company'll likely come through for you,
but if it just so happens that you can't rely on no one no how from here on out,
you come to me. Got it?
SERIF_GENJI_RELATION:
That pup and kid doing well? And no, I don't need to see 'em again.
Having the young'uns get all familiar with me don't make me smile.
If they're livin' life all nice and carefree, though, that's all I need.
SERIF_GENJI_TOUCH:
Hey, back up! No need to get all handsy with an old man like that.
Old enough not to need a baby sitter too.
Go bother someone else who'll pay you mind.
If you don't got someone like that... do what you want.
SERIF_GENJI_TRAINED: Don't you know how to hold back?!
SERIF_GIANSARLIGHTYEARS2412_APPRECIATION:
Here, an energy bar. Eat up. What?
Getting carried away at the slightest kindness?
Listen, it's bad for me if you're too tired to move. That's all.
SERIF_GIANSARLIGHTYEARS2412_DAILY:
A night of benevolence and fortune, huh?
Tch, everyone's acting like they're on top of the world.
They don't even know how that benevolence can crush others so easily.
SERIF_GIANSARLIGHTYEARS2412_EVENTA:
Tch, the ship made a waste of a trip thanks to faulty data,
and on top of that, we need to spend Christmas with these layabouts?
Things never work out when I'm around you!
SERIF_GIANSARLIGHTYEARS2412_EVENTB:
Here, it's the data from the last Christmas event.
What's with that look? I just want to see these people struggle,
and struggle hard. That's all.
SERIF_GIANSARLIGHTYEARS2412_EVENTC:
Help with setting up the event? Who'd wanna do that—
in fact, why'd you agree in the first place?!
I'm not gonna help, you got it? No way!
SERIF_GIANSARLIGHTYEARS2412_EVENTD:
Here, take this. It's your share of the pay.
Tch, going off and putting yourself in danger like that...
How was I supposed to hold myself back?!
SERIF_GIANSARLIGHTYEARS2412_HERO:
Sensaku found a place to belong, all on his own of his own will.
It sounds good when you say it like that, but he just ran away
and happened to find a place where he did.
SERIF_GIANSARLIGHTYEARS2412_PLAYER:
I never thought I'd end up dressed as the gift-giver...
What, you want a present too?
Heh. Sure, why not. I'm looking forward to seeing what pops out.
SERIF_GIANSARLIGHTYEARS2412_RELATION:
Even if the residents are against it, he seeks the most efficient living space.
Not a bad stance for Alend.
I do hope he doesn't compromise on it.
SERIF_GIANSARLIGHTYEARS2412_TOUCH:
Hey, no grabbing. I'm a villain, got it?
You can't just approach me with your defenses down.
Looks like you need to know your place.
SERIF_GIANSARLIGHTYEARS2412_TRAIN: You'll at least be a decent warm-up, right?
SERIF_GIANSARLIGHTYEARS2412_TRAINED: Ghh, that was a fiery bout!
SERIF_GIANSAR_APPRECIATION: Heroes and villains alike need operators, so make sure you take care of yourself. Just... give that here. I'll finish this data entry for you in two minutes, tops.
SERIF_GIANSAR_DAILY: Work should be done perfectly. There's nothing better than a plan seen to completion, right? So, mind explaining why you were over sixty seconds late?
SERIF_GIANSAR_EVENTA: Hah, look at all these heroes with their Swiss cheese security. Every avatar's just waiting to get taken over.
SERIF_GIANSAR_EVENTB: Like hell they're better than me. I'll show them. I'll show this whole rotten world just how much I'm worth.
SERIF_GIANSAR_EVENTC: Didn't think I'd run into you right as the new year starts. How 'bout we pray at a nearby shrine? Make sure neither of us gets dragged into trouble this year?
SERIF_GIANSAR_EVENTD:
Seriously? Extra tasks when things are so tense?
The last thing I want to do, really, but it can't be helped.
This is just for the pay, so don't get the wrong idea.
SERIF_GIANSAR_EVENTE:
Hmph. Looks like that takes care of most of that.
You should be resting already.
I don't want you messing up your performance tomorrow.
SERIF_GIANSAR_HERO: Why are all these heroes able to score licenses? It doesn't make a lick of sense! Fools, all of them. I'll put them in their place.
SERIF_GIANSAR_PLAYER: I don't know what an operator's job is like, but you should take pride and responsibility in your work. Always aim for perfection; that's what it means to be first-rate.
SERIF_GIANSAR_RELATION: His thinking is as negative as they come. It's got no future to it. But... it was this damned world that pushed us this far. We can't stop. Not until we change it.
SERIF_GIANSAR_TOUCH: Hey, hands off! Every scrap of info on me I've spirited away in a completely isolated spot. You won't find anything on my... Hm? I'm well built? W-Well, I won't disagree...
SERIF_GIANSAR_TRAIN: I trust you've got a plan if you want to face me.
SERIF_GNOMON_APPRECIATION:
You appear tired, Chosen One. Fortunately, there are no enemies to contend with in the area,
so I must ask that you take this brief respite to rest... Hm?
You would like us to rest together? I'm afraid I have to be the one to keep watch.
SERIF_GNOMON_DAILY:
Have you finished your preparations to depart? Could you pick up the pace?
Hm? Oh, no, I bear you no ill will, it's just... Hm.
Speaking with others is such a puzzle.
SERIF_GNOMON_EVENTA:
The Chosen One has come from over the rainbow.
To think that the legends were true. Should you need anything on your journey,
do ask me for help. I have an arsenal of spells at my disposal.
SERIF_GNOMON_EVENTB:
Unyielding resolution and powerful bonds truly make people strong, I must say.
I have much to learn from all of you.
And to be honest, I am jealous of that strength you command.
SERIF_GNOMON_EVENTC:
This is quite the selection of goods.
It looks like you gain more with each objective cleared?
In that case, we need only clear them all. Let us be off, Chosen One.
SERIF_GNOMON_EVENTD:
You have done well, Chosen One. It's always good to be prepared.
After gathering such a variety of supplies, I doubt we'll find ourselves wanting on the journey.
There is no doubt in my mind we will make it back safely.
SERIF_GNOMON_HERO:
I cannot hold much of a conversation with Hydoor,
yet he has a talent for following up on the dead air I am wont to leave with his own silence.
That reliability has earned him my trust.
SERIF_GNOMON_PLAYER:
Chosen One, are you not afraid? Do you not fear interacting with so many people in an unknown land?
Hm. You're used to it, you say? I see you are blessed by quite a bit of adaptability.
SERIF_GNOMON_RELATION:
I see that Barte also has a mentor she loves from the bottom of her heart.
I know all too well what it is like to part with a dear teacher, yet if he still lives, how wonderful it would be for them to meet again.
SERIF_GNOMON_TOUCH: Gyan?! A-Ahem. Chosen One, if you would kindly pretend you did not hear that. Indeed, let us say you did not. I'm begging you. Please forget. I'm serious.
SERIF_GNOMON_TRAIN: I will not hold back. Be ready.
SERIF_GOMEISAXMASMELT2212_APPRECIATION: If you work too hard, you'll get a fever, Operator! Here, I made sweet and tasty popsicles—eat and cool down!
SERIF_GOMEISAXMASMELT2212_DAILY: Earrings and necklace here, then loincloth, and... Ta-da! It's me, snowman version! Please hug this little one when I'm not around!
SERIF_GOMEISAXMASMELT2212_EVENTA: We can't do the event if it's this warm! Everyone will be disappointed! We have to go bring the good weather back, fast!
SERIF_GOMEISAXMASMELT2212_EVENTB: Look at this! This beautiful crown they were handing out at the festival! I hear it is called a wreathe. Does it look good on me? Huh? This isn't how I use it?
SERIF_GOMEISAXMASMELT2212_HERO: Viscunam is a really, really good person! He gave me a lot of inventions, like this one! Uh, how do you use it, anyway? Gahhh?!
SERIF_GOMEISAXMASMELT2212_PLAYER: Operator, would you like to dance with me? If you put feeling into it, your body and mind will be all warm and nice! Come, give me your hand!
SERIF_GOMEISAXMASMELT2212_RELATION: Sensettia's voice is beautiful... Hearing it makes me want to dance! I want the boss to hear her, too!
SERIF_GOMEISAXMASMELT2212_TOUCH: You are interested in my new outfit? It is much warmer than it looks! Here, try putting your hand in it!
SERIF_GOMEISAXMASMELT2212_TRAIN: Haha, sure! I'll warm you up!
SERIF_GOMEISA_APPRECIATION: There is nothing better than sunbathing when tired! Good sun, nice relaxation, great warmth! Make mind and body feel much better!
SERIF_GOMEISA_DAILY: Welcome, Operator! The machine's empty! Go ahead! Hope you can find a nice new hero!
SERIF_GOMEISA_HERO: That nurse is an angel! Those big, white wings, and that healing power! Just like the god we worshiped back home!
SERIF_GOMEISA_PLAYER: You work so hard, Operator! How you strive to help all heroes, I think it's very cool!
SERIF_GOMEISA_RELATION: The boss is verrrry cute, yes! So cuddly and fluffy! So nice to be around! Next time, I'll brush him lots!
SERIF_GOMEISA_TOUCH: Hm? Is something on me? Oh, I know! You want a hug! I love hugs! Come, let me hug you tight!
SERIF_GOROGHOSTWOODS2204_APPRECIATION: Why're you lookin' so tired, boss? Want me to go and sing you a lullaby, then? Just kiddin'! Here, drink this! You'll feel better.
SERIF_GOROGHOSTWOODS2204_DAILY: I don't know flowers too well, but there's a real beauty to downin' a cup of booze while watchin' 'em. That's what's important in a festival, right? Having fun?
SERIF_GOROGHOSTWOODS2204_EVENTA: I got called over to help build up the stage. Lemme tell you, after a good day's work... Damn, there's nothing like the first drink after a good sweat!
SERIF_GOROGHOSTWOODS2204_EVENTB: What, ghosts? Sounds fishy to me. How 'bout we get started clean... Hm? You hear that? Wait, don't tell me...
SERIF_GOROGHOSTWOODS2204_HERO: Lilac's always smiling and always quiet, but he gets real heated when it's battle time. Especially when there's a Kaibutsu involved! He locks in more than anyone.
SERIF_GOROGHOSTWOODS2204_PLAYER: Damn, look at all this fine local wine! Since we came all this way, how about a cup? Glgh! Damn, love me a good festival!
SERIF_GOROGHOSTWOODS2204_RELATION: I heard Miss Flamier showed up as a volunteer. A real admirable figure, her, I'm telling you. Noble, smart, and... Huh? Was that an explosion I just heard?
SERIF_GOROGHOSTWOODS2204_TOUCH: Oh? You wanna hear me play? Fine, fine, I'll give you a performance with front-row seats. C'mon, siddown and ears open.
SERIF_GOROGHOSTWOODS2204_TRAIN: Festival prep time! Put your back into it!
SERIF_GOROGHOSTWOODS2204_TRAINED: Guh... Maybe I drank too much...
SERIF_GORO_APPRECIATION: Hey there! Doin' good? Maybe not? Look, the best way to approach life is laid back and easy, y'know? Keep chillin' and something good's bound to happen!
SERIF_GORO_DAILY: Whoa-hoh... What's up, got a job for me? Awright, I'll put down the bottle. Gettin' right on it, gettin' right on it!
SERIF_GORO_HERO: Sure, I don't look it, but I'm a big reader and I know that author. The guy can rewrite the flow of time! Wild! Maybe he could rewrite my past to... Huh. I'm outta booze?
SERIF_GORO_PLAYER: You, you're like our foundation. We can't stand up straight without you—whole house would fall down. So stand tall 'n proud, yeah? Heh heh.
SERIF_GORO_RELATION: Me and Isaribi, we go way back. Known the guy since I got all messed up and showed up on this planet, and been drinking buddies ever since. He's a good guy.
SERIF_GORO_TOUCH: Whoa, whoa, what's up? You lookin' for that kind of intimacy? Well, me, I'm not the type to chase away those who come knockin'. Take this!
SERIF_GORO_TRAIN: C'mon, help me warm up, would you?
SERIF_GORO_TRAINED: Guh... It's bangin' in my head...
SERIF_GRIGORY_APPRECIATION: All right, that's it for today. Think I'll head for lunch... Feelin' tired and sleepy, and need some food in me. Wanna join me, Operator?
SERIF_GRIGORY_DAILY: What am I doing? I'm just, you know, doing checks for drone mass-production. Pretty strict checks, too. If I mess them up, it's not going to be me in trouble, but you heroes.
SERIF_GRIGORY_HERO: Kalaski is, like... A really, really good person. When I ask him to do drone tests, he'll always come to help, even if he complains all the way.
SERIF_GRIGORY_PLAYER: You know, Operator, it feels like you sort of think like I do. A hero just can't be alone, you know...?
SERIF_GRIGORY_RELATION: Hmm? This invention... It's a real leap of logic, but it's trying to be universally adaptable? That's pretty cool. I think I'd want to meet the inventor.
SERIF_GRIGORY_TOUCH: Oh? Playing a little trick on me? Or are you... feeling lonely? Well, there, there. Let me keep you company.
SERIF_GRIGORY_TRAIN: This might hurt a bit, but be strong for me, okay?
SERIF_GRIGORY_TRAINED: Guh... I think you got me there...
SERIF_GUARDMANEARTH_APPRECIATION: 'Ey, boss, I gotta tell you, you work too hard in everything y'do. Give yourself a second to breathe, all right? I'll keep ya safe.
SERIF_GUARDMANEARTH_DAILY: Good to see ya, boss. So, who we fillin' fulla holes today? Any fingers you need snapped or heads you need popped, you leave it to me.
SERIF_GUARDMANEARTH_EVENTA: So, you're my new boss? Well, don't worry. I know I've got the scowl, but I pride myself on bein' real honest and loyal. You tell me to jump in the fire and I ask how fast.
SERIF_GUARDMANEARTH_HERO: See, us, all of us, we stick to the shadows. Makes me real jealous sometimes to see those heroes fightin' and gallivanting in the sun, all out in the open.
SERIF_GUARDMANEARTH_PLAYER: You may be young, boss, but you really know how to get things done. That's why we're all on board followin' you.
SERIF_GUARDMANEARTH_RELATION: This line of work don't work without trust. Bosses, coworkers—none of 'em last long in this world if they betray easy.
SERIF_GUARDMANEARTH_TOUCH: B-Boss?! Getting' a little friendly, are we? Well, l-let's rein in the pranks, yeah? Go too far and I might start taking you seriously.
SERIF_GUARDMANEARTH_TRAIN: Come at me with everything you got! Let's go!

SERIF_HISAKILOSTANCIENTS2208_APPRECIATIO: Hey, favorite customer of mine! Got a minute to spare? Oh, let's not talk about work! You seem pretty tired, so how about we kick back in the lounge with tea and watch the lake?
SERIF_HISAKILOSTANCIENTS2208_DAILY: Hi! Need something? Oh, you gearing up to ask me out on a date? Gosh, I just don't know, I... Huh? You want me to repair the broken AC? Ohh... Okay...
SERIF_HISAKILOSTANCIENTS2208_EVENTA: A building from an ancient civilization made with unknown materials... This! This is what I've always dreamed of! Come on, let's start exploring it right away!
SERIF_HISAKILOSTANCIENTS2208_EVENTB: Rumors of a plesiosaur sighting, and this ruin of some civilization that floated up out of nowhere... There's no way this is all a coincidence, right?
SERIF_HISAKILOSTANCIENTS2208_HERO: So, Gaius was just like me. I guess that's why I... kind of understand how he feels. I didn't have any parents until my pops adopted me, either.
SERIF_HISAKILOSTANCIENTS2208_PLAYER: Hey! You just caught me as I finished up this part of my research. How about a nice, romantic time walking along the lakesi... H-Hey, don't leave me behind!
SERIF_HISAKILOSTANCIENTS2208_RELATION: I want to look into this mysterious ancient civilization, but the technology in Andrew is really fascinating, too. If this is Earth tech we're talking about, it's from way far in the future.
SERIF_HISAKILOSTANCIENTS2208_TOUCH: Ohh, mighty forward! Well, if you want your fill of my charms, my night is o... Huh? You wanted a closer look at my new suit? Is that seriously it?!
SERIF_HISAKILOSTANCIENTS2208_TRAINED: H-Hey, I'm not done with adjustments yet!
SERIF_HISAKI_APPRECIATION: Ah! My favorite customer! Free this evening? Want to go for a drive? I've been wanting to test out my machine. Hm? Why the sudden invitation? Heh, why indeed!
SERIF_HISAKI_DAILY: Hey, hey! Check this out! Yesterday, I came up with this new inven... W-Whoa, come on, at least let me do a little presentation before work!
SERIF_HISAKI_EVENTA: I don't care how smart you are, no one gets to use my inventions like this willy-nilly and get away with it! It's going to take way more than a spanking to set this one straight!
SERIF_HISAKI_EVENTB: Heh heh, I was real popular, you know? I just got too many Valentine's chocolates to hold down! Huh? Is that why I'm looking chub...? T-Take that back!
SERIF_HISAKI_EVENTC: Another year, another Valentine's Day! Me, I love these kinds of events—they give you a perfect chance to share how you really feel!
SERIF_HISAKI_HERO: Using her knowledge of chemistry to make explosives to fight with, huh? A little scary, but pretty exciting! With how much she loves experiments, I think we'd get on well.
SERIF_HISAKI_PLAYER: Experiments are all about trying, failing, and using what you've learned for the next one. Work's the same thing! Fear nothing! Let's keep charging ahead, yeah?
SERIF_HISAKI_RELATION: Crowne's real good to have on your team, but scary as hell. You have any idea how much of a wringer she put me through back in college...? Oh! Whoa! Sh-She's not around, right? Not listening in?
SERIF_HISAKI_TOUCH: Hey, hey, no touching! Can't have you getting addicted to my wonderful fur, you see. W-Wait, quit grabbing my belly!
SERIF_HISAKI_TRAIN: Think I'll take this one out for a spin!
SERIF_HITOMISUMMERDIVE2108_APPRECIATION: Let's take a little break, partner. I bought ice cream. Would you like some? It's really good! Come on, say ahhh!
SERIF_HITOMISUMMERDIVE2108_DAILY: The sun is awfully strong today... Aren't you hot, partner, wearing all that? Would you like me to pull out the sun parasol?

SERIF_HOULEY_EVENTD:

Recording any and all Hero activity is my company's guiding principle, yes,

Grigory sure is an interesting fellow, isn't he?

Hm? What's the matter? Oh, this? I had my phone implanted,
you see. It's quite handy.

SERIF_HUCKLE_TRAINED: I guess I'm not in my prime anymore!
SERIF_HYDOORTRAVELERS2504_APPRECIATION:

Need me to give you a piggyback ride, Chosen One? Oh? Not taking charity?

wasted a perfectly good jump for joy. Huh? It sounds like I'm not confident I can earn 'em?

SERIF_HYDOORTRAVELERS2504_EVENTD:
Hah-hah! Obviously we were gonna win it big, Chosen One—we're working together!

serious killer instinct to him. There's no way he's

I gotta say, you got a ton on your plate, huh? Suddenly ending up the Chosen One and all that.

SERIF_HYDOORTRAVELERS2504_TRAINED: Darn it all! Don't think you have me beat!

SERIF_HYDOOR_DAILY: Hey, boss! How's it going? Me? Feel like I could swim a dozen laps! So, what waters are we fighting our way into today?

SERIF_HYDOOR_TRAINED: Why, you... You trying to kill me?!
SERIF_ISARIBIBATTLESHIP2411_APPRECIATION:

not bad, huh?

the cloth at the waist here can be used as a net too!
Functional beauty, made by a true artisan! I love it!

Awright, we've picked up more than enough!
