SERIF_KYOICHIVALENTINE2102_APPRECIATION: Thanks. For everything. It's thanks to you that I can really give it my all out there, eheh. And I mean, it's nice to come out and say how you really feel sometimes, right?
SERIF_KYOICHIVALENTINE2102_DAILY: Hm, what's up? Had something to talk to me about? Sure, I'll hear you out. Life troubles, love troubles... Huh? Work? What was the point of all my mental preparation, then?!
SERIF_KYOICHIVALENTINE2102_EVENTA: Happy Valentine's! Leave all your love troubles to ETL, Agent of Love! Open your heart and tell me all about your romantic woes!
SERIF_KYOICHIVALENTINE2102_HERO: He's smart, and he can fight. Brawn and brains, that's Hisaki. Still, he's probably a bit too childish to really rub shoulders with the elite.
SERIF_KYOICHIVALENTINE2102_PLAYER: You've got a lot going on, right? This job is pretty tough on the nerves. If you've got any troubles or things you want to talk about, lay them on me. I'll always hear you out.
SERIF_KYOICHIVALENTINE2102_RELATION: Subaru's always been like that. Misanthropic on the outside, but really wants a friend on the inside. Just makes me want to take care of the guy!
SERIF_KYOICHIVALENTINE2102_TOUCH: Oh-hoh, that's an awfully physical way of communicating. I like it—let's talk with our bodies, then. Let's find out where you're most sensitive!
SERIF_KYOICHIVALENTINE2102_TRAIN: All right, hit me with your best shot!
SERIF_KYOICHI_APPRECIATION: Hey, you've been pushing yourself too hard! We're not kids anymore; we've got to think about how to spend our energy. Teachers and operators have to treat their bodies right. It's all about stamina!
SERIF_KYOICHI_DAILY: Hey there! There's work to be done today, right? Well, count me in! Just, ah, let me grade these tests before we go.
SERIF_KYOICHI_EVENTA:
Hey, Happy New Year! Doing your winter break homework?
Kidding, kidding. Here's to another great year!
I bet you were cold out there—here, have some amazake to warm up!
SERIF_KYOICHI_HERO: Sometimes that kid hero really worries me! Like, is he going to school?! Is he keeping up in classes?! Ahh, I can't stop thinking about it!
SERIF_KYOICHI_PLAYER: I genuinely think you're incredible, no joke. You got thrust onto the job with no training, and that takes some serious guts. Great stuff!
SERIF_KYOICHI_RELATION: Akashi's the best of my old college classmates when it comes to popularity. Like, that balance of stiffness and softness? Just perfect, right? Huh? Behind me? Gahhh!
SERIF_KYOICHI_TOUCH: Ouugh?! Ahh, so that's how you're playing it. If you started it, that means I get to hit you with some payback, right? Heh heh... Here goes!
SERIF_LILACSUMMERNIGHT2407_APPRECIATION:
The sunlight is a touch strong.
Here. Flower-oil sunscreen, if you'd like.
I could rub you down with it, so how about lying down and relaxing?
SERIF_LILACSUMMERNIGHT2407_DAILY:
Seeing plants grow in a ruined city, seeing life find a way...
It's something I always love to see, that vitality.
SERIF_LILACSUMMERNIGHT2407_EVENTA:
This city really is a bustling one.
It reminds me a little of the flower festival back in my hometown.
Hm? D-Do I really look that pleased with all this?
SERIF_LILACSUMMERNIGHT2407_EVENTB:
Ever since becoming a hero,
I haven't had too many chances to perform in a show like this.
Ah, could I ask you to help me practice smiling?
SERIF_LILACSUMMERNIGHT2407_EVENTC:
Shall we go out and advertise the show together?
Roudin asked me to, sure, but
I want to help the others at the hotel a little bit.
SERIF_LILACSUMMERNIGHT2407_EVENTD:
Good job out there. Here, this is supposed to be a token of gratitude.
Though, to me... being able to work with you, well,
the memories of that are the best reward I could ask for.
SERIF_LILACSUMMERNIGHT2407_HERO:
I really like the photos Kalaski takes.
They really have his aroma on them—
so gentle, so warm.
SERIF_LILACSUMMERNIGHT2407_PLAYER:
Do you think we could hold hands for a little?
This kind of job is really new to me and I'm nervous,
but I feel like I can push through it if I have you watching over me.
SERIF_LILACSUMMERNIGHT2407_RELATION:
Roudin has a different scent every time I see him,
but he always changes the subject when I ask him about it.
A magician must have his secrets, he tells me.
SERIF_LILACSUMMERNIGHT2407_TOUCH:
Your hand is so cool to the touch—it's very nice.
I've been practicing for the show until now,
so I'm feeling a bit heated up and flushed... Can you stay like that for a little while?
SERIF_LILACSUMMERNIGHT2407_TRAIN: I will give you all I've got. Hope you're ready!
SERIF_LILACSUMMERNIGHT2407_TRAINED: A lot... rougher than I'd expected!
SERIF_LILAC_APPRECIATION: I see you've been working hard, but I do think you shouldn't push yourself to that degree. I'll make you some herb tea that calms the nerves, and make sure to pick out your favorite scent.
SERIF_LILAC_DAILY: My brother taught me about flowers long ago. I always love seeing people enjoy them, with their different scents and the words they symbolize. It always makes me smile.
SERIF_LILAC_EVENTA: Welcome to Wehmalt, city of flowers. Please, enjoy the flowers and plants that live with us. I could show you around, too, if you'd like.
SERIF_LILAC_EVENTB: There is a strange scent rolling through the streets. What caused it? Is it really ghosts, as they say?
SERIF_LILAC_HERO: I could smell gunpowder on Flamier, but that is because she's a hero who fights with bombs, of course. She would not always carry gunpowder around... right?
SERIF_LILAC_PLAYER: Hm? This scent... Ah, forgive me. I have a habit of savoring flower scents, and your fragrance is strangely calming.
SERIF_LILAC_RELATION: Goro and I used to work together at Labor Site. He treated me to a drink after a particularly big job one time, and we often spoke to each other after that.
SERIF_LILAC_TOUCH: Oh? Is something wrong? Ah, you're surprised that I'm so big for a florist, aren't you. It may come as a surprise, but the job has a lot of manual labor. I train to keep up.
SERIF_LILAC_TRAIN: I apologize if I go too hard.
SERIF_LOREN_APPRECIATION: Oh, you don't want to push yourself when you're tired. If you do, I'll have to take care of you in the hospital! So go and lie down and I'll bring you some dinner!
SERIF_LOREN_DAILY: Hello there! How've you been doing? Health management is part of a hero's job, after all! Well, let's give it our all today!
SERIF_LOREN_HERO: Dr. Rakta is such a reliable person, both as a doctor and a hero... Though I do wish he wouldn't get so carried away sometimes.
SERIF_LOREN_PLAYER: You really are a hard worker. I'm kind of the same since I'm also new, but when I work hard, I fail hard...
SERIF_LOREN_RELATION: That professor has such incredible stamina and vitality. He's the same age as an old man I take care of, but he's so bursting with energy! He really is something!
SERIF_LOREN_TOUCH: Uwah?! W-What's the big idea? Is touching my belly like that really that fun? Ghaha, ahaha, that tickles!
SERIF_LOREN_TRAIN: Time to get that appropriate exercise for health management!
SERIF_LOREN_TRAINED: Wait, time out, time out! This is too rough!
SERIF_MACULATA_APPRECIATION: Director, dear, how about some break time? No matter the job, overexertion begets inefficiency. You know that, yes?
SERIF_MACULATA_DAILY: Design is built atop meticulous planning and careful communication, so I'm afraid I'll have to refuse any compromises in work. That said, darling, I'll be seizing the day!
SERIF_MACULATA_HERO: Sui really does have a wondrous talent and sense of design. I intend to watch them grow and see what kind of master they become.
SERIF_MACULATA_PLAYER: Goodness, director, you're such a cute one. I'm rather fond of those who get up time and time again after failure, and you, my dear, don't know when to quit. In a good way.
SERIF_MACULATA_RELATION: Crowne has such a good heart, but I can't bear to look at her fashion sense. It feels like she's letting her looks go to waste! Such a shame...
SERIF_MACULATA_TOUCH: My, director, awfully forward, aren't we? Well, be my guest. Enjoy my body as you will—I'm quite proud of it.
SERIF_MACULATA_TRAIN: Can you keep up with my taste?
SERIF_MARFIKRUINS2104_APPRECIATION: Now hold on there, Captain. You're going to want to rest first. Don't forget that this is a team built on trust! We take care of each other!
SERIF_MARFIKRUINS2104_DAILY: Time to be off, Captain? My mind and gear are ready to go anytime! Come, let's plumb the deepest depths of the labyrinth! Let's be off! Off! Off!
SERIF_MARFIKRUINS2104_EVENTA: Come now, Captain, there's no time to hesitate! We've got all this labyrinth left to explore, all this adventure left to enjoy! Don't you worry—I'm with you!
SERIF_MARFIKRUINS2104_EVENTB: A country with a bizarre cultural system, an unknown labyrinth... It's all so fascinating! We have to explore every inch of all this!
SERIF_MARFIKRUINS2104_HERO: That youth's initiative in seeking challenge is laudable, but he feels like he's setting himself up for failure. Well, that is the privilege of the youth, and failure is the mother of success!
SERIF_MARFIKRUINS2104_PLAYER: An adventurer needs knowledge, courage, and guts. You're young; you'll pick those up over time. For now, go for the adventures you can handle.
SERIF_MARFIKRUINS2104_RELATION: That young king has an impressive approach, but I can't help but think it's a little too early for him to give up on life. Maybe I just don't get the troubles of those in power...
SERIF_MARFIKRUINS2104_TOUCH: Wahaha! Pretty sweet new costume, huh? Pretty adventurous? Why, it feels so light and airy, I fear I might catch a chill on the field... Achoo! Hm, maybe this wasn't the best idea.
SERIF_MARFIKRUINS2104_TRAINED: I can't believe I've been bested!
SERIF_MARFIK_APPRECIATION: You're too young to wear yourself out! You want to take work at a pace you can handle. Remember, the only reason you can go crazy is because you don't do it all the time, understand?
SERIF_MARFIK_DAILY: Hey there, young captain. Feel like going on an adventure with me? What, work comes first? I-I know that...
SERIF_MARFIK_EVENTA: This research trip will be a dangerous one, but we've no time to hesitate! We have to rescue the other researchers, and fast!
SERIF_MARFIK_EVENTB: You've been in Parallel Flight for all of three years! Now that's cause for celebration! You will, of course, be joining me on more adventures.
SERIF_MARFIK_HERO: An inhuman human, born of a machine planet, huh? So many questions, so many curiosities... What history, what technology, led to this? I've got to know.
SERIF_MARFIK_PLAYER: Watching you, I remember the days of my youth. I went after everything full speed, in every direction... Hm? I haven't changed much? You sure?
SERIF_MARFIK_RELATION: That puppy in your agency really is something! That's strength I could really put to work at a dig site! So... think you could lend him out a bit?
SERIF_MARFIK_TOUCH: Wahaha! What do you think? Pretty solid body for an old geezer, huh? These tough muscles are what a life of adventuring will get you.
SERIF_MARFIK_TRAIN: Don't think this'll be a walk in the park because I'm old.
SERIF_MARFIK_TRAINED: Hey! Haven't you heard of respecting your elders?!
SERIF_MELIDE_APPRECIATION: You always look so busy. If you're really tired, how about a lollipop? I have a lot on me, so I could give you a few.
SERIF_MELIDE_DAILY: You need my powers? I'll help out, then. It feels... nice to be wanted, instead of bullied and locked up.
SERIF_MELIDE_HERO: There's a really nice Kaibutsu inside Monomasa. He's... way kinder than all the adults I've met.
SERIF_MELIDE_PLAYER: You just might be a much more dangerous observer than me... but that's just a feeling I get.
SERIF_MELIDE_RELATION: I'm really grateful to Exio. If he hadn't taken me in, I might have destroyed the world by mistake.
SERIF_MELIDE_TOUCH: Oh... you're not afraid to touch me? No, I don't dislike being touched. In fact, it feels kind of... nice to feel the warmth of another person.
SERIF_MELIDE_TRAIN: Here's hoping you can keep up.
SERIF_MELIDE_TRAINED: It's a little... hard to keep up...
SERIF_MERCENARYEARTH_APPRECIATION: What's with the vacant look, chief? You're not gonna get anywhere with work looking like that. Come with me for a bit. You like drinking?
SERIF_MERCENARYEARTH_DAILY: Got a job? Someone you need me to handle for you? Pay my price and I'll deal with anyone. Wait, you... want me to deal with kids? At a hero show? You serious?
SERIF_MERCENARYEARTH_EVENTA: Want to hire me? How about a trial run first? I can see if I can trust you as a client, too. Wait... You want me to do sales? Advertising? Seriously?
SERIF_MERCENARYEARTH_HERO: Hero? Villain? It's all the same to me. I do the job I'm paid to do, and I protect myself if attacked. I do what I have to do to survive.
SERIF_MERCENARYEARTH_PLAYER: Hey, is it true you've got no memories? That's a damn shame. Bright side is there's lots of things in the past we're better off forgetting.
SERIF_MERCENARYEARTH_RELATION: Professional mercenaries don't get buddy-buddy. We share information, not friendship. Never know if they'll be the ones to shoot you tomorrow, after all.
SERIF_MERCENARYEARTH_TOUCH: What is it? I'm getting ready to move out, so bother me later. H-Hey! Listen to me, that... Gahahaha! That tickles! Er... Forget what just happened if you want to live.
SERIF_MERCENARYEARTH_TRAIN: I'll show you how a mercenary says hello!
SERIF_MERCENARYEARTH_TRAINED: Gh... Been a while since I've had it this rough!

SERIF_MERCENARYWATER_TRAINED: Gh... Been a while since I've had it this rough!
SERIF_MOKDAI2NDANNIVERSARY_EVENTA: A lot sure has happened, huh? Well, I'm going to keep doing my best, so don't hesitate to turn to me! Heh heh! Let's keep at it!
SERIF_MOKDAIMETEORITE2112_APPRECIATION: Hey there! Finished with work? You've been at it really hard all day, so let me give you a reward... Oh! I know! I've got a great cake stowed away. Want to share it?
SERIF_MOKDAIMETEORITE2112_DAILY: Oh, perfect! I just brought out the tree from the office storeroom. Want to decorate it together?
SERIF_MOKDAIMETEORITE2112_EVENTA: An emergency countermeasures HQ, huh... If this were a sentai episode, we'd have a huge base underground, and we'd fight an evil league, and... H-Hey, wait!
SERIF_MOKDAIMETEORITE2112_EVENTB: La di da, la di da... Oh! Hey! You got a bucket? I'm making a snowman. It never snows around here, so I just got real excited!
SERIF_MOKDAIMETEORITE2112_HERO: Guess what? On Narihito's new hero suit, the right arm transforms into a cannon! That's super cool! Just like in the comics I used to read in grade school!
SERIF_MOKDAIMETEORITE2112_PLAYER: Hey, got any plans for Christmas day? How about we get together and watch a sentai movie? Er, not that I mean anything particularly deep by that!
SERIF_MOKDAIMETEORITE2112_RELATION: I wonder why Borealis's music always gets me deep down in here, you know? I feel like I could listen to it forever.
SERIF_MOKDAIMETEORITE2112_TOUCH: W-Whoa, that's cold! Yeesh, you gave me a scare! Look at you. You've been messing around so much your hands are all cold. Here, I'll lend you my robe to warm up with.
SERIF_MOKDAI_APPRECIATION: Great job today! Looks like you've really let exhaustion build up, huh. Well, as a senior member of the team, let me treat you to a meal! Order anything you like!
SERIF_MOKDAI_DAILY: Oh, there you are! The camera and the gear's all good to go, so let's get to it! Off to work with smiles, let's go!
SERIF_MOKDAI_HERO: Captain Rescue's so cool! Like, dig that mask that looks like it's from an old sentai show! And his weapon, I... Uh, I could go on and on about it. Is that okay?
SERIF_MOKDAI_PLAYER: So, how's it going? Gotten used to work by now? Anything you need, come to me! I mean, I am your senior here! Heh heh!
SERIF_MOKDAI_RELATION: Akashi gets really into being a hero sometimes, even though he's always, you know, "Don't make me do work!" and all. I guess he's like a natural-born hero, then?
SERIF_MOKDAI_TOUCH: Whoa whoa, why the squeezing? Huh? I'm not as soft as you thought? How am I supposed to even answer that?
SERIF_MOKDAI_TRAIN: All right, time to give it my all!
SERIF_MONOMASAWORKOUT2312_APPRECIATION: You pull off quite a lot for being able to do so little, huh. Sorry, I'm not mocking you or anything, I'm just... recognizing all the possibilities.
SERIF_MONOMASAWORKOUT2312_DAILY: We meet again, Operator. You're glad, too? Huh. You really are a good person, you know that? Works my emotions a little. Hard to tell if I like it, though.
SERIF_MONOMASAWORKOUT2312_EVENTA: Ho ho ho, it's me, Santa! Ghh... I just can't get into it much... but this isn't half bad. Makes me feel really warm inside.
SERIF_MONOMASAWORKOUT2312_EVENTB: Do you have any candies you recommend lately? I'm thinking of a present for the others, and... W-Wait, Yoshiori, it's not for you. You're getting something different.
SERIF_MONOMASAWORKOUT2312_EVENTC: This is a list of... missions? I see. Looks like they're an efficient way of gaining supplies. How about we go through them without the instructor knowing? Heh, just kidding.
SERIF_MONOMASAWORKOUT2312_HERO: Santa, huh? A borrowed shape, but one made from the dreams of the wearer... I wonder what "Santa" is to him?
SERIF_MONOMASAWORKOUT2312_PLAYER: You... You're the person we owe our lives to. Someone dear to us. You protected my family. So, go ahead. Ask me what kind of present you want.
SERIF_MONOMASAWORKOUT2312_RELATION: I can relate a bit to how Exio feels. In fact, it makes me wonder why others, including Dolovain, can't. I mean, it must be nice, having a dream.
SERIF_MONOMASAWORKOUT2312_TOUCH: Hold on, you can't touch me. Not now. This body is Monomasa's... but I can't help but want it. Wait for a bit and let me calm down.
SERIF_MONOMASAWORKOUT2312_TRAIN: Now, what is it you desire? Let us hear it.
SERIF_MONOMASAWORKOUT2312_TRAINED: Been a while since I've moved this body. Reminds me of a lot.
SERIF_MONOMASA_APPRECIATION: Don't you think you should rest up a bit? Nothing good'll come from pushing yourself too hard. It's your only body. You should... treat it better.
SERIF_MONOMASA_DAILY: What you should call me? Just go with Monomasa. I do live with him. Besides, when the time comes, I plan on giving this body back.
SERIF_MONOMASA_HERO: I can't let him know who I really am. Until the day comes that Monomasa seeks to live of his own volition, I can't let myself be driven out.
SERIF_MONOMASA_PLAYER: I've become a kaibutsu. I've lost my hero's body, but you trusted me anyway. That's more than enough reason for me to work with you.
SERIF_MONOMASA_RELATION: Melide's a powerful observer, that's for sure. But she's still a young girl that needs protection—protection I'll provide, even if it costs me my life.
SERIF_MONOMASA_TOUCH: Pretty nice body Monomasa's got, huh? He'll lament that it's just a body made to be someone's puppet, but... give it some praise. He'll like it.
SERIF_MONOMASA_TRAIN: Monomasa wants to exercise. Help me out.
SERIF_MONOMASA_TRAINED: Guh... I'm going to spill out...!
SERIF_MORIYASU_APPRECIATION:
どした、嫌なことでもあったかい？そういう時は、
悩んで悩んで悩み尽くすのさぁ。そんでぜーんぶ
出し切ったら…ほら一杯どうだ？後は楽しみなぁ。
SERIF_MORIYASU_DAILY:
うちは造り酒屋って言ってな、蔵で醸造した酒を店で
売ってんだ。今度寄ってくれやぁ！お前さんの人生で
最高の一杯…一番酒に巡り合えるかも知れねぇぞ？
SERIF_MORIYASU_EVENTA:
事務所さんごとに新年会の趣向が凝ってんなぁ！
けど、みーんな飲んで笑って楽しんで…それは、
いつだろうとどこだろうと、変わんねぇんだなぁ。
SERIF_MORIYASU_EVENTB:
新年会の差し入れにぴったりな振る舞い酒が要る？
がっはっは、安心しなぁ！そんな時はヤマツミ
ブランドに任せとけぇい！

This brings me back. Though, I can leave the memories for later.
This is a celebration—we've got to enjoy ourselves!
SERIF_PUBRASEERRISINGMOON2410_EVENTB:
I took the hero license test myself.
I never thought I'd be the one giving the tests, but
it is a blessed thing to witness the birth of a hero.
SERIF_PUBRASEERRISINGMOON2410_EVENTC:
Looks like the ceremony's commemorative goods aren't quite ready yet.
Seems you get rewards if you help with getting them prepped,
so how about we get to it if you've got time?
SERIF_PUBRASEERRISINGMOON2410_EVENTD:
Wow, as skilled as I remember! Done already, huh?
Ah, er, oops, almost let myself get too happy there...
Anyway, let's enjoy the ceremony now that we don't have to worry about anything!
SERIF_PUBRASEERRISINGMOON2410_HERO:
I cannot understand his conduct, his constant seeking of battle.
Yet I too know the pain of finding one's dear companions gone one day.
At least, I believe I do.
SERIF_PUBRASEERRISINGMOON2410_PLAYER:
Seeing how hard you work for those around you
reminds me of how I used to be. It's worrying, but also
reassuring to see. That's probably how my friends felt, too.
SERIF_PUBRASEERRISINGMOON2410_RELATION:
He wants to become an astronaut, huh? Heh.
It's like I'm talking to my old comrades. Such a purehearted desire...
Here's hoping his dream comes true.
SERIF_PUBRASEERRISINGMOON2410_TOUCH:
Hm? Getting your pokes in on my belly? What, you want to play?
Haha, I'm just being a little silly. Anyway, get over here.
Let me touch too—I want to feel your warmth.
SERIF_PUBRASEERRISINGMOON2410_TRAIN: Ready? I'm not going to hold back.
SERIF_PUBRASEERRISINGMOON2410_TRAINED: T-To fight this hard for your friends...!
SERIF_PUBRASEER_APPRECIATION: Oh! Operator! Feeling tired? I'm about to finish up the cleaning here, so how about we have us a nice spot of sunbathing?
SERIF_PUBRASEER_DAILY: The weather's great today, so how about some fishing? Huh? Work? Oh, uh, I just remembered I still need to clean the bathroom!
SERIF_PUBRASEER_EVENTA: Whoa, I didn't know pirates had so much fun! I kinda wanna join them and dance!
SERIF_PUBRASEER_EVENTB: Sometimes I go fishing during my break times. You won't believe this rainbow-glowing fish I caught a few days back! Was killer on my stomach, but it tasted great!
SERIF_PUBRASEER_HERO: Akashi's hero suit looks functional and really comfy to work in! Oh, I remember what you'd call that. His "fit" is "lit!"
SERIF_PUBRASEER_PLAYER: I really appreciate how considerate you were towards me, what with my lost memories. I just know you'll get yours back eventually.
SERIF_PUBRASEER_RELATION: Hydoor's got such gentle eyes, but he always says the opposite of what he feels. I guess he's just a real shy guy when you get down to it!
SERIF_PUBRASEER_TOUCH: Hm? What're you poking my belly for? Oh, don't worry. Even grown-ups get worried and anxious sometimes. C'mere, get closer. Let's look at the stars together.
SERIF_PUBRASEER_TRAIN: Think you can run some practice with me?
SERIF_RAD_APPRECIATION: When you're tired, you'll want to be honest with yourself and rest up. Bikes and bodies both need good maintenance. Oh, want me to sleep by you? Heh, kidding!
SERIF_RAD_DAILY: Hey there, client! How about becoming the wind with me? Wait, what? Work? Fine, I guess I can take it.
SERIF_RAD_HERO: I may be faster than him on land, but Hydoor's the fastest in the sea, no contest. Takes to the waters like a fish, I tell you. Wait, is he a fish...?
SERIF_RAD_PLAYER: Here's my advice to you, rookie. In motorbiking and in being an operator, nothing's more important than speed! Huh? What about heroes? Same thing, speed's king!
SERIF_RAD_RELATION: That old Polaris guy really is something, y'know? I run into him on my journeys all the time. He gets drunk real easy, and one time I saw him without his mask. He... Gwah?!
SERIF_RAD_TOUCH: What's up? Oh, you wanna check out these legs for yourself? Go ahead, squeeze all you want! Their speed might just rub off on you!
SERIF_RAD_TRAIN: I'll go slow enough for you to at least follow with your eyes.
SERIF_RAD_TRAINED: Gah, my legs are gonna break!
SERIF_RAIZI_APPRECIATION: How's fortune supposed to find you with a face that tired? C'mon, drink up—I got you some lucky coffee. A big part of a fighter's job is waiting for the right chance.
SERIF_RAIZI_DAILY: Why am I so fond of gambling? Because it's the best way to feel how close fortune is. A brilliant moment, all for me. You've felt it before, right? You get it?
SERIF_RAIZI_EVENTA: A ticket for the mystery train on the galactic railway, huh? Not interested in the sightseeing tour, but a classy casino is bound to have high rates. It could be fun.
SERIF_RAIZI_EVENTB: Th-There's people who said they saw ghosts, right?! Ghosts, on the latest luxury cruise train? Th-There's no way there could... Gyahhhh!
SERIF_RAIZI_EVENTC:
キミが銀河鉄道のスタッフを手伝うなら、
オレも同行しよう。少々骨が折れるかもだけど、
ハードルが高いほど勝負師は燃えるものさ。
SERIF_RAIZI_EVENTD:
お見事だ。無事に達成できたようだね。
良い勝負を見せてくれお礼に、この報酬をカジノで
倍にしてみせるよ。…え、必要ない？
SERIF_RAIZI_HERO: I think I've been with Procy for a good long while. He's protected me from people who came after me for no good reason, too. When he decides he's taking care of you, there's just no way out of it.
SERIF_RAIZI_PLAYER: Sure is boring around here. How about a match? If by some miracle you manage to win, well... I'll give you whatever you want as a reward. How's that sound? Pretty appealing, right?
SERIF_RAIZI_RELATION: Whew, nothing beats Perdi's coffee. The flavor, the fragrance... It's fantastic. Really clears my mind. I want to drink it at his cafe, but I keep crushing the cups...
SERIF_RAIZI_TOUCH: What? You don't think I've been cheating, do you? I don't cheat. Go ahead, search me as much as you like. You won't find anything.
SERIF_RAIZI_TRAINED: N-Now that's more than I bargained for!
SERIF_RAKTATHERMAE2307_APPRECIATION: You do look a touch tired. Come, then, speak to me about anything, no matter how trivial. As a doctor, caring for your heart and mind is part of the job.
SERIF_RAKTATHERMAE2307_DAILY: Let us go to the pool! Truth be told, I've dipped in so much it has no effect on me anymore, but I would like to see how it works on you for my research!
SERIF_RAKTATHERMAE2307_EVENTA: A city of water and health! How fascinating! I have to experience and experiment with it myself right away! Come, let us swim laps in all the pools!
SERIF_RAKTATHERMAE2307_EVENTB: Glowing trees... I suppose those are normal, everyday sights for the people here. Scenery to maintain their emotional health... Oh, how deep and fascinating wellness is!
SERIF_RAKTATHERMAE2307_EVENTC:
If you gather up Herbaria, you can
exchange them for commemorative goods. You won't want to miss this!
Reap the rewards of your healthy exercise!
SERIF_RAKTATHERMAE2307_EVENTD:
Congratulations on completing your mission.
Oh? You seem a little tired. Sounds like a job for me.
I'll rejuvenate you with the fruits of my research: a perfect massage!
SERIF_RAKTATHERMAE2307_HERO: Treatment that uses alchemy, is it? Fascinating. I can only imagine how much passion and experimentation went into it... Oh, how I would love to speak of health with him!
SERIF_RAKTATHERMAE2307_PLAYER: Being an operator is a rather tough job, I hear... but you're always bursting with such energy! Would you like to share with me the secret to your health?
SERIF_RAKTATHERMAE2307_RELATION: Why, that's Professor Obsidius! He's always absent whenever I go to the university to perform checkups... What perfect timing! I'll investigate him head to toe!
SERIF_RAKTATHERMAE2307_TOUCH: Oh? Ah, of course you'd be fascinated by the medicinal effect the water has had on this body of mine! Go ahead, touch as much as you'd like! Come!
SERIF_RAKTATHERMAE2307_TRAIN: I'll care for your body and mind, fully and completely!
SERIF_RAKTA_APPRECIATION: You appear to be in less than stellar health conditions. I prescribe an immediate cessation of straining yourself and swift bedrest. Fatigue will destroy your work.
SERIF_RAKTA_DAILY: Hello. What symptoms are you dealing with today? Ah, forgive me, I was just doing a diagnosis. So, where's today's patient?
SERIF_RAKTA_HERO: Loren is an excellent nurse you can trust. He may seem to have his head in the clouds here and there, but his focus in the operating room is second to none.
SERIF_RAKTA_PLAYER: Everyone started somewhere. You just need to get used to the job bit by bit, as we all have. Those words encouraged me during my first operation.
SERIF_RAKTA_RELATION: It makes no sense to me. With how that detective lives his life, he should have a myriad health conditions, yet he's as fit as can be. What is his secret...?
SERIF_RAKTA_TOUCH: Hm? Interested in this body of mine? You should be, I'm quite proud of it. Five days of gym a week maintain this healthy frame. Go ahead, have at it!
SERIF_RAKTA_TRAIN: Time to show you how healthy I am!
SERIF_RASTABAN_APPRECIATION:
おうおう、お困りのようだな…って、待て待てっ！
マウント取りに来たんじゃねぇ、手伝いに来たの！
まぁその書類寄越しな。俺、頭脳労働得意だから。
SERIF_RASTABAN_DAILY:
のわぁだぁぁっ！？な、何だよ急に話しかけんな、
変な声出ただろうが！べ、別にビビッてねぇけど！？
いいから用件話せよ、仕事の依頼なんだろ！？
SERIF_RASTABAN_EVENTA:
クリスマスも目前だってのに、こんなズタボロに
侵攻されちまうとは…マジで来てくれて助かった！
領民達だけでも、救い出す手助けをしてほしい…！
SERIF_RASTABAN_EVENTB:
ウワァッ！？何だ何だ、宇宙船が落ちてきたぞ！？
すっげぇ壊れ方してっけど…これ、乗員は無事、
なのか…？おーい、もしもーし…生きてますかぁ？
SERIF_RASTABAN_EVENTC:
おっ、補給物資とはありがてぇ！なるほど、俺達が
偉業を成すたびに、報酬が貰えんだな…おし！
どんどん武勇伝を作ってやるとしようじゃねぇか！
SERIF_RASTABAN_EVENTD:
ハーッハッハ！また俺達の伝説が増えちまったな！
こりゃ、クリスマスの宴も盛り上がるってモンだ！
さ、こっからどんどん巻き返してやろうぜ！
SERIF_RASTABAN_HERO:
カネスの奴、すげぇよな。あの歳で頭はキレるし、
スタミナもパワーも十分過ぎるぐらいにある。
開拓民仲間として太鼓判押すが、ありゃ化けるぜ？
SERIF_RASTABAN_PLAYER:
お前もなかなか武勇伝が多い身の上みてぇだな。
だが、俺も負けちゃいねぇぞ！おし、そこ座りな。
俺とお前、どっちのがでっけぇ奴か、徹底勝負だ！
SERIF_RASTABAN_RELATION:
なんか、デネボラを見てるとよ…もっと報われて
欲しいって気持ちになってくるんだよな。折角の
縁だ、ウチからも融通できる仕事探してみっか…。
SERIF_RASTABAN_TOUCH:
おわっ！？やーめーろっ、くっ付くんじゃねぇ！
そんなに積極的にアプローチされて…す、
好きになっちまったらどうすんだぁっ！？
SERIF_RASTABAN_TRAIN: 俺のデカさに腰抜かすなよ！？
SERIF_RASTABAN_TRAINED: ちょっ、まっ、ごめんなさぁいっ！！
SERIF_REXERVOLCANO2402_APPRECIATION: You're having trouble focusing, aren't you? I can tell from the look on your face. In games and life, you need proper rest to be at your best, right? Here, lie on my lap and take a break.
SERIF_REXERVOLCANO2402_DAILY: Wonder if the operator likes chocolate? Never made the stuff by hand before, but if I pretend it's a game... Huh? O-Oh, nothing! Talking to myself, don't worry about it.
SERIF_REXERVOLCANO2402_EVENTA: A volcano area, huh? I explore spots like these a lot virtually, but this is a first in the real world! The cocoa here's gotta be rare, too—I'm pumped to find it!
SERIF_REXERVOLCANO2402_EVENTB: I'm really not used to filming shows in the real world. I gotta learn to move better... but let's take a break first. I hear the saunas on this planet are famous, so how about it?
SERIF_REXERVOLCANO2402_EVENTC: Here's some items from the show crew. Sounds like we get to keep the rock cocoa we dig up, too... All right, let's make it a game to see who can get the most!
SERIF_REXERVOLCANO2402_EVENTD: Whoa, you traded for everything! Nice! As for our game, well... we're mostly even! Yeah, good game! Okay, time to make some legendary chocolate with this cocoa!
SERIF_REXERVOLCANO2402_HERO: Ganran tends to laugh most things off, but I have a feeling he never compromises when it comes to work. He's kind of like my father in that way.
SERIF_REXERVOLCANO2402_PLAYER: You can pick whatever weapon you want in this game, right? What'll you pick? Ah, I'm just asking what you like, not necessarily what you're good at. Let's make our characters together!
SERIF_REXERVOLCANO2402_RELATION: I was gaming with Ryu the other day. He put all his stats in strength and just steamrolled all the mechanics. I had no idea you could do that! It kicked ass!
SERIF_REXERVOLCANO2402_TOUCH: This suit is the rarest of gear, with maxed-out mobility and heat resistance. Heh... it tickles a bit, but touch it and see for yourself. All the fine details are pretty great, huh?
SERIF_REXERVOLCANO2402_TRAIN: Complain all you want, I'm not letting up!
SERIF_REXERVOLCANO2402_TRAINED: W-Wait, I'm supposed to be the hunter here!
SERIF_REXER_APPRECIATION: I don't know what being an operator's like, but it must be really special. How about we game a bit to take the edge off? Don't worry, I'll go a bit easy on you.
SERIF_REXER_DAILY: Awright! That's what I'm talking about! Get combo'd! Oh. Er. Ahem. You saw that? Y-You have a job for me? Listen, I wasn't messing around. That was virtual training.
SERIF_REXER_EVENTA: I have never lost and will never lose in this game. I'm here to win, and I'm going to win. Losing isn't an option. That's all.
SERIF_REXER_EVENTB: Nice. Strong. Cool. Following his footsteps is what brought me here. I want to be a hero as perfect as him. I have to be.
SERIF_REXER_EVENTC: Happy Valentine's! Time to put even more energy than usual into streaming today! That's my duty—making everyone smile on special days!
SERIF_REXER_HERO: Ceras is amazing, swinging that big shield around like it's nothing. She's got great offense and defense, and she's talented enough, so why doesn't she try to lead the team?
SERIF_REXER_PLAYER: Do you have a goal? Ideals? I do. There's someone I have to surpass—and that's why I can keep being reXer.
SERIF_REXER_RELATION: I had a practice match with Toshu, but he lectured on and on about etiquette, like he was a teacher or something. Huh? He actually is? Guess that's why he was so strict.
SERIF_REXER_TOUCH: Interested in this avatar? Heh, I bet. Pretty cool, isn't it?  I'm in a virtual world, sure, but I keep up with my training— because I'm a hero.
SERIF_REXER_TRAINED: O-Okay, this is getting kind of tough!
SERIF_ROIKER_APPRECIATION: Food's ready. Eat it before it gets cold. What? You didn't ask for it? Yeah, but you wouldn't rest unless I did this, would you?
SERIF_ROIKER_DAILY: Morning. Oh, sorry, the laundry was done, so I went and folded it up. Hero agencies really do have a ton of laundry, don't they?
SERIF_ROIKER_EVENTA: Congratulations on the third anniversary. It's not much, but I made us some rare tea. Would you mind telling me about your journey while you enjoy it?
SERIF_ROIKER_EVENTB:
Happy New Year. Hope this year'll be another good one.
While looking up at the stars on a chilly night like this is incredible,
we should warm up. I made some coffee. How about it?
SERIF_ROIKER_HERO: I doubt there are many people as wild about other planets' cultures as Mr. Toshu. Those blade skills... He's not just pretending to be a samurai, I'm sure.
SERIF_ROIKER_PLAYER: Observers who possess memories of other universes like yourself are quite out of the ordinary. I wonder what it is he seeks from you?
SERIF_ROIKER_RELATION: I feel bad for making Exio constantly dirty his hands, but his forthrightness has most definitely helped us make sure progress.
SERIF_ROIKER_TOUCH: Nnn?! Oh, er, ahem. Pretend you did not just hear that. I'm rather weak when hit by surprise, you see.
SERIF_ROIKER_TRAIN: Come. I will take everything you have to give.
SERIF_ROIKER_TRAINED: Gh... I could not handle all of it!
SERIF_ROUDINSTELLA2510_APPRECIATION:
When you're really suffering hard, it's best to not push yourself.
Like, when you can't take it anymore, you can let yourself fall. Don't worry.
Because when you finally look up again, I'll be there for you.
SERIF_ROUDINSTELLA2510_DAILY:
Say, did you see any stalls selling fans?
There's this type of magic trick in Japan where they use fans, y'see.
They call them suigei, or water tricks, and I really want to give them a try.
SERIF_ROUDINSTELLA2510_EVENTA:
Japanese festivals have an enchanting appeal to them! The holiday feel, the stalls,
and the yukata people wear! They're pretty flashy,
and they look like you could sneak all sorts of stuff into 'em. Might use one for my next stage costume.
SERIF_ROUDINSTELLA2510_EVENTB:
A flower festival, a moon festival, a chocolate festival...
Haha, they're all bringing their best and flashiest, huh!
Well, we can't fall behind—let's bring some serious energy!
SERIF_ROUDINSTELLA2510_EVENTC:
Ah, perfect timing! Help me out a bit, would you?
I'm pretty bad when it comes to this backstage stuff.
I'm beggin' you! I'll make it worth your while!
SERIF_ROUDINSTELLA2510_EVENTD:
Whew, you helped a ton! As thanks, hm, well...
How about a festival date, just the two of us?
Heh heh. I'll treat you to anything you want!
SERIF_ROUDINSTELLA2510_HERO:
A Parallel Weapon that allows you to share the pain of others, huh?
That Turbak seriously is something.
Heck, I could hardly bear my own pain back then.
SERIF_ROUDINSTELLA2510_PLAYER:
Didn't think I'd be able to take the stage with you again.
Well, watch this. I'll show you that the dream you observed
is blossoming well inside me.
SERIF_ROUDINSTELLA2510_RELATION:
Heh heh, let me just pour this over this here yakisoba like so, and then... Oh?
Curious about this bottle? It's some spice Barrel recommended to me.
Let's give it a try... Gah! My tongue!
SERIF_ROUDINSTELLA2510_TOUCH:
Oh-hoh! Pretty passionate touch you got there.
Heh heh, let me repay the favor.
A hug for a hug. A nice ol' squeeze.
SERIF_ROUDIN_APPRECIATION:
Abra-kadabra! Here's your sweets!
Pretty handy, huh? This little magic trick really eases the mind when things're at their worst.
A bit of a way to cope, but it doesn't feel bad, right?
SERIF_ROUDIN_DAILY:
Hey, feeling peckish?
I'll fix you up something quick to munch on.
Heh heh, don't let the other guests know, all right?
SERIF_ROUDIN_EVENTA:
Haha! Pretty loud town, huh?
The flashy hotel, the pool, the show stage!
This is a place where countless dreams are born... and fade away.
SERIF_ROUDIN_EVENTB:
Been to the rooftop pool yet?
If you don't have a swimsuit, the hotel sells 'em.
They're a bit on the loud side, but if it floats your boat...
SERIF_ROUDIN_EVENTC:
Pretty rare to see stuff in paper nowadays like these fliers, huh?
So, how 'bout helping with advertising a bit?
Don't worry. I'll pay you—a lot, too!
SERIF_ROUDIN_EVENTD:
Oh, hey, thanks! You really know how to come through when it counts.
Here, let me give you a present as a special bonus.
Look close, all right? Three, two, one... Here!
SERIF_ROUDIN_HERO:
That Akashi really is something,
always going straight ahead with everything he's got.
Almost shines a bit too bright to look at, if you ask me.
SERIF_ROUDIN_PLAYER:
Observers observe dreams, right?
I guess this is my dream. Thought I'd left it behind, but...
Ah, it's nothing. Forget I said anything.
SERIF_ROUDIN_RELATION:
Oh, hey, perfect timing! Can you help me out?
See, I gave Kalaski some sweets I normally give the kids,
and he really chewed me out!
SERIF_ROUDIN_TOUCH:
Whoa?! Where'd that hug come from?
Well, I get you. Sometimes that mood strikes you.
Want a headpat or something? Here you go, there, there...
SERIF_ROUDIN_TRAIN: I won't hold back too much.
SERIF_ROUDIN_TRAINED: M-Maybe you could have held back a bit?
SERIF_RUTILIX_APPRECIATION: Master mage, I've steamed some potatoes. Would you like one? I thought you might be getting hungry around now. Oh, I'll peel the skin if you hand it to me.
SERIF_RUTILIX_DAILY: Ah, master mage! Forgive my late greeting—I was too absorbed in my training to notice your arrival. Ah! The log I cut, it... Gwah!
SERIF_RUTILIX_EVENTA: I am Rutilix, proud knight of Aradicia! Being in this mysterious labyrinth changes that not! With my blade, I shall protect His Majesty. I swear it!
SERIF_RUTILIX_EVENTB: Master mage, Your Majesty, stand back! I shall handle these Kaibutsu! With mine sw... Gwah?! D-Damn it! One of these days, I'll steam them like potatoes!
SERIF_RUTILIX_HERO: Sir Marfik truly is someone you can rely on. He is wise in the ways of adventure and holds his own in a battle. Why, then, does he serve in no court?
SERIF_RUTILIX_PLAYER: You needn't trouble yourself with such a trifle, master mage. I shall cut them down myself! Hah! Yah! Ghh?! Why does my blade not strike true?!
SERIF_RUTILIX_RELATION: I truly respect His Majesty, but his slightly... excessive fondness for mischief does make me worry. It is laudable, however, that he is close to the people.
SERIF_RUTILIX_TOUCH: C-Cut that out! Do not think you can so simply touch this body, dedicated as it is to the noble path of knighthood! I... Gahh! Ahh, just kill me!
SERIF_RUTILIX_TRAIN: I will not hold back! Have at you!
SERIF_RYEKIE2NDANNIVERSARY_EVENTA: You've really come into your own, partner! With you taking care of us, we can all work even harder!! Let's keep the justice going!
SERIF_RYEKIENEWYEAR2201_EVENTA: Happy New Year, partner! Last year was great!! Let's make this year even better!
SERIF_RYEKIEXMAS2012_APPRECIATION: Wahaha, let's keep it casual, partner! Be serious when we've got to and relax when we got to! Working is all about switching yourself on and off!
SERIF_RYEKIEXMAS2012_DAILY: Hey, partner! How're you doing? I'm bursting with energy, on top of the world! Huh? My face is red? My face is always red!
SERIF_RYEKIEXMAS2012_EVENTA: Glad to see you, partner! Come on, let's give it our best! I'm ready to seize the day!
SERIF_RYEKIEXMAS2012_HERO: The owner of that inn really uses some interesting techniques, huh. Gosh, I feel like I'll pass out just thinking about that water going well past the boiling point!
SERIF_RYEKIEXMAS2012_PLAYER: I'm really glad you joined the company! You work hard every day to keep us going in the field, so let me thank you for that today!
SERIF_RYEKIEXMAS2012_RELATION: Mokdai's the first employee we had, so I've always doted over him! Can't believe he went and became a hero himself...
SERIF_RYEKIEXMAS2012_TOUCH: Oh! You want a hug, partner? Sure! I'll give you one that burns hotter than any hug you've ever had! You won't be able to feel your limbs after this one!
SERIF_RYEKIEXMAS2012_TRAIN: Time for a guts contest! Let's go!
SERIF_RYEKIE_APPRECIATION: Hahaha, you've got another look of tired accomplishment on you today! Without your efforts, none of us would be here—in other words, you are our hero!
SERIF_RYEKIE_DAILY: Oh! Morning, partner! My sales- and weightlifting-trained body stands at the ready to enact justice!
SERIF_RYEKIE_HERO: More than victory, more than defeat, Procy cares about money! Money is what drives him to battle. It's his ideal, what he believes in, and no one can deny him that!
SERIF_RYEKIE_PLAYER: Wahaha! Don't let it get to you, partner! Even Huckle was nervous at the start! Just take your time and get used to it—that's how it goes!
SERIF_RYEKIE_RELATION: Huckle's my best friend, and always has been! Back in his hero days and now in his retirement, he always comes through for me! That's the kind of man he is!
SERIF_RYEKIE_TOUCH: Whoa! You want a hug, partner? Well, here you go. One hug of Justiiiiice! Haha, how was that? Made you kinda numb, huh?!
SERIF_RYEKIE_TRAIN: I'll go easy on you! Let's go!
SERIF_RYEKIE_TRAINED: Guoh?! Not bad, making me whimper...
SERIF_RYUSEI_APPRECIATION: Operator, you seem a little tired. How about some simple stretches to shake things up? Don't worry, I'll be gentle—just relax and let me take over.
SERIF_RYUSEI_DAILY: Ahh, the pecs are in perfect condition, as usual! Nothing like your muscles feeling at their peak to let you know you can seize the day! Huh? You don't think so? Maybe it's just a bodybuilder thing...?
SERIF_RYUSEI_EVENTA: Legendary chocolate, huh? Wonder what it's like. I feel like chocolate in a volcanic area would melt, but... Huh? You dig it out of minerals? We're talking about chocolate, right?
SERIF_RYUSEI_EVENTB: It's winter on Earth, but so hot out here... We've really got to watch out for heatstroke. Oh, I know! Some light training to beat the heat! Oh, my sweat-glistening biceps are looking perfect today!
SERIF_RYUSEI_EVENTC: The show staff said they'd give us rewards for handing over chocolate ingredients! Let's get them all! I wonder if they have any good amino acid supplements?
SERIF_RYUSEI_EVENTD: Nice, you managed to get everything! I'm sure this is enough to make that legendary chocolate by hand! Let's go thank the staff for all the stuff!
SERIF_RYUSEI_HERO: I do game and training collab streams with reXer pretty often. Our styles are different, but we get along pretty well! It feels like I've gained a little brother!
SERIF_RYUSEI_PLAYER: I've heard a lot about you from Hitty and the others! You fight on the field together, right? Tell me more about that! I love talking with people!
SERIF_RYUSEI_RELATION: Ganran's been upping his weights every day in training to get better at forging! Guess that body wasn't built in a day... I've got to step my game up!
SERIF_RYUSEI_TOUCH: Oh? Interested in bodybuilding, are you? Well, if you want to use my body as a reference, go ahead! Come closer! It's a model's job to be looked at, after all!
SERIF_RYUSEI_TRAIN: Let's train with beauty and balance!
SERIF_RYUSEI_TRAINED: Okay, that might be too much weight!
SERIF_SADAYOSHISURVIVAL2309_APPRECIATION: Chief, you seem rather tired. Understandable. Let us create a simple base for you to rest in. Please, wait for a moment. I will gather usable supplies.
SERIF_SADAYOSHISURVIVAL2309_DAILY: I never thought we would end up on a desert island. I am, however, well-versed in survival techniques. Do not worry; we will get home alive.
SERIF_SADAYOSHISURVIVAL2309_EVENTA: Worry not about your lack of survival training, I will handle everything. First, water. Take a coconut like this and... Hnn! It went flying, but that is how we will secure hydration.
SERIF_SADAYOSHISURVIVAL2309_EVENTB: Beach... volleyball? I see, cooperative spirit increased by shared participation in sport. I shall tackle it with everything I have. Prepare yourself!
SERIF_SADAYOSHISURVIVAL2309_EVENTC:
I appreciate the infusion of supplies. The situation called for it.
Chief, let us make full use of these supplies and escape this island!
SERIF_SADAYOSHISURVIVAL2309_EVENTD:
Well done, chief. For a change of pace,
how about a round of beach volleyball?
Embarrassingly, I cannot forget the fun we had last time.
SERIF_SADAYOSHISURVIVAL2309_HERO: Giansar? My views have not changed. I cannot accept his dark deeds. However, villain or not, I simply thought it necessary to know about him.
SERIF_SADAYOSHISURVIVAL2309_PLAYER: I have been ordered to enjoy my time off, but my free time often ends while I try to decide what to do. Chief, what do you often occupy yourself with?
SERIF_SADAYOSHISURVIVAL2309_RELATION: Master Thief Zaniah? Hmph! A common robber, loudly introducing herself and accomplishing nothing but giving herself an opportunity to be caught. What is she thinking?
SERIF_SADAYOSHISURVIVAL2309_TOUCH: Oh, is something the matter? Ah, how could something not be the matter, living on a desert island like this. Worry not, though. I am with you. Lean on me as you'd like.
SERIF_SADAYOSHISURVIVAL2309_TRAIN: Let us enjoy this to the fullest!
SERIF_SADAYOSHI_APPRECIATION: Welcome back from your mission, chief. Please, have a seat. I can handle making you... Ah. Chief, I'm afraid I put the tea leaves in the cup.
SERIF_SADAYOSHI_DAILY: Good morning, chief. I am ready for action at a moment's notice. Please, give me an order and I shall tackle it with my utmost.
SERIF_SADAYOSHI_HERO: I had often heard of his exploits from my parents. That I would see his return with my own eyes is something truly moving.
SERIF_SADAYOSHI_PLAYER: Chief, of those who I have taken the field with, you are the closest to the civilians we are sworn to protect. Combat is fierce, and I ask you to turn to me for protection. I shall defend you with my life.
SERIF_SADAYOSHI_RELATION: I cannot comprehend Monomasa's feelings. How could one who has walked the path requested of them turn around and cast it aside? I wish to know why.
SERIF_SADAYOSHI_TOUCH: Is this a body check, chief? I'm afraid I have nothing suspicious on my person, but if you feel you must check, then carry on.
SERIF_SADAYOSHI_TRAIN: Beginning operation. I will not hold back.
SERIF_SADAYOSHI_TRAINED: Perhaps my training was not enough!
SERIF_SANTETSU_APPRECIATION: You seem tired. I have just the thing: throw everything aside and rest. Nothing heals the mind like sinking into a good book... or is that just me?
SERIF_SANTETSU_DAILY: Huh? Oh, sorry, I hadn't noticed you were there. I found this fascinating book, you see, and couldn't help myself. So, what will it be today?
SERIF_SANTETSU_EVENTA: I'm reading here, so... Oh, it's you. Seems like it's a special day today. I'll wish you a happy... whatever it is.
SERIF_SANTETSU_EVENTB:
Happy New Year. Hm? New Year's prayers?
What a pain... Though I guess it couldn't hurt to get a single prayer in.
I'll pray not to get dragged into any trouble this year.
SERIF_SANTETSU_HERO: Professor Marfik lets me read rare books, so I think he's a pretty good person. Going with him on a research trip, though... that's a different story.
SERIF_SANTETSU_PLAYER: I really relate to you, hearing what your background is. I know the horror of losing everything from a disaster you had no say in.
SERIF_SANTETSU_RELATION: Mr. Tenma can be a little overbearing, but there's a lot of good to him, too. He's overbearing but intellectual, assertive but takes the social initiative... Haa...
SERIF_SANTETSU_TOUCH: W-Where did that come from? Wait, I didn't respond when called? S-Sorry, I was so absorbed in this book I... Ah! P-Please, no grabbing!
SERIF_SANTETSU_TRAIN: I don't really want to do anything that'll wear me out.
SERIF_SANTETSU_TRAINED: A-All right, all right, I'll get back to work!
SERIF_SAOTOME_APPRECIATION:
They say you have to grind when you're young, but I don't
think you need to go out of your way to work yourself to the bone.
It wouldn't kill you to be a bit more laid back!
SERIF_SAOTOME_DAILY:
Ohh! This sticker caught your eye, huh?
Eheheh, well, this little cutie's Shimeow, Enoshima's mascot character!
I love the little guy, he's just so cute! Here, I'll give you a sticker too!
SERIF_SAOTOME_EVENTA:
Operator, have you already tried the sardine soft serve?
It'll be my treat, so give it a try!
Post something nice about it online if you like it!
SERIF_SAOTOME_EVENTB:
I didn't think this many Heroes would show up!
Now's not the time to get starstruck, though—I have to keep it together
to make a good PR showing for Enoshima!
SERIF_SAOTOME_EVENTC:
The tourism map and stamps I made all myself! The prizes
are something you won't want to miss, either,
so how about joining in on the stamp rally?
SERIF_SAOTOME_EVENTD:
Wahaha! You sure outdid yourself collecting those stamps!
Well, the prizes we have here are all yours!
Take as much as you want home with you, along with your memories of Enoshima!
SERIF_SAOTOME_HERO:
Astar's such a gentle soul! He's always smiling and so nice to the kids!
Huh? You say he's a regular taskmaster? He sure doesn't look one.
SERIF_SAOTOME_PLAYER:
Say, Operator, it's pretty embarrassing to come out and say this,
but Uncle Saotome over here's still a rookie Hero. Do you think
you could help me out, teach me a thing or two? I know how experienced you are!
SERIF_SAOTOME_RELATION:
Yohack's kind, hardworking, and really easy to get along with!
What an impressive youth!
Just like me in my younger days, wahaha!
SERIF_SAOTOME_TOUCH:
Gwah! I-It would be one thing if I were my young self again,
but having my sagging belly poked like that's a little embarrassing.
Hm? It's got the perfect softness, you say? I-Is that so?
SERIF_SAOTOME_TRAIN: Time for Uncle Saotome to do his best!
SERIF_SEIICHIRO_APPRECIATION: I appreciate what a hard worker you are, but you shouldn't misjudge your capacity. Come, we're going to go recharge. I reserved us seats at a good restaurant.
SERIF_SEIICHIRO_DAILY: Why the surprise? I'm simply here to check up on my promising junior: you. My schedule happens to be open, so I'll help out around the office.
SERIF_SEIICHIRO_HERO: Santetsu is a lot more competent than he lets on, and he's a talented hero. If only he had the motivation to match, then he'd be unstoppable...
SERIF_SEIICHIRO_PLAYER: You are an observer of boundless potential and power. Don't worry, though—I'll take care of you until you can bring that power to heel.
SERIF_SEIICHIRO_RELATION: I like how Okitaka doesn't stop at simply lightening the mood. Even I have much to learn from his approach.
SERIF_SEIICHIRO_TOUCH: Now, hold on. I can't blame you for falling for my charms, but bodily contact on the job breaches code of conduct. Do you want a scolding from me that badly?
SERIF_SEIICHIRO_TRAIN: Come with me. I'll set you straight.
SERIF_SEIICHIRO_TRAINED: To think that I could be bested!
SERIF_SENSETTIA_APPRECIATION: Hey, Operator, eat these! You were really working your throat last order, right? These throat lozenges are my tried and true—make sure you down them all!
SERIF_SENSETTIA_DAILY: I'm on a musical tour of the cosmos, winning everyone over with the magic of my voice. No one's words are going to beat my singing!
SERIF_SENSETTIA_EVENTA: Hey, I can hear carols! I just love Christmas—songs are everywhere! I think I wanna join in!
SERIF_SENSETTIA_EVENTB: Christmas decorations are just so beautiful, especially the star on top of the tree! Someday, I swear, that's gonna be me...
SERIF_SENSETTIA_HERO: Gomeisa's core strength is incredible! He never wobbles when he's dancing, can you believe it? With all that muscle, I bet he can really belt it out from the belly!
SERIF_SENSETTIA_PLAYER: You've been working really hard, Operator, and I can't fall behind! Okay, that's it! Time for some voice training right now, and you're helping me out!
SERIF_SENSETTIA_RELATION: Viscunam's weird inventions are trouble sometimes, but they've really helped me before. I'm grateful to the guy. Don't tell him, though—it'll get to his head!
SERIF_SENSETTIA_TOUCH: Whoa, hey, what do you think you're doing?! You need my permission if you're gonna touch me! N-Not that I'd just hand it out willy-nilly...
SERIF_SENTHAK_APPRECIATION:
Hey, even I'm gonna feel down if you make a face like that.
Hey, is there anything you like? Anyone you're a stan of?
I'll conjure 'em up for you, so put on a smile!
SERIF_SENTHAK_DAILY:
Whew... I just can't take it! It's so over!
My fav's just too perfect! Hey, I'm gonna rewatch the archives—
wanna tag along?
SERIF_SENTHAK_EVENTA:
We've gotta make this Christmas event a success to keep our ship around!
Hey, is there anything I can help with?
SERIF_SENTHAK_EVENTB:
Whoa, it's time for the stream!
C'mon, watch it with me!
The call goes like this: Oi! Oi! Oi oi oi!
SERIF_SENTHAK_EVENTC:
Alend asked me to set things up for the event,
so you think you could help a bit?
Let's get a full comp of all the merch!
SERIF_SENTHAK_EVENTD:
All right, here's your share!
Y'know, just knowing this is event-limited merch
is enough to get me going!
SERIF_SENTHAK_HERO:
Gosh, Alend's such a cool guy!
Always forthcoming, always saying what he means!
A huge difference from me. All I do is run away.
SERIF_SENTHAK_PLAYER:
You've been observing my dreams, right?
Well, tell me what yours are!
I'll make 'em real before you know it!
SERIF_SENTHAK_RELATION:
I yapped with Mokdai all night.
Idols and heroes may be different genres, but when
stans come together, they can talk forever about their favs!
SERIF_SENTHAK_TOUCH:
Ohhh! My stan merch catch your eye?
How about we go to my room, then?!
I'll show you the stuff I've got specially for spreading the good word!
SERIF_SENTHAK_TRAIN: I'm not gonna be holding back!
SERIF_SENTHAK_TRAINED: Guh... You didn't pull any punches, did you!
SERIF_SHAFTVIRTUALFESTA2210_APPRECIATION: You seem tired, Operator. Allow me to bring you home. Come, onto my back. All right, we're off. Hm? Operator... are you asleep?
SERIF_SHAFTVIRTUALFESTA2210_DAILY: I'm alone in the taxi, but I get to be on a team on the job as a hero. It really is nice to work together with everyone, isn't it?
SERIF_SHAFTVIRTUALFESTA2210_EVENTA: Fighting as a team means teamwork is important, so... All right, let's split into small groups first! We've got to get along!
SERIF_SHAFTVIRTUALFESTA2210_EVENTB: No matter how far the destination, I'll get you there! I may not have my taxi anymore, but I still have my legs! I'll... I'll never give up!
SERIF_SHAFTVIRTUALFESTA2210_HERO: I've been lost in life before, and it's left me with insight. I think I have an idea of what's giving reXer pause.
SERIF_SHAFTVIRTUALFESTA2210_PLAYER: I think it's really important to have someone help you work things out when you're lost moving forward. You've helped me out a lot, so... Heh heh.
SERIF_SHAFTVIRTUALFESTA2210_RELATION: Mr. Toshu's got a real solid core and integrity, so I feel like he'd be really quick to make decisions. A lot to learn there for an indecisive guy like me... Noted.
SERIF_SHAFTVIRTUALFESTA2210_TOUCH: What's up? Oh, this scar? Looks like they've even recreated my old rugby bruises. Check this one out, too... Oh! S-Sorry, that was too forward of me!
SERIF_SHAFTVIRTUALFESTA2210_TRAIN: I'll show you everything I've got!
SERIF_SHAFT_APPRECIATION: Operator, what would you say to a drive? It may help take your mind off things. Don't worry, I'll stop the meter.
SERIF_SHAFT_DAILY: Needed a taxi, Operator? Well, here I am. Please, step aboard. Wait. H-Huh? Hold on, where are my keys?!
SERIF_SHAFT_EVENTA: Looks like we've gotten tangled into something big... Oh, don't worry. I'll bring you to your destination, safe and sound. Wait. W-Where are we?
SERIF_SHAFT_EVENTB: What is that thief after, exactly? This is just a hunch, but it doesn't look like all of this is just for thrills.
SERIF_SHAFT_HERO: Something he would risk his life to take a photo of... My. I suppose that's why his photos always tug at the heart. That level of passion for one's job takes me back, just a little.
SERIF_SHAFT_PLAYER: Changing jobs is tougher than it seems, since you have to force yourself to adapt to a new environment. I think we'll have a good bit in common, in that sense.
SERIF_SHAFT_RELATION: That android driver has so much motivation on the job. I'm always thinking I've got so much to learn from him...
SERIF_SHAFT_TOUCH: W-What are you doing?! Hm? I feel super tough? Haha, well, I did play professional rugby. I'm used to smashing into people.
SERIF_SHIDEMASU_APPRECIATION: Oh? Feeling tired lately? Ah, no need to worry, you can tell me how you feel. I understand. Come, let us take a break, then.
SERIF_SHIDEMASU_DAILY: Ah, you've come at just the right time. I have the perfect new product for... Hm? Ah, you'll hear it if I help you out with work? Very well, then. As you wish.
SERIF_SHIDEMASU_EVENTA: I had not expected that they would assign me to be a health inspector. I didn't get any contracts last month, so I would at least like to get one in this venue.
SERIF_SHIDEMASU_EVENTB: My, this has certainly become quite the production. Alas, we've no choice. In a strict show of protest toward the technology department, let us break everything.
SERIF_SHIDEMASU_EVENTC: Ah, so we can gain supplies here in tiers. Then let us unlock as many as we can without reservations. Hm? Me? Enjoying battle? Oh, perish the thought.
SERIF_SHIDEMASU_EVENTD: Congratulations on fully clearing the missions. You know, it is because we are in the middle of an emergency that I'd like to take pride in accomplishments like these.
SERIF_SHIDEMASU_HERO: I am surprised that the supreme commander had experience fighting on the front lines. Yet, to demand such deft movements in training... UEHA is no vacation, I see.
SERIF_SHIDEMASU_PLAYER: You do take to the battlefield more than other operators. In that case, how about a plan that offers more direct protection?
SERIF_SHIDEMASU_RELATION: I walked the lawyer in this office through a plan I thought would be splendid, and he said with a smile that he'd think about it. Do you think I might be in?
SERIF_SHIDEMASU_TOUCH: Oh? Has something gotten you scared? Well, come along then, latch onto me. I will guarantee your safety, completely and absolutely.
SERIF_SHIDEMASU_TRAIN: I needn't hold back? Very well, I will not.
SERIF_SHIDEMASU_TRAINED: Goodness me, that was quite the showing.
SERIF_SHOENVALENTINE2102_APPRECIATION: What would you say to sipping tea in silence and enjoying a moment of calm? It soothes the soul. Hm? What am I trying to say? I believe I am asking you out, of course.
SERIF_SHOENVALENTINE2102_DAILY: I feel most at peace when doing calligraphy. Ah, forgive me for the wait. My mind and heart are finally ready—let us be off.
SERIF_SHOENVALENTINE2102_HERO: I'm afraid I lack knowledge of contraptions, so Hisaki's bizarre creations always catch me off guard. How fascinating it is to see there are worlds I know nothing about.
SERIF_SHOENVALENTINE2102_PLAYER: Has your heart ever held enough passion to burn? Ah, forgive me, a touch inappropriate of a question. Seems I allowed myself to be taken by sentiment.
SERIF_SHOENVALENTINE2102_RELATION: Few are as honest and forthright as Kyoichi. Perhaps if I were like him, I would not be bothered by trifles so...
SERIF_SHOENVALENTINE2102_TOUCH: I seek a mind as tranquil as calm waters. A simple poke on my belly would no... Gweh! Ah. Please, forget what you just heard.
SERIF_SHOEN_APPRECIATION: One needs mental and emotional space to cultivate a serene heart, and that space is what you need to create. Shall we make origami together? It soothes the soul.
SERIF_SHOEN_DAILY: You caught me making origami. Ah, yes, right, it was time for work. Let's be off, then.
SERIF_SHOEN_HERO: One who changes the flow of time through writing. Though we use the same means, our powers are completely different. The power of letters is... truly unknowable.
SERIF_SHOEN_PLAYER: I do not know your work terribly well, but I do know that the letters will not dance without you. That I know well.
SERIF_SHOEN_RELATION: Toshu is from a different planet than I, but we both treasure Japanese culture all the same. Give him a sweet yokan to put a smile on his face.
SERIF_SHOEN_TOUCH: Hm? Is there something on my belly? Hm...? Physical contact as a means of sharing fondness? I see. Fascinating...
SERIF_SHOEN_TRAIN: I wish to loosen my brush. Will you join me?
SERIF_STERIOWHITEOUT2512_APPRECIATION:
オォン、オッペフラフラしてるド～！？腹減った？
体冷えた？じゃあじゃあ、おれが暖めてやるド！
そんで、一緒に飯食う！早く元気になるんだド～！
SERIF_STERIOWHITEOUT2512_DAILY:
ソリもスパイクも準備オッケー！いつでも狩りに
いけちまうド！ムイラウカⅠでは使わない道具、
使って狩りやるの、すっげー楽しみだド～！
SERIF_STERIOWHITEOUT2512_EVENTA:
うひょ～、これが雪ってやつ！？ふかふかでー、
ひんやりしててー、服脱いで飛び込みてぇド！
でもでも、カネスにダメって言われたド、我慢…。
SERIF_STERIOWHITEOUT2512_EVENTB:
ラスタバン、すっげぇド～！
沢山手柄の話持ってる、絶対つおいド！
でもでも、おれたちの助け必要なのどうして？
戦うの、すげぇ恐がってる気がするド。
SERIF_STERIOWHITEOUT2512_EVENTC:
これ、ご褒美？書いてある事やれば、貰えるやつ？
どーれーにーしー…選べねぇド！ぜーんぶやれば、
結局同じ！おーし、仕事っ、仕事っ、仕事っ！
SERIF_STERIOWHITEOUT2512_EVENTD:
プレゼントがいーっぱいだド！クリスマス、これ
全部あればできる？じゃあじゃあ、パーティーの
飾りを用意するド！おれ、もっかい行ってくる！
SERIF_STERIOWHITEOUT2512_HERO:
ゲンじじ、カネスがちょっと恐がってるド。
いいヒトなのに、何で？ゴロウがツンデレだって
言ってたけど、おれ分かんねぇ。オッペ知ってる？
SERIF_STERIOWHITEOUT2512_PLAYER:
オッペと仕事出来るの、すっげぇ嬉しいド！
おれとカネスの初めての変身、手伝ってくれた。
オメー、おれの大事なヒト！大好きなヒトだド！
SERIF_STERIOWHITEOUT2512_RELATION:
デネボラ、すっげーつおい猟師！猟犬の仕事も
出来ちまうんだド！でもでもカネスがああなったら
おれは何をやればいい？ちょっと不安になるド。
SERIF_STERIOWHITEOUT2512_TOUCH:
オッペ、おれの新しいスーツ気になる？ふふん、
どこでもいっぱい触っていいド！寒くないない、
オッペはどう？おれ、触っててあったかい？
SERIF_STERIOWHITEOUT2512_TRAIN: オメー鍛える、おれの役目！頑張るド～！
SERIF_STERIOWHITEOUT2512_TRAINED: め、目が回るほど、楽しいド～…！
SERIF_STERIO_APPRECIATION:
Opps, you're looking a bit poopy-woopy'd out! Tired?
Well, when you're tired, nothing's better than eatin' up some yum-yums!
Here, I'll give you some of the treats my brother made!
SERIF_STERIO_DAILY:
Papa's the strongest in the space hunter family, but guess what?
I know the truth! Mama's even stronger!
I'm so glad I'm the hunting dog of the strongest family around!
SERIF_STERIO_EVENTA:
There are so many people! Is Earth like this everywhere all the time?
My home of Muirauqa I is toootally different!
The sights, the smells, the grub, it's all different!
SERIF_STERIO_EVENTB:
Hero Fiesta's so fun! Earth is so cool!
When me and Canes grow up to be real Heroes,
I wanna take Mama and Papa over to have fun!
SERIF_STERIO_EVENTC:
What's a "mission"? Is that like an errand?
I do lotsa errands back home!
Wait, there's rewards too? Ohh, I can't wait! I'm gonna work up a storm!
SERIF_STERIO_EVENTD:
That's it, it's all over! Lotsa rewards too!
We got this one, and this one, and this one... oh, that's all of them?
That's so much! Gotta use them all carefully too!
SERIF_STERIO_HERO:
Opps, between you and Akashi, which one's the dog?
Huh? It's not like that? You're not family?
Not when you get along so well? Me, I just don't get it.
SERIF_STERIO_PLAYER:
Opps, what's a "hero agency" like? Do they have snacks?
Do you get to go on walks? How about naps?
Ohh, depends on the place, huh? Well, I wanna find somewhere good!
SERIF_STERIO_RELATION:
I'm always so proud of my brother Canes!
He's so smart and strong and stuff! But guess what? When
I tell him how awesome he is, he always goes red! What's up with that?
SERIF_STERIO_TOUCH:
What's that? You wanna give me petsies? I'd love that!
Here, this is my usual brush!
Go ahead and start from the back!
SERIF_STERIO_TRAIN: Anytime, anywhere, I'm giving my best!
SERIF_STERIO_TRAINED: Ahahaha! It feels great to be so active!
SERIF_SUBARU_APPRECIATION: Are you in this job to destroy your body? Me, personally, I think you need a well-rested body and mind to do good art and good work.
SERIF_SUBARU_DAILY: If you're going to call me over, can you not be late? Either way, I had just finished writing. Let me help you with work as I look for new ideas.
SERIF_SUBARU_HERO: A person from outer space in samurai armor? A strange combination. His swordsmanship and conduct is quite different from a samurai's, but his rough demeanor fits the part.
SERIF_SUBARU_PLAYER: I'm afraid I can't judge your work, since our fields are vastly different. I do feel that the sight of you doing your best, however, is beautiful.
SERIF_SUBARU_RELATION: I've been with Kyoichi since grade school, and he's been a jock for as long as I've known him. If he's going to be a teacher, he really should delve into the liberal arts more.
SERIF_SUBARU_TOUCH: Hm? What is it? Do you find this old-looking outfit laughable? Or perhaps this build of m... Hm? You like it? I... I see...
SERIF_SUBARU_TRAIN: Training hardly suits me, but there is something I'd like to test.
SERIF_SUBARU_TRAINED: W-We've done enough, right? May I leave now?
SERIF_SUHAILCHOCOLATEFES2303_APPRECIATIO: Why the worn-out face, ally? All right, crew, we're having a banquet! Get everything ready! You're taking part, of course, so bring something interesting!
SERIF_SUHAILCHOCOLATEFES2303_DAILY: There's only one person I can ever call friend, and that's the man who stole my left arm from me! Pretty interesting that he's my arm now, ain't it?
SERIF_SUHAILCHOCOLATEFES2303_EVENTA: There's a sweet smell plaguing this school... Now, I don't give a damn about sweets, but... Hm? Wait, this chocolate goes great with booze! Crewmen, try this!
SERIF_SUHAILCHOCOLATEFES2303_EVENTB: Gahaha, caught you, ally! Now you're part of me pirate crew! Come, let's go back and have us a banquet! Hm? What's that bird...?
SERIF_SUHAILCHOCOLATEFES2303_EVENTC: Gahaha! I'm a pirate, see? Everything that catches me fancy, I take! All right, crew, take everything here! We feast when we get back!
SERIF_SUHAILCHOCOLATEFES2303_HERO: Oh, that Procy... looks like the lad's got himself ready to face the boss. Not bad, risking it all for a mate. That's pirate-class boldness!
SERIF_SUHAILCHOCOLATEFES2303_PLAYER: Be proud, ally, you're as interesting as they come! You stole away the voice of me heart! Now, I trust you're ready to face the consequences?
SERIF_SUHAILCHOCOLATEFES2303_RELATION: Anna, huh. It's been a while since I've met someone bold enough to talk back to me without fear! The quiet life won't suit her—I'll give her a recommendation for Pirate College, gahaha!
SERIF_SUHAILCHOCOLATEFES2303_TOUCH: Oh? You got real guts, laying hands on me. That ain't enough, though. Let me show you how it's done... Yer not scared, are ya?
SERIF_SUHAILCHOCOLATEFES2303_TRAIN: All right, let's see yer guts!
SERIF_SUHAILCHOCOLATEFES2303_TRAINED: Ghk... Felt that in the gut...
SERIF_SUHAIL_APPRECIATION: Gahaha! You look flattened, ally of mine! You're going to chase fortune away with that face! Look, when you can't smile, turn to me—I'll put a grin on your face!
SERIF_SUHAIL_DAILY: Hey there, ally! The waves of the Milky Way are calm today, making it perfect for piracy! So, what's our next target? Let's get right to it!
SERIF_SUHAIL_HERO: When I see his weapon, I remember... him. The owner of this left arm. He was my best friend, and that's why I can't lose to that guy—ever!
SERIF_SUHAIL_PLAYER: I don't care how good you are at your job. All that matters is if I find you interesting or not. And guess what? You're already mine, and I'm not letting you go easy.
SERIF_SUHAIL_RELATION: One of these days, I'm gonna make that dragon kid a crewmate! He used to be a pirate, and now he's playing hero? That's wild! I love people like that!
SERIF_SUHAIL_TOUCH: Oh, want to get a little closer? A little intimate? You're bold, bold enough to do what my crew wouldn't dare. I like that! Come here!
SERIF_SUHAIL_TRAIN: Let's ring you out and see what treasure you've got!
SERIF_SUHAIL_TRAINED: Getting one over on me? Not bad!
SERIF_SUI2NDANNIVERSARY_EVENTA: It's been two years already. Feels like it passed in the blink of an eye. I'll work even harder this year, so let's keep at it. And thanks for everything.
SERIF_SUI_APPRECIATION: Hm, so that's what you're like when you're exhausted. Well, go lie down. I'll do this paperwork. We have to help each other out, right?
SERIF_SUI_DAILY: Mm, good to see you. How's my condition? Pretty all right. So, what's the job today?
SERIF_SUI_HERO: Idol outfits are really nice, aren't they? So fluffy, and sparkly, and all. I kind of... like them.
SERIF_SUI_PLAYER: What I think about you? Well... I suppose you work pretty hard. Still got a ways to go, though. The both of us.
SERIF_SUI_RELATION: Mokdai tore his suit again. I wonder if the size was mismatched? Or maybe he's just... put on weight...?
SERIF_SUI_TOUCH: H-Hey! What's gotten into you? Geez... You can't just touch... Eep?!
SERIF_TABIT_APPRECIATION: Are you awake, leader? You exhausted, fell asleep. Do not worry. Tabit will do plans and work. Rest first. Brought water.
SERIF_TABIT_DAILY: Leader, today's orders? Understood. Team will commence hero show operation at one-oh-three-oh time on department roof. Will inform team.
SERIF_TABIT_EVENTA: Tabit will follow leader in galactic railway. However, Tabit's language system, grievously damaged. Sometimes, talk poorly. Forgive Tabit, leader.
SERIF_TABIT_EVENTB: That man... Digram?! Need to hear about Tronecion! W-What? The railway shaking! W-Wait!
SERIF_TABIT_EVENTC:
銀河鉄道のスタッフから新たなオーダー、了解！
リーダー！ミッション達成のため、
タビトの能力、存分にお役立てろ！
SERIF_TABIT_EVENTD:
任務終了、オーダーコンプリート！
…しかし、リーダーの疲労、検知。マッサージ
プログラム、起動。タビトに、お任せしろ。
SERIF_TABIT_HERO: Digram is always very strict, so seems blunt and inflexible. He is expressible, though. He jokes sometimes. ... Leader, you are too shocked.
SERIF_TABIT_PLAYER: Tabit, friends, care. That is Tabit's order. Leader, you talk, other soldiers. Tabit's ideal. Very good.
SERIF_TABIT_RELATION: Yoshiori has practiced skilled moves... techniques... He must have survived many battles as a soldier. Want him to train Tabit's friends.
SERIF_TABIT_TOUCH: Leader, interested in Tabit's body structure? Machines are different from cells, but bodies look the same. Wish to check?
SERIF_TAIKA_APPRECIATION:
Harumph. You've misread your own limits. Here, give me your task list.
I'll see that it is perfectly attended to. As for you,
I've arranged a perfect bed. Heal yourself atop it.
SERIF_TAIKA_DAILY:
The job of a butler is to guide their master to ever greater brilliance.
Thus, it is a butler's duty to lay the field and arrange affairs.
How about it? I imagine you'd like to have your affairs arranged as well, yes?
SERIF_TAIKA_EVENTA:
My master seeks peaceful solutions to this universe's problems, existing or otherwise.
Utterly admirable and beyond reproach, as one would expect of my finest work.
Heh. I'm sure you'd like to hear all about my perfect master and more!
SERIF_TAIKA_EVENTB:
From what I hear, it would seem you know very little about what it means to be an Observer.
Well, I'm afraid learning more is something you'll be unable to avoid.
Not when there's no turning back for you.
SERIF_TAIKA_EVENTC:
What is the meaning of this task list? You would give me the carrot and the stick,
the promise of rewards for the completion of tasks? Fascinating, I say!
You! You are to help me! We will wring them for all the rewards they have!
SERIF_TAIKA_EVENTD:
Did you see that?! A task rendered simple before my sheer perfection!
Help yourself to the rewards, as I need no such trifles.
I only sought the sense of accomplishment!
SERIF_TAIKA_HERO:
Heh. Gaze upon my master. An example of my finest work.
Arranged to flawless perfection. Hm? Ah, he clearly desires a break.
I shall fix him a spot of tea, then.
SERIF_TAIKA_PLAYER:
Hm. You have quite the bold streak to you, ever reaching for
that which you never will acquire. Quite fascinating.
Should you wish it, I would not mind treating you to a bit of my own arranging.
SERIF_TAIKA_RELATION:
Who does he think he is?! Smashing through my perfectly curated schedule
with brutish indifference. Is this some sort of challenge
for me, the perfect butler? Oh, just you wait—I'll have your affairs arranged one of these days!
SERIF_TAIKA_TOUCH:
Heh. Wishing to praise me for my perfection, I see. Very well.
I allow you to pet me as you wish.
Excuse me? Why have you stopped? Did I say you were allowed to stop?
SERIF_TAIKA_TRAIN: Hmph. I trust you're ready to be arranged, then.
SERIF_TAIKA_TRAINED: To think that I would submit!
SERIF_THEOREOL_APPRECIATION: You've a different expression about you than usual. Come, tell me what troubles your mind. I'll hear you out. Ten years, twenty years—doesn't matter, I'll be listening!
SERIF_THEOREOL_DAILY: This solid matter... candy! Of course, I know what this is! Now, let me help myself to... Hm? You are not supposed to eat the paper? Very well, I will update my knowledge.
SERIF_THEOREOL_EVENTA: Water like medicine and trees beautiful as the night stars! A city worth absorbing, indeed... Ah, worry not. I am simply speaking to myself.
SERIF_THEOREOL_EVENTB: Ablution? That is the process of taking these waters' medicinal effects into the body, no? Allow me to... Hm? I am not to drink the water? Why? Would it not be more efficient than simple immersion?
SERIF_THEOREOL_EVENTC:
Ah, I see. We must simply gather up Herbarium, yes?
Then allow me to start alchemizing them all.
Hm? That is forbidden, you say? A shame, but very well.
SERIF_THEOREOL_EVENTD:
That settles the exchange for rewards. Now,
allow me to analyze the commemorative goods... Obsidius?
Why that look?
SERIF_THEOREOL_HERO: W-Would you mind hiding me, for a spell? I was rather fascinated with Obsidius's collection, you see, and absorbed a bit of it. He did not take it well.
SERIF_THEOREOL_PLAYER: You feel neither fear nor disgust at the sight of my visage? What kind of information have you accumulated over the years to attain such a frame of mind? Fascinating! Utterly fascinating.
SERIF_THEOREOL_RELATION: I had quite a passionate discussion about health with Rakta. Though medicinal concoctions are a mere byproduct of alchemy, speaking with such an excited researcher is its own reward.
SERIF_THEOREOL_TOUCH: Oh? Taken by this failure of a body, are you, yes? I don't mind. Enjoy it as you will. By all means, take a piece if you like.
SERIF_THEOREOL_TRAIN: Let's see the effectiveness of this concoction...
SERIF_THEOREOL_TRAINED: Far too much information to parse!
SERIF_TOSHUVIRTUALFESTA2210_APPRECIATION: No matter where we are, you can never seem to stop pushing yourself too hard. Come, rest for a moment. University work has left me used to document organization.
SERIF_TOSHUVIRTUALFESTA2210_DAILY: I seem displeased? I suppose I could not hide it... We are to fight by the water, no? That is what worries me. You see, I am afraid I... cannot swim.
SERIF_TOSHUVIRTUALFESTA2210_EVENTA: Hm. Despite my efforts, my body simply does not move as usual, showing how much living flesh relies on the senses. This, too, is training to face with all my being.
SERIF_TOSHUVIRTUALFESTA2210_EVENTB: To not only steal a hero's appearance and techniques, but to use them to perform evil is an unforgivable act of the highest order! No matter the means, I will see that justice is carried out!
SERIF_TOSHUVIRTUALFESTA2210_HERO: Master Shaft's demeanor reflects more than simple nervousness. He is constantly observing his surroundings, ready to join us in battle should the moment call for it. A stance I can respect!
SERIF_TOSHUVIRTUALFESTA2210_PLAYER: I did not think I would end up partnered with you, but I appreciate fighting alongside one I know. Your skill, too, I know well... A-And no, I am not complimenting you!
SERIF_TOSHUVIRTUALFESTA2210_RELATION: reXer is a man of admirable passion, one driven by ideals and glory. He may show his fragility from time to time, but his core is true. It takes me back to the youth I once was.
SERIF_TOSHUVIRTUALFESTA2210_TOUCH: You insolent...! How many times must I tell you not to touch my beard?! N-No, I am not purring or anything of the sort! Forget what you just heard, right this instant!
SERIF_TOSHUVIRTUALFESTA2210_TRAIN: Come, let us cross swords! Have at you!
SERIF_TOSHUVIRTUALFESTA2210_TRAINED: Guh...! Perhaps it is I who still have ways to go!
SERIF_TOSHU_APPRECIATION: Overconfidence in your stamina will lead to ruin, young one. That is proof of the long path you have ahead of you. Come, sit or lie down. I will make you tea.
SERIF_TOSHU_DAILY: Hmph. Finally decided to show up, have you? I had just grown tired of polishing my armaments. Come, send me to battle. I shall win you the exploits you seek.
SERIF_TOSHU_HERO: That lecherous teacher is immature in both heart and technique, yet... he has those he wishes to protect—must protect. He will become stronger.
SERIF_TOSHU_PLAYER: I feel integrity in your resolve, yet you are still immature. You need the mind of a warrior to see your resolve through. Th-This is criticism, not advice! Misunderstand me not!
SERIF_TOSHU_RELATION: In all my years, I have never seen one so full of vitality for his age as Professor Marfik. Is that elder truly born of Earth?
SERIF_TOSHU_TOUCH: Guh?! You insolent...! You would dare touch my beard?! I-I have not cultivated it for the sake of your pleasure!
SERIF_TOSHU_TRAIN: I shall hone my techniques ever more! Have at you!
SERIF_TOSHU_TRAINED: Guhh?! Does your recklessness know no bounds?!
SERIF_TRAINEEEARTH_APPRECIATION: Hey there, Operator! Just like you need to cool down during training, you also need appropriate breaks in work! Come on, rest up, rest up!
SERIF_TRAINEEEARTH_DAILY: Morning! I've finished my daily run and I'm ready to go any time! Come on, let's get our superhero time started!
SERIF_TRAINEEEARTH_EVENTA: Hah! No need to fear, a superhero is here! Leave this to me! With my perfectly trained body, I'll knock out any task you've got for me!
SERIF_TRAINEEEARTH_HERO: I look up to the heroes from space, of course, but I'm proud of being earthborn. There's got to be a place for us, something we can protect.
SERIF_TRAINEEEARTH_PLAYER: I heard word about you before I started working with this company! They said you were an operator far more talented than your experience would suggest! Proud to work with you!
SERIF_TRAINEEEARTH_RELATION: There's hundreds of hero agencies on this planet, and while they're all competitors, we all feel equally strongly that we want to protect this planet.
SERIF_TRAINEEEARTH_TOUCH: Feel that? Yeah, that's a body forged by hard days of heroing. Touch it as much as you like! E-Er, m-maybe not there...
SERIF_TRAINEEFIRE_APPRECIATION: Hey there, Operator! Just like you need to cool down during training, you also need appropriate breaks in work! Come on, rest up, rest up!
SERIF_TRAINEEFIRE_DAILY: Morning! I've finished my daily run and I'm ready to go any time! Come on, let's get our superhero time started!

SERIF_TRAINEEFIRE_HERO: I look up to the heroes from space, of course, but I'm proud of being earthborn. There's got to be a place for us, something we can protect.
SERIF_TRAINEEFIRE_PLAYER: I heard word about you before I started working with this company! They said you were an operator far more talented than your experience would suggest! Proud to work with you!
