SERIF_TSUNEAKIROOKIES2408_APPRECIATION:
Operator, I've brought you something to munch on!
Now, I won't ask you what happened, but at least let me
stay by your side until you feel better.
SERIF_TSUNEAKIROOKIES2408_DAILY:
There sure are all kinds in Orient City.
Come to think of it, I wanted to ask about where you live. Oh,
don't worry, I'm not going to be inviting myself in. Honest!
SERIF_TSUNEAKIROOKIES2408_EVENTA:
Nothing quite as exciting as an event the whole neighborhood's in on!
To be honest, I only got interested in local events like these when I grew up.
I've just been through a lot, you see.
SERIF_TSUNEAKIROOKIES2408_EVENTB:
I don't know if anyone would be glad to be greeted by a nameless Hero like me.
What's that? There is someone? You think so?
You're not buttering me up just to get me to work extra, are you?
SERIF_TSUNEAKIROOKIES2408_EVENTC:
Ohh, a stamp rally, huh? So you do the tasks written here,
then you get them stamped and trade them in for prizes?
Wait a second, you can't fool me! This is just work!
SERIF_TSUNEAKIROOKIES2408_EVENTD:
So, what do you think this is? That's right, a reward!
The two of us put in the effort, and besides, it's Hero Fiesta!
Surely we can enjoy ourselves as well, no?
SERIF_TSUNEAKIROOKIES2408_HERO:
Interspecies brothers, huh. I'm jealous, honestly.
See, when I look at Canes and Sterio, I get the feeling that my dream
might come true without much difficulty.
SERIF_TSUNEAKIROOKIES2408_PLAYER:
I'm sure the people at your agency will come through for you when you need them.
When you have something that you can't share, even with them, well...
that's my cue. Talk to me anytime. My door's always open.
SERIF_TSUNEAKIROOKIES2408_RELATION:
That bureaucrat, the one that's awfully fond of himself? Well,
he's pretty fond of you too, but the guy's just so mean to me!
How about we both talk to him at the same time next time and observe what happens?
SERIF_TSUNEAKIROOKIES2408_TOUCH:
You clearly don't know the meaning of the word caution, do you?
Teasing these old bones so hard and so often? Heh, got you!
There's no getting away now... Or, wait. Was this what you were after?
SERIF_TSUNEAKIROOKIES2408_TRAIN: Want to see what this old man's made of?
SERIF_TSUNEAKIROOKIES2408_TRAINED: W-Whoa, let's reel it in a bit—huh?! You're going to keep going?!
SERIF_TSUNEAKI_APPRECIATION: You're tired, aren't you? Wait, you can't even tell how tired you are, can you? C'mon, you can afford to blow off work for a day. Blow off work and go on a date with this old- timer... Huh? You can't?
SERIF_TSUNEAKI_DAILY: Huh? You're interested in my private life?! In some off-clock escapades? Well, if you're all right taking a step there's no turning back from, we could spend some time together.
SERIF_TSUNEAKI_EVENTA: Welcome to the Shinraku Festival! As a local, I welcome you with open arms. Well, have lots of fun and spend lots of money!
SERIF_TSUNEAKI_EVENTB: Whoa-hoh, Gammei's letting it all hang out... But, why not, right? We can afford to let loose during a festival, at least.
SERIF_TSUNEAKI_EVENTC: Bringing office work with you on a business trip? Aren't you diligent! Well, I'll be cheering you on from the background... Wait, I've gotta do this, too?!
SERIF_TSUNEAKI_EVENTD: Whew, glad that's over! So, how about I take you to an incredible restaurant as a reward for how hard you worked, hm?
SERIF_TSUNEAKI_HERO: I'm a solo agency kind of hero, but I'm pretty well known in the industry. I've even worked together with that famous hero... You know, er... What was his name again?
SERIF_TSUNEAKI_PLAYER: Ahh, you're a lot stronger than word on the street said. I can see why people want you taken care of... Hm? Who'd I hear that from? My little secret!
SERIF_TSUNEAKI_RELATION: Kouki really has it all together, huh? Acting, guesting, co-starring... He's everywhere! I can't keep up! Still, I think he could stand to take it a little easier.
SERIF_TSUNEAKI_TOUCH: Oh-hoh! Sorry about that! Dodged on instinct. Still, what're you thinking, getting all handsy? Ahah, just kidding. Come on over! Feel free!
SERIF_TSUNEAKI_TRAIN: My training isn't easy. Think you can handle it?
SERIF_TSUNEAKI_TRAINED: Pant, pant... I can't go any more...
SERIF_TURBAK_APPRECIATION:
You look kind of down. What's up?
I'll listen, if you want to share anything. And I mean it!
I'll take half of that pain of yours and turn it into joy!
SERIF_TURBAK_DAILY:
A trip isn't just about seeing people and places.
It's about meeting them, convening with them, communing with the land, and linking hearts.
That's the kind of joy I want to bring to my customers!
SERIF_TURBAK_EVENTA:
Hey there! Not sure which festival to start with? Well,
allow me to show you around the places of interest!
I'll make sure you don't miss out on any of the event's appeal!
SERIF_TURBAK_EVENTB:
All right, timetable is organized, supplies are in order...
Oh! I hadn't finished lunch arrangements!
Guh... This kind of stuff is so much harder than escorting.
SERIF_TURBAK_EVENTC:
You'll help me out at work? Thanks!
Honestly, I have so many tasks lined up my head is spinning.
I'll thank you properly later!
SERIF_TURBAK_EVENTD:
Thanks, that helped a lot!
Let me know if there's anything I can do to thank you.
I mean it! I'll do anything I can!
SERIF_TURBAK_HERO:
Barrel is such a good guy!
He's so nice to just about anybody, like a real Hero should be.
I gotta take notes and do my best!
SERIF_TURBAK_PLAYER:
Say, you go to all sorts of different planets on business trips, right?
Any places you have deep memories of and attachments to?
Me, I have more than I can count! How about we swap stories?
SERIF_TURBAK_RELATION:
Shidemasu from the agency is such a nice guy!
He's so worried about how many business trips I go on, so he
introduced me to all sorts of insurance packages. I signed up for all of them, of course!
SERIF_TURBAK_TOUCH:
Haha! This kind of physical contact is the good stuff!
Being touched by you like this truly makes me feel like
I'm having your thoughts and emotions carved into me far more than with just words.
SERIF_TURBAK_TRAINED: Tough, but I have to hold on!
SERIF_VALORAY_APPRECIATION:
You are such a hard worker. I'm worried that
you might be pushing yourself too hard. You're sleeping properly, right? Eating right and staying hydrated?
Oh, I know—let's take a quick break before you fall over. Sound good?
SERIF_VALORAY_DAILY:
I actually have a travel food recipe book published.
It details how to cook everything, the safest routes to the ingredients, methods of
preventing accident and injury... Hm? Doesn't every recipe book have that kind of information?
SERIF_VALORAY_EVENTA:
You can't let your guard down when traveling through the desert! You might
get blown away by a sudden sandstorm and fall into a forest of cacti!
Oh, I-I know, we should put cushions over our rumps just in case!
SERIF_VALORAY_EVENTB:
A legendary chocolate elixir... I love it! How mystical, how romantic!
That, I'll have to check with my own eyes and taste buds!
Off on our adventure, to find the grand recipe sleeping in the desert!
SERIF_VALORAY_EVENTC:
This is our current target list.
There's a few ingredients you can only pick up in dangerous areas, but don't worry.
I'm with you.
SERIF_VALORAY_EVENTD:
Wow! I didn't think you'd gather up this many!
You have ingredient-hunter potential, you know that?
Anyway, since we have them all fresh, let's cook these up together!
SERIF_VALORAY_HERO:
To meet with a correct death? Vlaham has quite the
unique desire. I can understand part of it, though.
After all, we live atop the lives taken from other beings.
SERIF_VALORAY_PLAYER:
You work on all sorts of planets, don't you?
Just like me. If you have time, could you share some tales of your trips with me?
I just love hearing adventure stories!
SERIF_VALORAY_RELATION:
I'll often learn recipes and cooking techniques from Yuhang, but he does this thing
where every ingredient he sets eyes on, no matter what, he puts it in his mouth!
I never react fast enough to stop him, and it feels like I'm about to have a heart attack every time.
SERIF_VALORAY_TOUCH:
Oh, curious about these horns of mine? Haha, well,
they actually detect danger, you see. I'm pretty proud of them.
Here, I'll even let you touch them. Go ahead!
SERIF_VALORAY_TRAIN: I'll be gentle. Just let me know if it hurts, okay?
SERIF_VALORAY_TRAINED: I-I might be too old for this!
SERIF_VICTOMHEROFESTA2109_APPRECIATION: How about you go and join the fun...? I suppose not. You look too tired for it. Take some time to rest. I'll take care of the luggage.
SERIF_VICTOMHEROFESTA2109_DAILY: I'll say this once. We're here to do work. Don't get distracted by the stalls and... Agh, fine. I'll buy you one on our break. Just hold on until then.
SERIF_VICTOMHEROFESTA2109_EVENTA: Is it truly so strange to see me wearing so little? I don't want to be sweating out here, you know. Though, I can't imagine my scars are a pleasant sight.
SERIF_VICTOMHEROFESTA2109_EVENTB: Ahh... I have you to thank for what I look like now. I don't look scary like this, do I? Will I be able to... get a smile from you-know-who?
SERIF_VICTOMHEROFESTA2109_HERO: I trust and respect the chief, but that frivolousness of his I simply cannot abide. That is not to say he does not take his job seriously, but still...
SERIF_VICTOMHEROFESTA2109_PLAYER: You like summer, too? Me... not so much. The people grow slack with joy and fall into leisure-based accidents far more often. That, and... it gets hot under my mask.
SERIF_VICTOMHEROFESTA2109_RELATION: Gammei may not look it, but he's prone to pushing himself on the job. It's worrying to see. In the last case, he... Ah, speak of the devil, he's here.
SERIF_VICTOMHEROFESTA2109_TOUCH: Hey, get off me! It's hot enough out, so I don't need your body heat in the mix! At least... do it in the shade.
SERIF_VICTOM_APPRECIATION: Accumulation of fatigue will only sabotage your mission endeavors, and a tired commander leads to a demoralized force. In other words, rest. Don't make me worry this much.
SERIF_VICTOM_DAILY: Yes, I'm here. Now, what mission am I to do today? And don't worry, it will take a lot more than you're thinking to kill me.
SERIF_VICTOM_HERO: That rookie is as green as they come. He's such a coward, but he throws himself into his tasks with such reckless determination... I'm a bit fond of people like that, though.
SERIF_VICTOM_PLAYER: Your conduct is risky and worrying, but protecting your life is part of my duty. Use my body as a shield as you will.
SERIF_VICTOM_RELATION: I cannot understand what that waiter's thinking. Get along? With the Kaibutsu? Impossible. The only good Kaibutsu is a dead Kaibutsu.
SERIF_VICTOM_TOUCH: What? You want to see my face? Give it up. Nothing good will come of it. But, if you absolutely have to... maybe eventually.
SERIF_VICTOM_TRAIN: Don't think of this as practice. Begin!
SERIF_VICTOM_TRAINED: Gh...! Tough, I'll give you that!
SERIF_VISCUNAM_APPRECIATION: Operator, you look a little drowsy, and there's no greater killer of inspiration than sleep deprivation! Now, if you have no other option, I have this hyper-stimulant drink that will... Oh? You'll just rest instead? Suit yourself!
SERIF_VISCUNAM_DAILY: Why do I continue to invent? To carve my name into history! To ensure that I am not forgotten! I've never forgotten to sign an invention, after all!
SERIF_VISCUNAM_EVENTA: The energy powering all of these lights... Goodness, if I had just a bit of it, I could make all the devices and concoctions I wanted! Christmas truly is a magical season.
SERIF_VISCUNAM_EVENTB: Santa's sled is drawn by animals, but there's still room for improvement. How about a quadrupedal propulsion system? Or perhaps a self-delivery system on the presents?
SERIF_VISCUNAM_HERO: Gomeisa's Parallel Weapon can spawn ice. So... if I affix this unlimited syrup device to it... Oh, this will be an unforgettable invention!
SERIF_VISCUNAM_PLAYER: I hear you go from planet to planet on work, so how about trying a ride on my spaceship? I built it myself! You can't choose where you go, unfortunately, but the speed is inc... What? You'll pass?
SERIF_VISCUNAM_RELATION: I sense an impressive effort towards research in that girl's stance toward the craft of song. I cannot, however, forgive her for calling the fruits of my brilliance "junk"!
SERIF_VISCUNAM_TOUCH: Oh? You wish to see my research up close? Wonderful! I praise your curiosity and welcome you to experience it to your heart's desire! Now, sit here and start by taking off your clothes!
SERIF_VISCUNAM_TRAIN: Experience my inventions up close and personal!
SERIF_VLAHAM_APPRECIATION:
Take my hand and close your eyes. Yes, just like that.
Worry about nothing. Whatever trouble or worry you may have,
this hand will never abandon you.
SERIF_VLAHAM_DAILY:
Ruins and graveyards are proof that people have lived and lived well.
To think that something so beautiful, so admirable yet remains, fading not and crumbling not...
Oh, I can wait no longer. Let us hurry and visit them!
SERIF_VLAHAM_EVENTA:
I hold little love for strong sunlight, but if a pharaoh's tomb
is waiting to be visited, I cannot allow myself to falter!
L-Let us... hngh, be off!
SERIF_VLAHAM_EVENTB:
Chocolate that revives the dead? Do the rumors have any veracity?
I must say that I am curious as to the flavor, as well.
Operator, have you any fondness for sweets?
SERIF_VLAHAM_EVENTC:
Gathering ingredients to help Valoray, are you?
Ah, chocolate darker than the black of night and more sanguinely sweet than blood.
I can hardly wait for its completion. Let us do our utmost together.
SERIF_VLAHAM_EVENTD:
And that is that. What a collection we've collected here.
And I must credit you with how quickly we finished. Now,
since we have time, how about we enjoy the chocolate festival together?
SERIF_VLAHAM_HERO:
Gaius, one who seeks his roots.
There is no truth or falsehood in life created, only reasons.
Yet his desire to take back that which has faded, that which is lost, I can understand.
SERIF_VLAHAM_PLAYER:
That power of yours that you cannot fully control...
As a keeper of monsters, I can see much of myself in you.
Worry not. Whatever manner of being you may be, I shall protect you.
SERIF_VLAHAM_RELATION:
Valoray's penchant for worrying surprises me somewhat.
Yet I imagine his consistent concern for safety will allow many to
live healthy, thriving lives. A wonderful stance indeed.
SERIF_VLAHAM_TOUCH:
You would touch a monster of your own will? I have scarcely seen one as reckless as you.
Very well, this seems entertaining enough. I will humor you.
Just know that there will be no turning back, not even in the face of regret.
SERIF_VLAHAM_TRAINED: Ah, I can feel it! The breath of life!
SERIF_VULPECULAMIRRORS2511_APPRECIATION:
You were by all means supposed to live in a beautiful present.
Who in the stars was it that stole that from you?
Should you desire, I can and will steal it back for you.
SERIF_VULPECULAMIRRORS2511_DAILY:
Haha! Interested in my personal life, are you?
Honestly, I'm surprised you elected to ask me directly rather than
skulk in the shadows like a detective. You always do amuse me, you know that?
SERIF_VULPECULAMIRRORS2511_EVENTA:
The mechanical clock that advances ever forward, never turning back to the past.
One might call that my symbol, an expression of Dashing Thief Vulpecula.
Now, I must wonder. Just how much of the past has this town's clock tower left behind?
SERIF_VULPECULAMIRRORS2511_EVENTB:
Alas. I must say, Heroes are quite a vexing folk.
I can't seem to avoid them no matter where I go.
Regardless, my goal here is not theft, so I shall leave them be if they stay out of my way.
SERIF_VULPECULAMIRRORS2511_EVENTC:
I cannot comprehend the desire to leave a record of one's activities.
Yet, if this is what you need now, then
I shall assist you in this fool's errand.
SERIF_VULPECULAMIRRORS2511_EVENTD:
You have taken your rewards, yes? Excellent. Then this is nothing but past glory, a useless relic.
What suits you is a glorious present! A beautiful future!
SERIF_VULPECULAMIRRORS2511_HERO:
It's the strangest thing, but that picture book author Hero is utterly fascinating to me.
Is this pity? Empathy?
Don't tell me it's jealousy? No, that simply could not be.
SERIF_VULPECULAMIRRORS2511_PLAYER:
I must say that I am rather fond of this form of mine, but it is unfortunate
that not everyone can observe it. Perhaps the time has come
for me to well and truly steal you away? Eheh heh.
SERIF_VULPECULAMIRRORS2511_RELATION:
An endless world of fantasy with neither future nor past.
An eternal moment, a beautiful now with all its glitz and glamour...
I do love the circus.
SERIF_VULPECULAMIRRORS2511_TOUCH:
Oh? Inviting me to dance, are you? Why, I wouldn't mind.
You've been able to observe me as I am now, after all.
I'm sure we'd be able to have a lovely time together. Come, let us enjoy ourselves.
SERIF_VULPECULAMIRRORS2511_TRAINED: D-Do be considerate of my stamina, as well!
SERIF_VULPECULA_APPRECIATION: A wilting flower needs water. You have the potential to be a symbol of a beautiful future, and I cannot let you wither. Now, take some time to rest.
SERIF_VULPECULA_DAILY: Greetings, esteemed operator, blessed by the light of justice. What is it you wish of me? The destruction of the past, or the creation of the future? Whichever it is, I await your orders.
SERIF_VULPECULA_EVENTA: Greetings, my dear captives of the past. Tonight, I, the dashing thief Vulpecula, will make all pasts as petals scattered in the wind.
SERIF_VULPECULA_EVENTB: Showtime has begun, Alchiba. Allow me to elevate your unaesthetic being into something artistic and beautiful.
SERIF_VULPECULA_EVENTC: An old man who has reclaimed himself, with forget-me-nots at his feet. As sweetness fills the night, I have descended to Earth to change those venomous flowers into rainbow rain.
SERIF_VULPECULA_EVENTD: Love, emotion... They are so much like the venom of a scorpion. It ravages the body after numbing it, gradually stealing one's sanity. And that... is how I came to be.
SERIF_VULPECULA_HERO: Alchiba, the detective. There is no one in all space I understand less than he. He hates the self of his past, yet he protects the past of others. Simply not beautiful.
SERIF_VULPECULA_PLAYER: A flower bud is life inherited from the past... yet hope for the future, as well. For now, at least, I will refrain from nipping you.
SERIF_VULPECULA_RELATION: He is slightly lacking, I feel, in the courage to make the decision to cast out the past. His mental bondage is such a shame to see.
SERIF_VULPECULA_TOUCH: Ah, you've caught me. Should I interpret seeking such contact as a sign you are ready to have your past stolen away?
SERIF_VULPECULA_TRAIN: I shall show you a blooming most beautiful.
SERIF_WOLFMANEARTH_APPRECIATION: How about we wrap up work and go for a drink? I know a place with great food. A little dirty, sure, but still. Probably not a place folks on the straight and narrow know, haha.
SERIF_WOLFMANEARTH_DAILY: Oh, what kind of work are we doing today? I'll do anything to keep my cats fed! Hm? What should you call me? Whatever you want!
SERIF_WOLFMANEARTH_HERO: There's a lotta villains who want to become heroes, but can't. To them, heroes are just a reminder of what they can't have.
SERIF_WOLFMANEARTH_PLAYER: Since you're out on the front lines but can't fight, make sure you keep yourself safe, all right? I'm not good at protecting people in a fight.
SERIF_WOLFMANEARTH_RELATION: Heroes, villains, they've all got their own senses of justice, of right and wrong, things they fight for. What do I fight for? The cute and fluffy, of course!
SERIF_WOLFMANEARTH_TOUCH: Whoa! Hey, come on, hands off! You're gonna make me get all hot and bothered! Huh? There was some cat hair on me? O-Oh, thanks...
SERIF_WOLFMANEARTH_TRAIN: Get ready to meet your maker!
SERIF_WOLFMANEARTH_TRAINED: Damn it! You win! Do what you want with me!
SERIF_WOLFMANSHADOW_APPRECIATION: How about we wrap up work and go for a drink? I know a place with great food. A little dirty, sure, but still. Probably not a place folks on the straight and narrow know, haha.
SERIF_WOLFMANSHADOW_DAILY: Need something done? Sure. I'll wrap our enemies in a shadow darker than night. So, what's the job? Huh? Oh. Oh...
SERIF_WOLFMANSHADOW_EVENTA: Hahaha! You would seek to tame me, the shadow itself?! I commend your boldness! Oh, but I'd like my paycheck upfront if possible. Dunno if I have food money today.
SERIF_WOLFMANSHADOW_HERO: There's a lotta villains who want to become heroes, but can't. To them, heroes are just a reminder of what they can't have.
SERIF_WOLFMANSHADOW_PLAYER: Since you're out on the front lines but can't fight, make sure you keep yourself safe, all right? I'm not good at protecting people in a fight.
SERIF_WOLFMANSHADOW_RELATION: Heroes are just too bright, but they do make my shadowy outline that much clearer. Hey, can you point that camera somewhere else?
SERIF_WOLFMANSHADOW_TOUCH: You must fear nothing, trying to touch shadows so. Don't come crying to me if you get swallowed up. W-Wait, not under my chin! That feels too good!
SERIF_WOLFMANSHADOW_TRAIN: Get ready to meet your maker!
SERIF_WOLFMANSHADOW_TRAINED: Damn it! You win! Do what you want with me!
SERIF_WRESTLEREARTH_APPRECIATION:
あぁ？何、疲れただと…？オイ、テメェあんま
ナメた真似してんじゃねぇぞッ！後は俺に任せて
飯食って休みやがれっ！心配だろうが、コラァッ！
SERIF_WRESTLEREARTH_DAILY:
俺たちのモットーは、子供が楽しめるプロレスだ。
舞台衣装も、トゲトゲはヒールの命だが…子供が
怖がっちまうから、最小限かつ柔らか素材だぜ！
SERIF_WRESTLEREARTH_EVENTA:
この俺と契約を結ぼうってぇのか！？面白ぇ！
子供の夢を守るためなら、一肌でも二肌でも
脱いでやろうじゃねぇかっ、ガハハハッ！
SERIF_WRESTLEREARTH_EVENTC:
興行収入の分だけギャラが出るんだろ？
…よーしっ、気合い入れてくぜ？ギャハハハァッ！
覚悟しなぁ、ガキ共ぉ！全員攫っちまうぞぉ！
SERIF_WRESTLEREARTH_EVENTD:
いやぁ、最高の盛り上がりだったなオイ！
お陰で子供たちにも滅茶苦茶喜んでもらえたぜ！
テメェのオペレーション、最高だったぜぇッ！
SERIF_WRESTLEREARTH_HERO:
俺たちはヴィランじゃねぇが、悪役だ。
ヒーローもベビーフェイスだけじゃ輝かねぇ。
感動を届けるにゃあ、ヒールってのが必要なのさ。
SERIF_WRESTLEREARTH_PLAYER:
観測者っつうのは、ただそこにいるだけで
怖がられちまうこともあるんだろ？…俺も経験が
ないわけじゃねぇ。ちっとばかし同情しちまうぜ。
SERIF_WRESTLEREARTH_RELATION:
ヒール軍団のメンツは、やたらと顔が厳ついが、
ああ見えて子供好きな奴らばっかりだぜ！
ま、俺もヒトのこと言えねえツラか、ガハハッ！
SERIF_WRESTLEREARTH_TOUCH:
おおっと！ファンサービスをご希望みてぇだな！
…だが、子供たちが帰るまでちょっと待ちな。
とっておきのショータイムにしてやるぜぇ…？
SERIF_WRESTLEREARTH_TRAIN: 今ならまだ痛い目見ずに済むぜぇ？
SERIF_WRESTLEREARTH_TRAINED: ぐっ…！　骨身に沁みるぜぇ…！

怖がっちまうから、最小限かつ柔らか素材だぜ！
SERIF_WRESTLERWATER_EVENTA:
この俺と契約を結ぼうってぇのか！？面白ぇ！
子供の夢を守るためなら、一肌でも二肌でも
脱いでやろうじゃねぇかっ、ガハハハッ！
SERIF_WRESTLERWATER_EVENTC:
興行収入の分だけギャラが出るんだろ？
…よーしっ、気合い入れてくぜ？ギャハハハァッ！
覚悟しなぁ、ガキ共ぉ！全員攫っちまうぞぉ！
SERIF_WRESTLERWATER_EVENTD:
いやぁ、最高の盛り上がりだったなオイ！
お陰で子供たちにも滅茶苦茶喜んでもらえたぜ！
テメェのオペレーション、最高だったぜぇッ！
SERIF_WRESTLERWATER_HERO:
俺たちはヴィランじゃねぇが、悪役だ。
ヒーローもベビーフェイスだけじゃ輝かねぇ。
感動を届けるにゃあ、ヒールってのが必要なのさ。
SERIF_WRESTLERWATER_PLAYER:
観測者っつうのは、ただそこにいるだけで
怖がられちまうこともあるんだろ？…俺も経験が
ないわけじゃねぇ。ちっとばかし同情しちまうぜ。
SERIF_WRESTLERWATER_RELATION:
ヒール軍団のメンツは、やたらと顔が厳ついが、
ああ見えて子供好きな奴らばっかりだぜ！
ま、俺もヒトのこと言えねえツラか、ガハハッ！
SERIF_WRESTLERWATER_TOUCH:
おおっと！ファンサービスをご希望みてぇだな！
…だが、子供たちが帰るまでちょっと待ちな。
とっておきのショータイムにしてやるぜぇ…？
SERIF_WRESTLERWATER_TRAIN: 今ならまだ痛い目見ずに済むぜぇ？
SERIF_WRESTLERWATER_TRAINED: ぐっ…！　骨身に沁みるぜぇ…！
SERIF_YASUHIKO_APPRECIATION: Oh, Operator, you look very tired! Well, step into my tent and lay it on me! Big worries, little complaints, I'll listen to it all! The audience won't like seeing you miserable, after all.
SERIF_YASUHIKO_DAILY: Zdravstvujte, Operator! Let us continue to hone our art, as we do every day! Hm? Work comes first? Right, right, practice comes after!
SERIF_YASUHIKO_EVENTA: We can't entertain the audience if there is no audience! We have to bring this circus back—the troupe needs us!
SERIF_YASUHIKO_EVENTB: This lion is Renato, and this tiger is Bogdan. They're both sweet, really! See, they look like they want you to pet them!
SERIF_YASUHIKO_HERO: I think the core of Vulpecula's whole act are those beautiful illusions. If only he would join our troupe!
SERIF_YASUHIKO_PLAYER: I think you're pretty good at this, you know? I think the audience would really like you, so how about trying something a bit more daring? Like a tightrope or trapeze!
SERIF_YASUHIKO_RELATION: I get called out to perform at Nessen's resort often. Incredible audiences and hot springs after work... Gosh, I'm so glad we're in the same agency!
SERIF_YASUHIKO_TOUCH: W-Whoa! You can't touch me! If you want to touch something, the animals are right... Huh? You'd rather touch me? H-Hey, stop poking my belly! Q-Quit it!
SERIF_YASUHIKO_TRAINED: Stop, stop! You're being too serious!
SERIF_YOHACKLASTRESORT2506_APPRECIATION:
Don't be a stranger if you need anything!
If you need me, Operator, I'll come running no matter where in the universe you are!
SERIF_YOHACKLASTRESORT2506_DAILY:
Hey, Operator! Let's have some fun out in the water!
I'll be the inner tube, so let's go out and get our float on... Huh?
What's so funny?
SERIF_YOHACKLASTRESORT2506_EVENTA:
I was so happy to be called in to revitalize Enoshima Village!
I mean, this is protecting someone's dear hometown—what could be better?
SERIF_YOHACKLASTRESORT2506_EVENTB:
This is my first time driving a jet ski,
but I have to say—blasting through wind and waves feels great!
You should hop on and ride with me sometime!
SERIF_YOHACKLASTRESORT2506_EVENTC:
I see. I understand everything!
We gather stamps and get rewards!
Our walk together around the island is going to be super fun!
SERIF_YOHACKLASTRESORT2506_EVENTD:
Eheheh, we got a bunch of stamps, huh! And I had a lot of fun,
getting to go around Enoshima with you!
I'll always treasure this memory!
SERIF_YOHACKLASTRESORT2506_HERO:
I understand why Saotome cares so deeply about his home.
So if there's something he's really worried about,
this time, I wanna help him out!
SERIF_YOHACKLASTRESORT2506_PLAYER:
Are you okay? The sunlight's awfully strong.
Eheheh, I'm glad I brought along some sunscreen!
Leave your skincare to me!
SERIF_YOHACKLASTRESORT2506_RELATION:
Astar's so stoic and so cool!
Just look at how he runs over the beach every day to train himself!
Being Santa really is a tough job, huh?
SERIF_YOHACKLASTRESORT2506_TOUCH:
Hold on tight, Operator! I'm gonna speed up the jet ski a bit!
Heh, getting this close kinda has my heart racing...
SERIF_YOHACKLASTRESORT2506_TRAIN: There won't be any stopping me!
SERIF_YOHACK_APPRECIATION: Hey, Operator, you look pretty hungry! Heh heh, see, I live in Muirauqa and cook a pretty mean fish fillet! Just sit tight and I'll whip one up for you!
SERIF_YOHACK_DAILY: You look like you're in a spot of trouble! Well, let me help! Er, document organization, cleaning, supply replacement, calls to clients... Okay, I understand every... Er. Can I get that again one at a time?
SERIF_YOHACK_EVENTA: I've never met you on-site before, Operator! Let's do our best guarding the gallery! Oh, and we get to go to the festival together, too! Sweet!
SERIF_YOHACK_EVENTB: A masquerade? You put on masks and, uh, dance? All right! Got it, mostly! I've never done this before, but I got this! I'm sure it'll work out!
SERIF_YOHACK_EVENTC:
Visit the workshop and pick up the corsages?
Ah, I get it. Understood!
We're good for more than just security!
SERIF_YOHACK_EVENTD:
Alright! Job accomplished!
The people at Cloche are happy,
and I'm happy to be here with you, Operator!
SERIF_YOHACK_HERO: Nessen's suit is so fancy and nice, don't you think? Maybe I'd look like I had it together a bit more if I wore a suit like that!
SERIF_YOHACK_PLAYER: Operator, a lot of people turn to you for a lot of jobs, right? Well, you can turn to me for anything! I'll always be happy to help!
SERIF_YOHACK_RELATION: Astosis was a neighbor of mine until I moved out! He's so nice, so friendly, and always studies hard... I really look up to him!
SERIF_YOHACK_TOUCH: Whoa, that tickles! What are you... Oh! I understand everything! You want a hug, right? Well, I hear you loud and clear! Here goes!
SERIF_YOHACK_TRAIN: Heard being a bit rough sometimes is okay!
SERIF_YOSHIORITRAIN2305_APPRECIATION: I know how hard you focus on the battlefield. But there's no point if you wear yourself out and fall over. Look, I'm telling you to fall back and rest. Now.
SERIF_YOSHIORITRAIN2305_DAILY: Everything on the galactic railway's just as high class as the rumors said. Hm? How can I tell? Because I can! I know these things... Hey, what're you laughing for?!
SERIF_YOSHIORITRAIN2305_EVENTA: Gh-Ghosts? Hah, like hell there's ghosts! Dumb as hell, I tell ya. Let's head to the next car now. Wait... Did that door just open by itself? D-Don't tell me...
SERIF_YOSHIORITRAIN2305_EVENTB: Didn't think I'd ride the galactic railway with you. Well, since I'm here, guess I'll help myself to a nice treat. What's with that look? There something wrong with me enjoying some sweets?!
SERIF_YOSHIORITRAIN2305_EVENTC:
スタッフから記念品の収集を頼まれた？…まあ、
どうせやることもなくて暇だしな。報酬もあるなら
言う事なしだ。さっさと片付けちまおうぜ。
SERIF_YOSHIORITRAIN2305_EVENTD:
一通り片付いたな。今日の所はこんなモンだろ。
なんつうか、お前の動きも悪くなかったぜ。
…んだよ、褒めてやってんだから喜べよ！
SERIF_YOSHIORITRAIN2305_HERO: That Esperdica's always grinning. Can't get a read on him. But what really puzzles me is... how does he know everything I like to eat?
SERIF_YOSHIORITRAIN2305_PLAYER: You can't measure up to Exio, not yet. Not enough experience, sloppy decision-making, and poor reactions. What I'm saying is... I'll protect you, too.
SERIF_YOSHIORITRAIN2305_RELATION: Looks like Tabit cares most about his squadmates. Lot of love for his comrades there... He's got the human touch. Watching him really takes me back.
SERIF_YOSHIORITRAIN2305_TOUCH: Hm? What's with you? We're in the middle of a mission here, so bug me later. Nnn? Hey, that tickles! Quit it! You want to be protected or not?!
SERIF_YOSHIORI_APPRECIATION: Tch, look at you. Sloppy. Get yourself in shape, build some stamina—you're not keeping this operation going otherwise. And if you're sleeping, do it in bed. I'll carry you.
SERIF_YOSHIORI_DAILY: I'll warn you, my loyalty's with Exio. You've hired me and I'll do what you said, but I didn't sell you my soul. Remember that.
SERIF_YOSHIORI_HERO: Monomasa kind of gets on my nerves, but he's someone you can trust. He may look like that, but he's surprisingly... sentimental.
SERIF_YOSHIORI_PLAYER: Exio's acknowledgment doesn't come easy, and you've won it. I'm guessing that means you're a real dangerous character.
SERIF_YOSHIORI_RELATION: I owe everything to Exio, and I'll do anything to protect him. Even if it costs what little life I have left.
SERIF_YOSHIORI_TOUCH: Nwah?! Just because you can see me doesn't mean you can touch me! Gwah?! H-Hey, hands off the right arm! It gets all weird whenever you touch it!
SERIF_YOSHIORI_TRAIN: All right, you and me, let's go!
SERIF_YOTARO_APPRECIATION:
Even you get tired, huh? How about we head out for a bit, then?
Let's go out and eat on the road, as they say.
I'll show you a particularly good spot I know.
SERIF_YOTARO_DAILY:
Would you like to buy something? It pays to be prepared, as they say.
Oh, and I have Gaisei keep the shelves stocked, so to speak.
He needs to compensate me for everything he breaks one way or another.
SERIF_YOTARO_EVENTA:
W-Whoa, they got Heroes on security.
Gaisei, listen, and please listen well. They'll catch you if
they find you, so be as stealthy as you ca—w-wait, where'd you go?!
SERIF_YOTARO_EVENTB:
A ceremony on the Moon... It has quite a few agencies in attendance,
just like I'd researched. This means it'll be easy to read the flow
of the market, and there'll be a lot of valuable information to be found.
What a wonderful event!
SERIF_YOTARO_EVENTC:
You want helping hands for ceremony preparations? Now, we are Villains,
but I suppose beggars can't be choosers, as they say.
It's always important to consider the balance of risk and return!
SERIF_YOTARO_EVENTD:
It's all done. Good job! With this level of reward,
I won't need to worry about the shop as much. We've hit pay dirt, as they say.
Eheheh, what do you say we go out and treat ourselves to something sweet?
SERIF_YOTARO_HERO:
That person in the powered suit has such a strange blend of scents and flavors
about him. Just someone completely out of the ordinary, as they say.
And he seems younger than me, too.
SERIF_YOTARO_PLAYER:
You're an Observer as well, so I'm sure you must have had plenty of painful experiences,
yet not only does Gaisei acknowledge you, but you can fight out in the public eye.
Honestly, I'm jealous of that strength.
SERIF_YOTARO_RELATION:
Gaisei always tries to solve problems by breaking things,
so paying for damages always has me in the red. I tell him to reel it in too.
Let's see what he broke this time... What?! An entire building?! Agghh!
SERIF_YOTARO_TOUCH:
H-Hey, no sudden headpats like that!
Even the closest relationships demand etiquette, as they say,
and I'm ignoring how close we are for now.
It's just a little embarrassing, that's all!
SERIF_YOTARO_TRAIN: I'll do this with appropriate effort.
SERIF_YOTARO_TRAINED: I-I'm not good at pushing this hard!
SERIF_YUHANG_APPRECIATION: Ohhh, heyyy, you look pretty tired. You can't fight or work or sell on an empty stomach, so eat up! How about some medicinal French cuisine? Sounds good, huh?
SERIF_YUHANG_DAILY: Ahh, never seen someone sharpen a kitchen knife before? It reaaally helps out. You can chop down trees to get fruit, take out wild animals... Aha, juuust kiiiidding.
SERIF_YUHANG_EVENTA: Muirauqa is a treasure trove of ingredients I've neeever seen! There was even a fish that glowed all rainbowy... Huh? I shouldn't eat it? Buuuut I already did!
SERIF_YUHANG_EVENTB: Guh! This claaaaam! I just can't... ghh, get it open! But it looks so good! I'm not giving up on you, little guy! You're gonna be a great dish today!
SERIF_YUHANG_EVENTC:
Oh, a mission? Yeah, definitely,
I'll get around to it! Honestly! Anyway, you hungry?
I can make somethin' right away if you don't mind something simple!
SERIF_YUHANG_EVENTD:
Great job, all! Picked up plenty of ingredients too!
How about we have us a little feast?
SERIF_YUHANG_HERO: Wonder why Zaniah's in the villain business? Her eyes change when she's talking about money, too... Huh? She looks like me when I'm after ingredients? Reaaaally?
SERIF_YUHANG_PLAYER: Hey, Operator, I thought up a new recipe. Want to test it out? I just want an honest voice. And don't worrrry, everything in it's edible! Really!
SERIF_YUHANG_RELATION: The fish Isaribi got is incredible! The meat's real nice and fresh, not to mention tender! I guess the way you fish reaaally changes how it tastes.
SERIF_YUHANG_TOUCH: Nyeheheheh... Heyyy, that tickles! Well, save that for when I'm not holding a knife! N-Not that it's okay now just because I don't have one... Nyeheh!
SERIF_YUHANG_TRAIN: Gonna go with high heat and adjustments on the fly!
SERIF_YUHANG_TRAINED: W-Whoa, wait! Hold on! Q-Quit it!
SERIF_ZANIAH_APPRECIATION: What's up, you worn out already? Tch, you collapsing on me isn't gonna make me a single livo. Go rest up. I'll handle the rest.
SERIF_ZANIAH_DAILY: "A galaxy-trotting flower of villainry..." Yeah, not a bad introduction. "Watch those valuables, because Master Zaniah is on the scene!" There we... Huh? How long've you been there?!
SERIF_ZANIAH_EVENTA: I'm about to get treasure beyond anyone's wildest dreams, and the spaceship I need is mere peanuts by comparison! Hey, I saw that livo first! It's mine! Ohohoho!
SERIF_ZANIAH_EVENTB: The ultimate treasure in the seas of Muirauqa... Oh, I can't wait! How much will I get for it? Oh, just thinking about it makes me want to howl!
SERIF_ZANIAH_EVENTC:
Why do I have to do this stupid mission?
W-Wait, look at that pay!
All right, time for Operation Filthy Rich!
SERIF_ZANIAH_EVENTD:
Oh-hohohoho, we made a fortune!
Now then, this'll be our cut... What's that? You got too little?
Be grateful you got any at all!
SERIF_ZANIAH_HERO: The high-class, the rich... I hate them. But that soldier, well... he doesn't seem haughty, and there he goes chasing that ball while yukking it up... Is he really a soldier?
SERIF_ZANIAH_PLAYER: Is it true you've lost your memories? Yeah? Well, you may not have your memories, but you've got a family now. That's something we've both gotta cherish.
SERIF_ZANIAH_RELATION: Yuhang kind of says and does whatever he feels like, but no one's a better cook. Gods, just remembering his dishes has got me hungry again... Wonder what's for dinner tonight.
SERIF_ZANIAH_TOUCH: Eep! What's with you, getting all handsy all of a sudden? O-Oh! Listen, this fur don't come cheap—and your wallet can't cover it! Come back when you're rich!
